story:
SEE THE TEAM OF BEOCHIC ON YOUTUBE CHANNEL 

Pour voir le texte en français, descendez un peu plus bas :)

Texte en français

What is beÔchic ?

It's a smartphone / tablet virtual fitting application + a global social network dedicated to fashion. beÔchic allows you to virtually try on fashion items thanks to augmented reality, wherever you are ! How awesome ? It's French, connected with the fashion world in Paris, and will be launch in the US, in France and in Asia.

いろいろなデザイナーの洋服、アクセサリーをバーチャル試着、

購入ができるアプリ "beÔchic" 開発プロジェクト!!　ご協力お願いします!!

Who are we ?

The beÔchic project is driven by a team of fun tech fashionable french folks ! Half of the team is composed by tech guys and the other half is specialized in user experience and service design. We currently work at bookBeo, a french startup dedicated to creating innovative service in augmented reality.

And, as the photo shows, when we team up, it rocks !

What do we believe in ?

We believe that technology can be at the same time fun, useful and an open window to the world. That's exactly what beÔchic is about : a wide open window on the fashion designers to have fun and create trends wherever you are !


Take the power back !

With beÔchic, you will be able to discover talented fashion designers from all over the world and try their products in augmented reality (2D overlay).

You will be able to mix & match their creations in a unique way, in your way, picture yourself, share it with the world, get instant feedbacks and get followed by users that like your style!

Therefore, you will become a trend-setter, you will take the power back ! And of course, if you find items you love, you will be able to buy the items.


   


Why do we need your help ?

Our ambition is to come up with a great solution so the most gifted yet unknown fashion designers / brands come onboard beÔchic. To do so, we need at least $80,000. Here is how we will spend them :

  • A rough 20% of the amount is used for the perks you will receive
  • 4% goes to Indiegogo
  • 3% goes to payment fees

We will use the remaining (roughly 75%) to develop :

  • 2 iOS applications (iPhone & iPad) and 2 Android applications (Smartphones & tablets) : these are the apps you will use to discover the fashion designers, to virtually try their creations and to buy it.
  • 1 back-office : the place where the fashion designers will upload their creations so you can try them on with your devices
  • 1 website : the desktop version of the solution where you will also be able to see the fashion designers creations and to explore other users' looks
  • Graphic design for both applications and website
  • Communication : we will use a small amount to spread the word around the world so beÔchic becomes big



Sum up : why should you back beÔchic ?

If you are a future user of the app, you will enjoy :

  • the funny and easy way to virtually try the creators' items
  • the discovery of gifted creators from all over the world
  • the community of users sharing their looks
  • the possibility to purchase directly in the application
  • the fashion advises of top fashionists (top trendsetters)

If you are a fashion designer and are selected to be featured in beÔchic, you will love :

  • the worldwide audience your creations will get
  • the social network of creators only you will be granted access to
  • the funny yet inviting way users will discover your items
  • the ease of use for you to manage your creations and closet
  • having your own customizable closet in the app (not mixed with all other creators)



You can help in many ways !

You can't make a pledge ? No worries, you can help us in other ways. You can take 2 main actions that will really help bring beÔchic to life.

  • Talk about beÔchic ! Tell your family, friends, relatives,... Word of mouth is very powerful and that you can most certainly do to help us. Let's tell your network about beÔchic !
  • Share the project ! Indiegogo provides direct links to share beÔchic on your social networks so please Like, Tweet, G+, Pin, Insta or whatever you want to do as long as it spreads the word !

This help is as valuable as perks for us so thank you for what you will do for beÔchic.


Our awesome partners

Here are some of our partners. Some of them are fashion designers, magazines, events, but all of them are awesome and we are proud to have them onboard beÔchic ! A lot more to come in the next few weeks ! If you feel like you should be one of them, please contact us !

         

          

                                 

      

                  

         




Pick your Perk

Here are the perks you will get depending on the pledge you do. We tried to make it crystal clear, but please, feel free to ask us any question you may have.


"Stem" earrings by Sophie & Renée :

"Owl necklace" with Swarovski eyes by Sophie & Renée :

"Créoles earrings" by Sophie & Renée :

The "Snood" by Elsa Fontange :


The Hat by Elsa Fontange :



Français -------------------------------------------

REGARDEZ CE QUE DIT L'EQUIPE DE BEOCHIC SUR YOUTUBE

beÔchic, Kesako ?

beÔchic est une application mobile d'essayage virtuel dédiée aux produits des créateurs de mode indépendants + un réseau social 100% mode. beÔchic vous permet donc d'essayer virtuellement des articles de mode grâce à la réalité augmentée, où que vous soyez ! Génial non ? Le projet est français, en lien avec le monde la mode à Paris et sera lancé aux États-Unis, en France et en Asie dans un premier temps.

Qui sommes nous ?

L'équipe derrière beÔchic est une bande de fous ! La moitiée de l'équipe est composée par des gars aux profils techniques (des codeurs fous) et l'autre moitié par des spécialistes de l'expérience utilisateur et de la création de services innovants (des créatifs fous). Tous ensemble nous formons l'équipe de bookBeo, une startup dédiée à la création de service innovants de réalité augmentée.

Et, comme le montre la photo, quand nous faisons équipe, it rocks !

Notre philosophie

Nous sommes certains que la technologie peut être à la fois fun, utile et une ouverture sur le monde. C'est exactement de cela dont il s'agit avec beÔchic : une porte grande ouverte sur le monde des créateurs de mode dont le but est de vous permettre de créer des tendances et de vous amuser, où que vous soyez !

Reprenez le pouvoir !

Grâce à beÔchic, vous pourrez découvrir des créateurs de mode talentueux venant de partout dans le monde et essayer leur produits en réalité augmentée (ajout de vêtements en 2D dans l'image) !

Vous pourrez essayer en même temps les produits de créateurs différents, créer votre style, vous prendre en photo, partager le résultat avec le monde, obtenir des avis en temps réel et être suivis par d'autres utilisateurs qui aiment votre style !

En mélangeant des articles de mode unique, vous allez devenir un créateur de tendances, c'est vous qui créez les tendances, reprenez le pouvoir !

Et bien sûr, si vous trouvez des articles que vous aimez, vous pourrez les acheter très facilement depuis l'application.

   


Pourquoi avons nous besoin de vous ?

Notre but est de créer une solution de haute qualité. Elle donnera envie aux utilisateurs de venir découvrir des créateurs et à ces créateurs l'envie de rejoindre beÔchic. Pour atteindre cet objectif, nous avons besoin de 60 000€ (80 000$). Voilà comment ils seront utilisés :

  • Environ 20% de la somme est utilisé pour les cadeaux que nous vous offrons en remerciement pour votre soutien
  • 4% pour la commission d'Indiegogo
  • 3% pour les frais de paiement

Nous utiliserons le reste (environ 75%) pour financer :

  • le développement de 2 applications iOS (iPhone & iPad) et 2 applications Android (smartphones et tablettes) : ce sont les applications que vous utiliserez pour découvrir les créateurs de mode et essayer virtuellement leurs créations
  • le développement d'un back-office : l'endroit où les créateurs de mode viendront déposer leurs créations  pour que vous puissiez les essayer sur vos appareils
  • le développement d'un site internet : vous pourrez également voir les créations depuis votre ordinateuret explorer les looks des autres utilisateurs : un réseau mondial de la mode !
  • l'appel à un graphiste pour les applications mobile et le site web
  • les actions de communication pour faire connaître beÔchic à travers le monde



Résumé : pourquoi devriez vous soutenir beÔchic ?

Si vous êtes un futur utilisateur de l'application, vous adorerez :

  • l'essayage virtuel des produits des créateurs, facile et amusant
  • le fait de découvrir des créateurs de mode talentueux venant de partout dans le monde
  • la communauté des utilisateurs qui partagent leurs looks
  • la possibilité d'acheter les articles directement dans l'application
  • les conseils de spécialistes de la mode

Si vous êtes un créateur de mode et êtes sélectionné pour intégrer beÔchic, vous allez aimer :

  • l'audience internationale que vos créations auront
  • le réseau social de créateurs auquel vous aurez accès
  • la façon amusante et engageante pour les utilisateurs de découvrir vos créations
  • la facilité pour vous de gérer vos créations dans l'application
  • le fait d'avoir votre propre vitrine personnalisable dans l'application (vous n'êtes pas mélangé avec d'autres créateurs)


Il y a de nombreuses façons d'aider !

Vous ne pouvez pas faire de don ? Ce n'est pas grave, vous pouvez quand même nous aider ! Vous pouvez faire 2 choses qui aideront vraiment à créer beÔchic :

  • Parler de beÔchic ! Parlez-en à votre famille, à vos amis, vos relations,… Le bouche à oreille est très puissant et vous pouvez nous aider par ce moyen là. Parlez de la campagne Indiegogo de  beÔchic à votre réseau !
  • Partager le projet ! Indiegogo fournit tous les outils de partage nécessaires alors s'il vous plaît likez, tweetez, partagez sur G+, Pinterest, Instagram,… tout ce que vous pouvez faire tant que cela relaye l'existence de la campagne Indiegogo de beÔchic


Nos super partenaires

Voici quelque uns de nos partenaires. Ils ont dores et déjà accepté de nous suivre dans l'aventure beÔchic. Si vous êtes un magazine de mode, un créateur de mode ou un événement lié à la mode, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter. Rejoignez-nous !


       

          

                                

             

                  

         



Choisissez vos cadeaux

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien et en fonction du don que vous nous faites, nous vous offrons des produits de créateurs de mode qui ont été sélectionnés pour intégrer beÔchic. Voilà une description de ces cadeaux :

Boucles d'oreille "Tiges" par Sophie & Renée :

"Collier Hibou" par 

Sophie & Renée :

"Boucles d'oreilles créoles" par Sophie & Renée :

Le "Snood" d'Elsa Fontange :


The Hat by Elsa Fontange :

REGARDEZ CE QUE DIT L'EQUIPE DE BEOCHIC SUR YOUTUBE
beÔchic, Kesako ?
beÔchic est une application mobile d'essayage virtuel dédiée aux produits des créateurs de mode indépendants + un réseau social 100% mode. beÔchic vous permet donc d'essayer virtuellement des articles de mode grâce à la réalité augmentée, où que vous soyez ! Génial non ? Le projet est français, en lien avec le monde la mode à Paris et sera lancé aux États-Unis, en France et en Asie dans un premier temps.
Qui sommes nous ?
L'équipe derrière beÔchic est une bande de fous ! La moitiée de l'équipe est composée par des gars aux profils techniques (des codeurs fous) et l'autre moitié par des spécialistes de l'expérience utilisateur et de la création de services innovants (des créatifs fous). Tous ensemble nous formons l'équipe de bookBeo, une startup dédiée à la création de service innovants de réalité augmentée.
Et, comme le montre la photo, quand nous faisons équipe, it rocks !

Notre philosophie
Nous sommes certains que la technologie peut être à la fois fun, utile et une ouverture sur le monde. C'est exactement de cela dont il s'agit avec beÔchic : une porte grande ouverte sur le monde des créateurs de mode dont le but est de vous permettre de créer des tendances et de vous amuser, où que vous soyez !
Reprenez le pouvoir !
Grâce à beÔchic, vous pourrez découvrir des créateurs de mode talentueux venant de partout dans le monde et essayer leur produits en réalité augmentée (ajout de vêtements en 2D dans l'image) !
Vous pourrez essayer en même temps les produits de créateurs différents, créer votre style, vous prendre en photo, partager le résultat avec le monde, obtenir des avis en temps réel et être suivis par d'autres utilisateurs qui aiment votre style !
En mélangeant des articles de mode unique, vous allez devenir un créateur de tendances, c'est vous qui créez les tendances, reprenez le pouvoir !
Et bien sûr, si vous trouvez des articles que vous aimez, vous pourrez les acheter très facilement depuis l'application.   
Pourquoi avons nous besoin de vous ?
Notre but est de créer une solution de haute qualité. Elle donnera envie aux utilisateurs de venir découvrir des créateurs et à ces créateurs l'envie de rejoindre beÔchic. Pour atteindre cet objectif, nous avons besoin de 60 000€ (80 000$). Voilà comment ils seront utilisés :

Environ 20% de la somme est utilisé pour les cadeaux que nous vous offrons en remerciement pour votre soutien


4% pour la commission d'Indiegogo


3% pour les frais de paiement


Nous utiliserons le reste (environ 75%) pour financer :


le développement de 2 applications iOS (iPhone & iPad) et 2 applications Android (smartphones et tablettes) : ce sont les applications que vous utiliserez pour découvrir les créateurs de mode et essayer virtuellement leurs créations


le développement d'un back-office : l'endroit où les créateurs de mode viendront déposer leurs créations  pour que vous puissiez les essayer sur vos appareils


le développement d'un site internet : vous pourrez également voir les créations depuis votre ordinateuret explorer les looks des autres utilisateurs : un réseau mondial de la mode !


l'appel à un graphiste pour les applications mobile et le site web


les actions de communication pour faire connaître beÔchic à travers le monde


Résumé : pourquoi devriez vous soutenir beÔchic ?
Si vous êtes un futur utilisateur de l'application, vous adorerez :


l'essayage virtuel des produits des créateurs, facile et amusant


le fait de découvrir des créateurs de mode talentueux venant de partout dans le monde


la communauté des utilisateurs qui partagent leurs looks


la possibilité d'acheter les articles directement dans l'application


les conseils de spécialistes de la mode


Si vous êtes un créateur de mode et êtes sélectionné pour intégrer beÔchic, vous allez aimer :


l'audience internationale que vos créations auront


le réseau social de créateurs auquel vous aurez accès


la façon amusante et engageante pour les utilisateurs de découvrir vos créations


la facilité pour vous de gérer vos créations dans l'application

le fait d'avoir votre propre vitrine personnalisable dans l'application (vous n'êtes pas mélangé avec d'autres créateurs)

Il y a de nombreuses façons d'aider !
Vous ne pouvez pas faire de don ? Ce n'est pas grave, vous pouvez quand même nous aider ! Vous pouvez faire 2 choses qui aideront vraiment à créer beÔchic :
Parler de beÔchic ! Parlez-en à votre famille, à vos amis, vos relations,… Le bouche à oreille est très puissant et vous pouvez nous aider par ce moyen là. Parlez de la campagne Indiegogo de  beÔchic à votre réseau !
Partager le projet ! Indiegogo fournit tous les outils de partage nécessaires alors s'il vous plaît likez, tweetez, partagez sur G+, Pinterest, Instagram,… tout ce que vous pouvez faire tant que cela relaye l'existence de la campagne Indiegogo de beÔchic


Nos super partenaires
Voici quelque uns de nos partenaires. Ils ont dores et déjà accepté de nous suivre dans l'aventure beÔchic. Si vous êtes un magazine de mode, un créateur de mode ou un événement lié à la mode, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter. Rejoignez-nous !
                                                                                         
Choisissez vos cadeauxPour vous remercier de votre soutien et en fonction du don que vous nous faites, nous vous offrons des produits de créateurs de mode qui ont été sélectionnés pour intégrer beÔchic. Voilà une description de ces cadeaux :Boucles d'oreille "Tiges" par Sophie & Renée :"Collier Hibou" par Sophie & Renée :"Boucles d'oreilles créoles" par Sophie & Renée :Le "Snood" d'Elsa Fontange :The Hat by Elsa Fontange :

story:
Witticist® in Short

Witticist® is a trademarked entertainment company, launched in 2013, providing humorous news, videos, parodies and more. 

People always look for a way to escape the harsh realities of life. We try to escape because we need a place to go that isn’t in an office, in a cubicle, at work, or school. We seek enjoyment, laughter, and solace. We read the news every day, and realize the terrible things that constantly go on!

Witticists—a term coined by our company—choose to find humor in life, and envision a world filled with comedy, and in today’s society, we’re so caught up in the news, or our crazy, hectic lives, that we most often forget how funny life is! 

We are looking to expand Witticist® into a clothing brand, to create comedic apparel meant to inspire laughter. 

What We Need 

We are seeking $500 to place an order of 100 T-shirts with a Witticist® logo. We will then sell each shirt for $20 to raise a total of $2,000 pre-shipping. From there, we will use that $2,000 to develop 4 separate t-shirt lines, with slogans proposed and voted on by audiences across the United States. 

Our Strategy is as follows:

  • Raise $500 via IndieGoGo to order 100 t-shirts.
  • Sell the t-shirts at $20 a piece in order to raise around $2,000.
  • With the $2,000, we will develop four separate slogans, which will be proposed and voted on by audiences across the United States. We will order 100 t-shirts for each slogan, totaling 400 shirts. This will, in turn, begin the expansion of the brand.

We are setting our campaign goal low, at only $500, because we firmly believe that through proper management, we can turn a small investment into a larger one. As our clothing line expands, we will be able to dedicate revenue to advertising the core of the Witticist® brand, Witticist.com, and from there, increase our audience and customer base.

What You Get

We offer multiple rewards for you support! For instance: 

  • Placing you on our Donor's Page at Witticist.com.
  • A personal thank you via phone from a Witticist® staff member.
  • A cartoon caricature of yourself, similar to all Witticist® employees.
  • A limited edition (1/100) t-shirt from the first order ever placed.
  • And much, much more!

    The Impact

    We spend most of our time working, fretting, and then...working more. The sad truth is that the cycle will never change. But the introduction of a Witticist® brand, featuring humorous slogans on t-shirts, will aim to brighten the days of those around us.

      Risks & Challenges

      We are setting our campaign goal low, at only $500, because we firmly believe that through proper management, we can turn a small investment into a larger one. Instead of asking for $2,000, to purchase four separate lines of shirts, we are starting small, with $500. From the revenue of each shirt, we will purchase more items, advertising, etc. 
      As our clothing line expands, we will be able to dedicate revenue to advertising the core of the Witticist brand, Witticist.com, and from there, increase our audience and customer base. By starting small, we minimize risk. Our sole challenge will be devoting our revenue from ads on our website to advertise the clothing. 

      Other Ways You Can Help Witticist®

      If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help!

      • If you like humor, enjoy laughter, and want to put smiles on more faces, you can help us by sharing our website on social media, or by word of mouth. 
      • We are slowly building our library of articles and humorous content, and if you believe you can write some content, and would like to be a part of the staff, check out our application form online!

      And that's all there is to it. Life is funny. Help us show you. Become a Witticist® by Supporting our Campaign Today. Witticist.com. Beyond Funny.

story:
About Pixie In The Park & Our Campaign

My name is Paisley and I own a small ethical fashion label, Pixie In The Park, based in Australia. The label aims to use all organic and sustainable materials. This year we want to release a range of the most comfortable leggings made in Australia. The fabric that will be used is 95% organic cotton and 5% elastemetric (spandex). We have done extensive testing with the 100% cotton as this was our original preference, but it did not retain its shape and you tended to get left with baggy knees by the end of the day. 

The design and pattern are drafted and we have been doing testing on the prototypes and have great feedback so far. They will be available from size Au 4 - Au 18 with custom sizes available. 

We are here because we need your help to purchase the 100% organic cotton thread for this new range. 

The fabric we buy is made in Australia and our labels are printed in Melbourne. All garments are ethically made in Australia. 


What We Need & What You Get

Currently we pay $44 per spool for 100% organic cotton thread (standard polycotton of the same size retails for $6). We need 7 spools of black and 7 spools of white totalling: $616. The remainder will go towards indiegogo fees, purchasing of fabric and elastic and having our labels printed. 

The reason that we wish to use organic cotton is because the aim is to have products with the lowest environmental impact as possible. 

As a thank you, will be sharing pre-release pairs of leggings with you along with our other signature products and voucher and hope that you will love the leggings as much as they are loved by all current customers. There will be an opportunity for two lucky sponsors to name a range. 

We really hope to reach our goal, but if we don't the money we raise will still go towards the list above in the hope to purchase as many materials as possible. 

Pixie In The Park supports Kiva and if we reach our goal we will send a loan to a seamstress in a developing country. You can track our Kiva progress on our Facebook. 

More About Us

Pixie In The Park started a little over two years ago as there was a lack of exciting, comfortable, colourful, organic clothing available. We aim to bring these aspects into your wardrobe with clothes that are built to last and be loved while still loving you and the planet. 

You can follow us on Facebook and through our other social media campaigns. 

The photo attached is one of our models modelling the very first available pairs of black organic cotton leggings

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love our project but don't think that you can help us right now, please share us via email and on Facebook.

If you are not really a leggings person but think that someone else you know might appreciate them, you can redeem your thank you gift as a $value gift voucher to give to someone you care about. 

We would like to say a huge thank you in advance to you all. 

Paisley and the Pixie In The Park team.

story:
Born in the heart of the Jura mountains, between France and Switzerland, KOPPO is a sustainable fashion brand that aims to manufacture high quality products with a timeless design, that both respects the planet and traditional craftsmanship.

For the last year we have been developing our designs with famous watch designers based in Bienne, Switzerland. Our collections are inspired by the birthplace of high-end watchmaking : the Jura mountains on the border between France and Switzerland.

“Timeless design, simplicity, beauty of nature”

KOPPO’s timepieces are brought to life by craftsmen, who are passionate about preserving a heritage of rare expertise. We partnered with the best artisans in France and Switzerland in order to produce timepieces that will last a life time.

The artisan who creates these small pieces of arts is based in a small French city close to the Swiss Border.

Each of our dials is unique and involves numerous steps since they are made out of an unconventional material in the world of watchmaking : wood and with a very old technique : marquetry.

Over the centuries, marquetry has been principally used for the decoration of large wooden furniture. Though this has long included clock dials, its use in a miniaturized form for wristwatches is fairly new.Marquetry is a technique that requires intense planning and precision. Based on a drawing, our artisan first created a simplified line drawing that would allow him to outline each piece of the puzzle and then saw the veneer in stacked layers. He then reassembled the tiny pieces on the dial before polishing it to achieve the final finish.

 

All our watches are assembled with a Swiss movement (Ronda) by a French watchmaker based in the small town of Morteau, that has a long track record of creating reliable and precise timepieces.

Our straps are handmade in Besançon, France.

We use vegetable tanning, a traditional method refined during the Renaissance for the leather of our straps. As it is more time-consuming to produce and heavily relies on experienced craftsmen to create the vegetable-tanned leather, only 10% of leather world production is made using this natural process.

In order to offer you timepieces that will last a lifetime, we use high quality components. We are so confident of the quality, that all our watches are covered with a 10 years warranty.

KOPPO's story has began with the collection Originelle, inspired by the mountains of Jura, our passion for wood and the savoir-faire of our craftsmen.

The Harmony collection embodies the sober and harmonious fusion of two veneers, assembled by hand.

The Métiers d'Arts collection highlights the know-how of local artisans with a modern reinterpretation of wood marquetry.

 

Inspired by the beauty of nature, this collection brings together ancestral arts of watchmaking and wood marquetry.

Change your strap easily – no tools needed.

All our watches are made to last, we offer a 10 years warranty!

  • Watch case: highest stainless steel grade 316L, PVD Rose Gold and Gold
  • Water resistant: 3ATM, 30 meters
  • Glass: Sapphire crystal with anti-scratch surface
  • Dial: made out of wood marquetry, handcrafted in France
  • Veneers: Maple, Oak, Cherrywood, Ash, Larch, Spruce
  • Case size (diameter / thickness): 36 / 8.2 mm – 40/ 8.5mm
  • Movement: Swiss movement Ronda Normtech, gold plated EOL, 5 Jewels
  • Strap: genuine Italian leather, naturally tanned and handcrafted in France (Black, Dark brown, Acajou, Gold)
  • Buckle: stainless steel pin buckle
  • Hands: Dauphine model - handmade in France
  • Warranty: 10 years warranty against all manufacturing defects

Original and high quality packaging for a perfect gift! A piece of wood highlights your KOPPO timepiece with a recycle kraft paper packaging.

It’s easy to get your own KOPPO timepiece, simply select the reward you want. Don’t worry about the choice of color or size - you will choose that later. Except for Christmas delivery of the Originelle Collection (delivery is limited to France), you have to choose between the 6 models and select the reward corresponding.

All our watches come in 2 sizes: 36mm and 40mm, suitable for men and women. To help you, download and print our watch cutouts and try on a paper version.

Née au cœur des montagnes du Jura, entre la France et la Suisse, KOPPO est une marque de mode durable qui conçoit des produits de très grande qualité au design intemporel dans le respect de la nature et de la tradition artisanale locale.

Pour créer les designs de nos montres, nous travaillons depuis une année en collaboration avec de célèbres designers spécialisés dans la montre en Suisse. Nos collections s’inspirent des montagnes du Jura, berceau de l’horlogerie, à la frontière de la France et de la Suisse. 

“Intemporel, simplicité, beauté de la nature ”

Pour donner vie à nos montres durables, nous nous sommes entourés des meilleurs artisans autour de chez nous, dans les montagnes du Jura. Passionnés par leur métier et à la recherche de la qualité absolue, nous sommes fiers de mettre en avant nos partenaires et ainsi pérenniser la tradition de leur savoir-faire.

Depuis des siècles, la marqueterie a été principalement utilisée pour la décoration de meubles en bois. Cette technique ancestrale est cependant très innovante dans le monde de l'horlogerie. Nous travaillons avec un artisan marqueteur expert dans la conception de petites pièces artistiques dans un petit village du Doubs.

La marqueterie est une technique qui demande en amont une grande préparation et une extrême précision dans la réalisation. Notre artisan crée d’abord un dessin simplifié qui s’apparente à un puzzle où il trace les contours de chaque essence de bois qui formera le visuel définitif. Il découpe chaque petite pièce dans des plaquages de bois, les rassemble sur le cadran puis les polit pour laisser apparaître le motif choisi.

Toutes nos montres sont équipées d’un mouvement Suisse Ronda et assemblées avec soin par un horloger dans la ville de Morteau. Notre partenaire horloger est connu depuis longtemps pour la conception de garde-temps précis et haut de gamme.

Nos bracelets sont réalisés à la main par notre artisan à Besançon en France. Nous utilisons un tannage naturel, une méthode traditionnelle utilisée depuis la Renaissance. Le cuir est nourri aux huiles et cires naturelles, il est peu couvert pour garder un aspect très naturel. Le bracelet va se patiner avec le temps, le rendant unique, garanti d’une exceptionnelle qualité. Seulement 10% de la production mondiale de cuir est tanné naturellement car c’est un procédé long qui requiert une grande expérience artisanale.

Pour concevoir notre montre durable, nous utilisons les matériaux les plus nobles et les composants de la meilleure qualité. Toutes nos montres ont une garantie de 10 ans car nous les avons conçues pour qu’elles durent dans le temps et soient réparables.

Parce que tout est parti de là… des montagnes du Jura, de l’amour du bois et du savoir-faire de nos artisans.

Tout en harmonie et sobriété, la rencontre de deux essences de bois.

Éloge de la main et du savoir-faire de l’artisan avec la réinterprétation contemporaine de la marqueterie.

 

Inspirée par la beauté de la nature, la collection Métier d’Arts réunit la tradition de l’horlogerie et l’art de marqueterie sur bois.

Un bracelet très facilement interchangeable grâce à son bouton poussoir – pas besoin d’outil.

Toutes nos montres sont créées pour durer, nous offrons une garantie de 10 ans !

  • Boîtier : acier inoxydable de grande qualité 316 L, traitement PVD or rose et or
  • Étanchéité : 3ATM, 30 mètres
  • Glace : Glace Saphir, crystal ultrarésistant anti-rayures
  • Cadran : cadran en marqueterie bois fabriqué à la main en France
  • Essences de bois : érable, chêne, merisier, frêne, mélèze, épicéa 
  • Dimensions boitier (diamètre/ épaisseur) : 36 / 8.2 mm – 40/ 8.5mm 
  • Mouvement : mouvement Suisse Ronda Normtech, plaqué or EOL, 5 Rubis
  • Bracelet : véritable cuir italien, tanné naturellement et fabriqué à la main en France (noir, marron foncé, acajou, gold)
  • Aiguilles : modèle Dauphine – fabriquées en France
  • Boucle : boucle acier inoxydable
  • Garantie : 10 ans de garantie contre les défauts de fabrication

Un packaging original et haut de gamme pour un cadeau qui fera son effet ! Une jolie pièce de bois usinée et entourée d'un carton kraft recyclé servira d'écrin à votre montre KOPPO.

Très simplement, en sélectionnant la contribution de votre choix en haut à droite de la page. Ne vous préoccupez pas du choix de la couleur ou de la taille, vous pourrez les choisir plus tard. Exception faite pour la collection originelle livrée pour Noël où vous pouvez choisir dès à présent entre les 6 modèles proposés en sélectionnant la contribution correspondante.

Tous nos modèles sont disponibles en 2 tailles : 36mm et 40mm, adaptés pour femme et homme. Pour vous aider, téléchargez et imprimez le gabarit de votre montre pour un rendu papier conforme à la dimension réelle. 

MERCI !

Though this has long included clock dials, its use in a miniaturized form for wristwatches is fairly new.Marquetry is a technique that requires intense planning and precision. Based on a drawing, our artisan first created a simplified line drawing that would allow him to outline each piece of the puzzle and then saw the veneer in stacked layers. He then reassembled the tiny pieces on the dial before polishing it to achieve the final finish. All our watches are assembled with a Swiss movement (Ronda) by a French watchmaker based in the small town of Morteau, that has a long track record of creating reliable and precise timepieces.Our straps are handmade in Besançon, France.We use vegetable tanning, a traditional method refined during the Renaissance for the leather of our straps. As it is more time-consuming to produce and heavily relies on experienced craftsmen to create the vegetable-tanned leather, only 10% of leather world production is made using this natural process.In order to offer you timepieces that will last a lifetime, we use high quality components. We are so confident of the quality, that all our watches are covered with a 10 years warranty.KOPPO's story has began with the collection Originelle, inspired by the mountains of Jura, our passion for wood and the savoir-faire of our craftsmen.The Harmony collection embodies the sober and harmonious fusion of two veneers, assembled by hand.The Métiers d'Arts collection highlights the know-how of local artisans with a modern reinterpretation of wood marquetry. Inspired by the beauty of nature, this collection brings together ancestral arts of watchmaking and wood marquetry.Change your strap easily – no tools needed.All our watches are made to last, we offer a 10 years warranty!
Watch case: highest stainless steel grade 316L, PVD Rose Gold and Gold
Water resistant: 3ATM, 30 meters
Glass: Sapphire crystal with anti-scratch surface
Dial: made out of wood marquetry, handcrafted in France
Veneers: Maple, Oak, Cherrywood, Ash, Larch, Spruce
Case size (diameter / thickness): 36 / 8.2 mm – 40/ 8.5mm
Movement: Swiss movement Ronda Normtech, gold plated EOL, 5 Jewels
Strap: genuine Italian leather, naturally tanned and handcrafted in France (Black, Dark brown, Acajou, Gold)
Buckle: stainless steel pin buckle
Hands: Dauphine model - handmade in France
Warranty: 10 years warranty against all manufacturing defects
Original and high quality packaging for a perfect gift! A piece of wood highlights your KOPPO timepiece with a recycle kraft paper packaging.It’s easy to get your own KOPPO timepiece, simply select the reward you want. Don’t worry about the choice of color or size - you will choose that later. Except for Christmas delivery of the Originelle Collection (delivery is limited to France), you have to choose between the 6 models and select the reward corresponding.All our watches come in 2 sizes: 36mm and 40mm, suitable for men and women. To help you, download and print our watch cutouts and try on a paper version.Née au cœur des montagnes du Jura, entre la France et la Suisse, KOPPO est une marque de mode durable qui conçoit des produits de très grande qualité au design intemporel dans le respect de la nature et de la tradition artisanale locale.Pour créer les designs de nos montres, nous travaillons depuis une année en collaboration avec de célèbres designers spécialisés dans la montre en Suisse. Nos collections s’inspirent des montagnes du Jura, berceau de l’horlogerie, à la frontière de la France et de la Suisse. “Intemporel, simplicité, beauté de la nature ”Pour donner vie à nos montres durables, nous nous sommes entourés des meilleurs artisans autour de chez nous, dans les montagnes du Jura. Passionnés par leur métier et à la recherche de la qualité absolue, nous sommes fiers de mettre en avant nos partenaires et ainsi pérenniser la tradition de leur savoir-faire.Depuis des siècles, la marqueterie a été principalement utilisée pour la décoration de meubles en bois. Cette technique ancestrale est cependant très innovante dans le monde de l'horlogerie. Nous travaillons avec un artisan marqueteur expert dans la conception de petites pièces artistiques dans un petit village du Doubs.La marqueterie est une technique qui demande en amont une grande préparation et une extrême précision dans la réalisation. Notre artisan crée d’abord un dessin simplifié qui s’apparente à un puzzle où il trace les contours de chaque essence de bois qui formera le visuel définitif. Il découpe chaque petite pièce dans des plaquages de bois, les rassemble sur le cadran puis les polit pour laisser apparaître le motif choisi.Toutes nos montres sont équipées d’un mouvement Suisse Ronda et assemblées avec soin par un horloger dans la ville de Morteau. Notre partenaire horloger est connu depuis longtemps pour la conception de garde-temps précis et haut de gamme.Nos bracelets sont réalisés à la main par notre artisan à Besançon en France. Nous utilisons un tannage naturel, une méthode traditionnelle utilisée depuis la Renaissance. Le cuir est nourri aux huiles et cires naturelles, il est peu couvert pour garder un aspect très naturel. Le bracelet va se patiner avec le temps, le rendant unique, garanti d’une exceptionnelle qualité. Seulement 10% de la production mondiale de cuir est tanné naturellement car c’est un procédé long qui requiert une grande expérience artisanale.Pour concevoir notre montre durable, nous utilisons les matériaux les plus nobles et les composants de la meilleure qualité. Toutes nos montres ont une garantie de 10 ans car nous les avons conçues pour qu’elles durent dans le temps et soient réparables.Parce que tout est parti de là… des montagnes du Jura, de l’amour du bois et du savoir-faire de nos artisans.Tout en harmonie et sobriété, la rencontre de deux essences de bois.Éloge de la main et du savoir-faire de l’artisan avec la réinterprétation contemporaine de la marqueterie. Inspirée par la beauté de la nature, la collection Métier d’Arts réunit la tradition de l’horlogerie et l’art de marqueterie sur bois.Un bracelet très facilement interchangeable grâce à son bouton poussoir – pas besoin d’outil.Toutes nos montres sont créées pour durer, nous offrons une garantie de 10 ans !
Boîtier : acier inoxydable de grande qualité 316 L, traitement PVD or rose et or
Étanchéité : 3ATM, 30 mètres
Glace : Glace Saphir, crystal ultrarésistant anti-rayures
Cadran : cadran en marqueterie bois fabriqué à la main en France
Essences de bois : érable, chêne, merisier, frêne, mélèze, épicéa 
Dimensions boitier (diamètre/ épaisseur) : 36 / 8.2 mm – 40/ 8.5mm 
Mouvement : mouvement Suisse Ronda Normtech, plaqué or EOL, 5 Rubis
Bracelet : véritable cuir italien, tanné naturellement et fabriqué à la main en France (noir, marron foncé, acajou, gold)
Aiguilles : modèle Dauphine – fabriquées en France
Boucle : boucle acier inoxydable
Garantie : 10 ans de garantie contre les défauts de fabrication
Un packaging original et haut de gamme pour un cadeau qui fera son effet ! Une jolie pièce de bois usinée et entourée d'un carton kraft recyclé servira d'écrin à votre montre KOPPO.Très simplement, en sélectionnant la contribution de votre choix en haut à droite de la page. Ne vous préoccupez pas du choix de la couleur ou de la taille, vous pourrez les choisir plus tard. Exception faite pour la collection originelle livrée pour Noël où vous pouvez choisir dès à présent entre les 6 modèles proposés en sélectionnant la contribution correspondante.Tous nos modèles sont disponibles en 2 tailles : 36mm et 40mm, adaptés pour femme et homme. Pour vous aider, téléchargez et imprimez le gabarit de votre montre pour un rendu papier conforme à la dimension réelle. MERCI !

story:
In simple Danish design and incredibly soft organic cotton, our basics are developed with some of the most technologically advanced silver fibers in the world. The SilverTech fibers prevent growth of unwanted bacteria - without losing any effect, even after hundreds of washes.

 We have autonomous driving cars and speaking robots but we are still wearing the same basic clothing we did 100 years ago. We think it’s time to change that and bring smart fibers into our everyday clothing. Let’s not waste our precious personal time or mother earth's resources, when the solution is right in front of us.

 


ANTIMICROBIAL SILVERTECH

By fusing innovative fibers with natural silver, our fabric is 99.9% effective in preventing bacterial growth on the fabric surface.

PERMANENTLY INFUSED

Similar products wash out or degrade in strength over time. However, because the silver is woven directly into our fabric, it will never wash away. 

ORGANIC SOFTNESS

We’ve paired our technology with long staple organic cotton grown in Europe. Our GOTS certified organic cotton is among the softest, most durable cotton in the world. 

NO NASTY CHEMICALS. NO NANO PARTICLES

Similar products use harsh chemical treatments to adhere silver particles to fabrics. We use the real thing – 99% pure natural silver. 

LONG TERM SUSTAINABLE

SilverTech permanent odor control stops the growth of odor-causing bacteria on fabrics, so you can wear more and wash less. This helps save water, energy and greenhouse gas emissions on a large scale.

Pure Silver? Sounds techy. 

In fact it is quite techy. Silver is naturally oligodynamic – meaning it prevents the growth of bacteria. Our fibers are woven with natural silver, this way, these antimicrobial properties are permanently integrated in the organic cotton. Active only on the fabric surface, SilverTech does not interfere with perspiration or with the skin’s natural bacterial flora. Clothing and other textile-based, SilverTech products are safe to use next to the skin. SilverTech particles are more than 100 times larger than nanoparticles and therefore are too large to penetrate the skin’s barrier.

A new generation of underwear, much appreciated.

For ages, the fabric we put right next to our skin has remained unchanged. We think it’s time to change that. We are constantly seeking new ways to use the world’s smartest natural materials. After years of research, we harnessed the incredible benefits of natural silver to create an innovative fabric that will disrupt and create a whole new category of smart fabric underwear. 

Silver, really? 

Silver has historically been used for it’s antimicrobial properties in hundreds, even thousands of years, from the ancient greek, where people would put silver coins in their water, to early warfare where wounded soldiers would use coins under their bandages. This technology has been verified by more than a decade of testing at global research institutions and compliant with the EPA and Reach act. Furthermore, Our fabric is put through rigorous wash tests to ensure protection that will last the lifetime of the product.

 Great. But is it comfy? 

Our advanced SilverTech fibers and long staple organic cotton come together to create a perfected skin feel. Underwear is our second skin and if it's not amazing to wear then it's no good. 100 percent of our GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) cotton is grown in Turkey, Europe. Turkey is among the world's oldest organic cotton manufacturers. The Turkish organic crops and methods has been perfected for decades and are among the world's leading organic cotton manufacturers in creating super soft and durable organic cotton fibers.

Perfect, can you help me get the right size?

One thing is a super soft fabric, but just as important is the fit. We’ve worked with professional textile engineers and designers to get the best fit. Use the size guide below to find the best fit for you.

 

  

 

 

 

 

How it’s made; SilverTech 

Organic Basics is very focused on creating a sustainable alternative to fast fashion and therefore our rules are no nasty chemicals and no nanotechnology. We’ve partnered with a world leading smart fiber company based in Europe, that uses natural silver to prevent bacterial growth on fabrics. Their proprietary process completely covers advanced fibers with silver while allowing them to remain extremely soft, flexible and comfortable. Only very small amounts of silver are required for SilverTech products for them to achieve highly effective odor control performance. For example, 5,000 garments require the same amount of silver as one or two silver rings.

Sustainability, I like that. 

The fashion industry is the second most polluting industry on a global scale. 40% of the environmental impact is happening in the consumption phase due to washing and drying. In Organic Basics we want to bring this massive water and energy consumption down. Sustainability is the cornerstone of Organic Basics and our line of SilverTech products was created to minimise the need for washing and thereby bring down the water and energy consumption on a larger scale. The SilverTech fabric is produced under the EPA and REACH act and our suppliers are Oekto-Tex and GOTS certified which means that it meets the highest standard of social and environmental sustainability standards. That's good for you, the farmer, the factory worker and the environment.

Simple. Danish. Design. 

Danish design was built around 'less is more', which is why we don’t use unnecessary logos, colours or patterns. Instead we focused on perfecting what is actually important in the next generation of underwear. We believe in Innovation through technology while still maintaining the beautiful simple look of your favourite basics.

Testing and improvement, better be safe than sorry.

We've been testing our prototypes rigorously over the last 9 months. From the first prototypes we’ve been testing for everything from heat-transfer capabilities to odor-fighting powers and hard washing and drying. It wasn’t perfect when we started, but after 9 months of improvement and constant optimization we can finally present a product worth the future generations.

Care Instructions, because we care. 

We recommend washing your SilverTech products every 10-14 days with your normal laundry. Yes, SilverTech keeps bacteria from multiplying on the fabric but dust and dead skin-cells will eventually accumulate. Wash it on a cool (30 degree celsius) or warm cycle (40 degree celsius), and hang to dry if possible. The SilverTech products will be able to take up to 60 degree celsius and can be tumble dried on low heat however we do not recommend this due to unnecessary use of energy. Do not use chlorine bleach.

Why choose Organic Basics? 

The fast fashion industry is a dirty bastard, we don’t like it that way. We asked ourselves, where is the sustainable alternative? This simple question became the beginning of our incredible adventure to create a purposeful basics brand that cares about a sustainable future in fashion. Now, almost 2 years after we launched Organic Basics we have sold over 60,000 products and have more than 10,000 happy customers around the world. We are in fact so passionate about our happy customers that we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

Sustainability is a process, not an end goal. We are constantly challenging ourselves and our partners to go that extra mile; it may be painful and it may not pay off right away, but we are in this game for the long run. We want to make fashion sustainable and sustainability fashionable.

How this project will go down. 

We have a very experienced production team to execute this campaign. We have also partnered up with a global distribution partner that will help us ship all of our products worldwide.

We're in safe hands, and confident of a timely delivery. However small hiccups are always a risk and therefore we've built in buffers to account for any surprises on the way. 

Rewards

 Here's how to adjust and add more products to your pledge

If you would like to add additional products to your pledge, simply add the price of the additional product to your current pledge amount. If you would like to change your reward selection all together follow the steps below:

 From the bottom of our humble hearts, THANK YOU. In our opinion, underwear is the most important garment. Therefore, we consider it our main duty to make sure that our products are of the best quality possible. We’re glad that you share this vision and we’re grateful to you for helping us bring this product to the world.

story:
www.protos.watch

 

IN DEMAND - PROJECT UPDATE

Thanks to our Early Backers  -We have been successfully funded, with manufacturing and testing now complete. Protos watches are currently in stock and ready to ship. We only have a limited quantity still available. Order now to receive your Protos watch!

 

CONCEPT

I'm building an iconic looking, solidly made, modern tool watch, that references the design cues of the classic Submariner that started it all. Importantly, I'm doing this at a sensible and accessible price point. 

True vintage dive watches are awesome. Nothing can come close to the look and feel of a classic. Unfortunately they are also awesomely rare, extremely expensive, and lack the reliability and modern manufacturing standards of contemporary watches. Modern dive watches have largely sacrificed the elegant design cues and tool aesthetic of their forebears in order to stay 'fresh' and appeal to more modern tastes. 

I think they're wrong, and I'm producing a modern, well built automatic dive watch that looks the way I think it should. A perfectly sized 40mm case, rated water-resistant to 300m that you can actually use for diving, be it the stormy North Sea off the coast of Scotland, the sunny Maldives, or indeed your desk at work! A dive watch with a movement that you can set and forget and don't need to worry about. A grail watch we can all afford.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

CASE SIZE: 40mm Diameter, 15.4mm Height (including case back and crystal), 20mm Lug Width, 47mm Lug-to-Lug  

CASE MATERIAL: 316L Marine Grade Stainless Steel, Matte Brushed with Polished Sides, Solid Steel Case Back  

DIAL: Matte Black, Applied Maxi Hour Markers, Yellow Metal Surrounds, Hand Applied Lume

HANDS: Maxi Mercedes Hands, Yellow Metal Surrounds, Hand Applied Lume  

CRYSTAL: Domed Sapphire, AR Coating on Inside  

CROWN: 8mm Big Crown with Embossed Logo  

BEZEL: Black Gloss Ceramic with Red Triangle and Lume Pip at 12, Indented White Indices, Uni-Directional   

LUME: Swiss C3 SuperLuminova on Hands and Hour Markings and Bezel Pip  

WATER RESISTANCE: Tested to 1000 ft / 300 Meters / 30 Atmospheres

MOVEMENT: NH35a Japanese Movement by Seiko  

BRACELET: 316L Stainless Steel Oyster Style (20mm tapered to 16mm), Matte Brushed Finish, Polished Solid End Links, Double Locking Safety Clasp with Debossed Logo

 

AUTOMATIC MOVEMENT – SEIKO CALIBRE NH35A  

At the heart of PROTOS is the Seiko manufactured NH35A Automatic Movement. Thoroughly tested and proven as extremely reliable, the NH35A has 24 jewels, beats at 21,600 bph and has 41 hours power reserve. The most up to date of the 3 most widely used micro brand movements (the others being the Swiss ETA 2824 and Miyota 9015 movements), the NH35a is from the family of robust, reliable movements made famous by Seiko over decades. Unlike the in-house movements of many Swiss 'luxury' manufacturers, the Japanese NH35A will demand little (if any), maintenance for the lifetime of your watch, ensuring years of accurate, reliable service.

 

CERAMIC BEZEL  

In recent years many luxury watch brands have made the shift from aluminium to ceramic bezels. Engineered ceramic, as used in watch making, has the benefit of being lightweight yet extremely hard, and does not age like other materials when exposed to salt water. Four times harder than stainless steel, ceramic bezels will not scratch or fade, preserving the pristine look of PROTOS for years to come and placing PROTOS in the same class as many high end luxury divers.

 

DOMED SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL   ​

Paying homage to the original Milsub divers of the 1950’s and 60’s, PROTOS has a domed sapphire crystal with anti-reflective coating on the inside. This is functional as well as aesthetic, providing less reflection and improved readability under water. Domed crystals were traditionally used to withstand high pressures at depth.

 

316L MARINE GRADE STAINLESS STEEL CASE AND BRACELET 

The preferred steel for use in harsh marine environments and widely used in diving (and surgical), equipment due to its properties, 316L stainless steel is the industry standard for extreme corrosion resistance, and is essentially unaffected by seawater. Both the case and bracelet have a brushed matte finish, with polished case sides and end links, for a stunning contrast on the wrist.

 

C3 SUPERLUMINOVA  

Manufactured in Switzerland, the SuperLuminova brand supplies lume to many of the world’s leading watch brands. C3 is their strongest grade, ensuring a bright and even glow. PROTOS uses C3 SuperLuminova mixed with a specific Pantone colour formula which gives it a vintage patina appearance in natural light, without comprising on the powerful and lasting green luminescence for functionality.

 

8MM BIG CROWN  

Another design tribute to both the form and function of original dive watches of the 1950’s, the Big Crown is both easy to adjust (even on the wrist) and nostalgic in its appeal. Nearly all modern dive watches feature crown guards. PROTOS does not, and like the vintage watches on which it is based, looks way cooler as a result.   

 

DIRECT TO CONSUMER MODEL

Its 2016. We are all well aware that we can achieve a much lower retail price point on high quality watches by adopting a direct to consumer model. With no large overheads for bricks & mortar retail space, no sub-distributor mark ups, no huge marketing budgets and other traditional costs, your PROTOS watch ships directly from us to your door at the best possible price point. 

 

BACKGROUND  

My mantra throughout this process has been: “Create a watch I would be excited to own. Make the quality the very best it can be for the price, and keep it affordable.” This project started a while back as a day-dream, pouring over online watch forums and researching the history of mechanical dive watches, from the first water-resistant Rolex Submariner’s of the 1950’s and Blancpains' early divers, through to Doxa and Seiko’s legendary tool watches of the 60’s, 70’s and 80’s. 

It became apparent that I was not alone in my appreciation, desire and enthusiasm for these watches but the cost to obtain an original vintage Submariner dive watch was often out of reach for most watch lovers. That’s when I decided I would make a version of my own: conceiving what would be the ideal divers homage watch. PROTOS was designed and eventually perfected through multiple prototypes and rigorous testing.

PROTOS is partnered with proven, reliable manufacturers experienced in watchmaking in China, Hong Kong and Japan. Each was selected following extensive research and tough trial and error periods, only becoming a partner after meeting strict prototype criteria and quality control. They all operate under strict internationally accepted QA guidelines as they primarily export to EU and US markets. This is reflected in the 12 months warranty PROTOS provides with every watch.

NOW SHIPPING  

Thanks to our Early Backers  - We have been successfully funded, with manufacturing and testing now complete. Protos watches are currently in stock and ready to ship.

A perfectly sized 40mm case, rated water-resistant to 300m that you can actually use for diving, be it the stormy North Sea off the coast of Scotland, the sunny Maldives, or indeed your desk at work! A dive watch with a movement that you can set and forget and don't need to worry about. A grail watch we can all afford. SPECIFICATIONSCASE SIZE: 40mm Diameter, 15.4mm Height (including case back and crystal), 20mm Lug Width, 47mm Lug-to-Lug  CASE MATERIAL: 316L Marine Grade Stainless Steel, Matte Brushed with Polished Sides, Solid Steel Case Back  DIAL: Matte Black, Applied Maxi Hour Markers, Yellow Metal Surrounds, Hand Applied LumeHANDS: Maxi Mercedes Hands, Yellow Metal Surrounds, Hand Applied Lume  CRYSTAL: Domed Sapphire, AR Coating on Inside  CROWN: 8mm Big Crown with Embossed Logo  BEZEL: Black Gloss Ceramic with Red Triangle and Lume Pip at 12, Indented White Indices, Uni-Directional   LUME: Swiss C3 SuperLuminova on Hands and Hour Markings and Bezel Pip  WATER RESISTANCE: Tested to 1000 ft / 300 Meters / 30 AtmospheresMOVEMENT: NH35a Japanese Movement by Seiko  BRACELET: 316L Stainless Steel Oyster Style (20mm tapered to 16mm), Matte Brushed Finish, Polished Solid End Links, Double Locking Safety Clasp with Debossed Logo AUTOMATIC MOVEMENT – SEIKO CALIBRE NH35A  At the heart of PROTOS is the Seiko manufactured NH35A Automatic Movement. Thoroughly tested and proven as extremely reliable, the NH35A has 24 jewels, beats at 21,600 bph and has 41 hours power reserve. The most up to date of the 3 most widely used micro brand movements (the others being the Swiss ETA 2824 and Miyota 9015 movements), the NH35a is from the family of robust, reliable movements made famous by Seiko over decades. Unlike the in-house movements of many Swiss 'luxury' manufacturers, the Japanese NH35A will demand little (if any), maintenance for the lifetime of your watch, ensuring years of accurate, reliable service. CERAMIC BEZEL  In recent years many luxury watch brands have made the shift from aluminium to ceramic bezels. Engineered ceramic, as used in watch making, has the benefit of being lightweight yet extremely hard, and does not age like other materials when exposed to salt water. Four times harder than stainless steel, ceramic bezels will not scratch or fade, preserving the pristine look of PROTOS for years to come and placing PROTOS in the same class as many high end luxury divers. DOMED SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL   ​Paying homage to the original Milsub divers of the 1950’s and 60’s, PROTOS has a domed sapphire crystal with anti-reflective coating on the inside. This is functional as well as aesthetic, providing less reflection and improved readability under water. Domed crystals were traditionally used to withstand high pressures at depth. 316L MARINE GRADE STAINLESS STEEL CASE AND BRACELET The preferred steel for use in harsh marine environments and widely used in diving (and surgical), equipment due to its properties, 316L stainless steel is the industry standard for extreme corrosion resistance, and is essentially unaffected by seawater. Both the case and bracelet have a brushed matte finish, with polished case sides and end links, for a stunning contrast on the wrist. C3 SUPERLUMINOVA  Manufactured in Switzerland, the SuperLuminova brand supplies lume to many of the world’s leading watch brands. C3 is their strongest grade, ensuring a bright and even glow. PROTOS uses C3 SuperLuminova mixed with a specific Pantone colour formula which gives it a vintage patina appearance in natural light, without comprising on the powerful and lasting green luminescence for functionality. 8MM BIG CROWN  Another design tribute to both the form and function of original dive watches of the 1950’s, the Big Crown is both easy to adjust (even on the wrist) and nostalgic in its appeal. Nearly all modern dive watches feature crown guards. PROTOS does not, and like the vintage watches on which it is based, looks way cooler as a result.    DIRECT TO CONSUMER MODELIts 2016. We are all well aware that we can achieve a much lower retail price point on high quality watches by adopting a direct to consumer model. With no large overheads for bricks & mortar retail space, no sub-distributor mark ups, no huge marketing budgets and other traditional costs, your PROTOS watch ships directly from us to your door at the best possible price point.  BACKGROUND  My mantra throughout this process has been: “Create a watch I would be excited to own. Make the quality the very best it can be for the price, and keep it affordable.” This project started a while back as a day-dream, pouring over online watch forums and researching the history of mechanical dive watches, from the first water-resistant Rolex Submariner’s of the 1950’s and Blancpains' early divers, through to Doxa and Seiko’s legendary tool watches of the 60’s, 70’s and 80’s. It became apparent that I was not alone in my appreciation, desire and enthusiasm for these watches but the cost to obtain an original vintage Submariner dive watch was often out of reach for most watch lovers. That’s when I decided I would make a version of my own: conceiving what would be the ideal divers homage watch. PROTOS was designed and eventually perfected through multiple prototypes and rigorous testing.PROTOS is partnered with proven, reliable manufacturers experienced in watchmaking in China, Hong Kong and Japan. Each was selected following extensive research and tough trial and error periods, only becoming a partner after meeting strict prototype criteria and quality control. They all operate under strict internationally accepted QA guidelines as they primarily export to EU and US markets. This is reflected in the 12 months warranty PROTOS provides with every watch.NOW SHIPPING  Thanks to our Early Backers  - We have been successfully funded, with manufacturing and testing now complete. Protos watches are currently in stock and ready to ship.

story:
We are Harmattan Design (Holt Evans & Radu Zarnescu), Kickstarter veterans and Enthusiastic Creators. Last year, our fourth campaign The Smart Belt 1.0 became the most funded fashion accessory in history.

We sent out all the pledges and wanted to know what our backers had to say. To our delight, 67% of our backers wanted more colors for their belts, more buckle finishes and many had other even more interesting ideas of what we can improve.

     So, on popular demand, this year, we are back and better, TAKE A LOOK! 

 What we believe is that there is no one thing that made our SMART BELT such a huge success, but the combination of all our innovations bundled into a nice and elegant, finely tuned package. 

 Firstly, replacing the 5 hole system with 32 adjustments brings a world of comfort and a whole new dimension of adjustability. Not many people think about it or realize it but, our waist changes as we go about our business throughout the day while the belt we wear does not adjust because holes are too far apart. 

Forget feeling tight or loose, you'll forget you have a belt on but your pants will stay exactly where they're supposed to.

Our Kevlar® Core is our staple innovation. Belts wear out because the leather flexes longitudinally and loses structure. Our Kevlar® Core prevents that from happening by reinforcing the whole structure like nothing else. It makes the whole thing indestructible yet light and comfortable.  

 The Leather we use is the most exclusive leather anywhere in the world. Vegetable Tanning is almost a lost art. Because it takes longer to tan the leather with natural tannins it has been replaced by chromium tanning at the turn of the century. We get our leather from a small valley in Tuscany, Italy, one of the hand-full of places in the world where this is still done. It's much more resilient that normal leather, it's all natural, eco friendly and really smells good too. It will come with a certificate of authenticity and a serial number.

 Have you ever had a problem with a wrong size or buying a present for someone, ever been in between sizes? Not our Smart Belt 2.0. You will get to make your own size, so no chance of getting it wrong.

  This was one of the biggest asks we got from our Backers, more colors and more buckles. And we don't disappoint our backers, we exist as a company because of them. After you pledge by selecting a reward from the column on the right and after the campaign ends in late July, we will send you a survey by e-mail where you can select options.

   HIGH RESOLUTION IMAGES > CLICK HERE 

  On the experience of a Super Project last year, The Smart Belt 1.0 with 15.000 backers in which we were 40 days late in starting to ship, we learned our lesson. This time, we are manufacturing beforehand and using a bit of stock as a buffer for any hurdle we might encounter. We will start shipping in August and fulfil in order of backer number at a rate of about 4000 backers per month with a better courier service this time.

 “DuPontTM and Kevlar® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company."

We welcome third party sharing of our product in graphic form and text but only if in accordance and in full respect of trademark and copyright use guidelines concerning Kevlar® issued by it's respective owner, E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company.For more information on using these trademarks linked to the materials we use in manufacturing THE SMART BELT 2.0, please visit:  Kevlar® Trademark Policy

We, Harmattan Design LLC, are a responsible company and believe that quality is of the utmost importance. As such, we source our Kevlar® Fibre directly from manufacturers licensed by E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company and are Registered Customers.

 Patents and Intellectual Property

Part of our due diligence as a reputable company, in launching a new product, is the undertaking of an IP Audit. Such an audit, by a well known US IP specialised law practice, has deemed our Smart Belt 2.0 to be free of any infringement on any  standing patent, domestic or foreign. Any claim to the contrary, in a public arena, in a purposeful attempt to disparage our efforts will be pursued for damages.   

Video and Audio Content

All footage, images and soundtracks presented within this campaign are our own manufacture or are licensed from their respective owners for the purpose and scope in which they are used. Testimonials of our product are voluntary and renders from actual backers from previous campaigns that have had extensive experience in using  the initial iteration of The Smart Belt 2.0. The testimonials are their own manufacture and are used with their specific and direct consent.

Warranty & Money Back Guarantee

The Smart Belt 2.0 has a limited warranty of 2 years from the receipt of the product. The warranty covers manufacturing defects, structural failure of the buckle or the strap. The Money Back Guarantee is valid 30 Days from receipt of the product and can be claimed only after the product is returned to us in a good working order and with no apparent marks or signs of wear.

    We asked some of our more communicative backers to give us an opinion of the Smart Belt 1.0 and this is what they came up with. We put them all glued together in one clip in order to save space on the story board. HAVE A LOOK!

 

 

 

Some comments we picked up from the comments section of our previous iteration  (The Smart Belt 1.0) here on Kickstarter, some from Messages and a lot from the Satisfaction Survey we sent out.

 'Such an amazing belt! Been using it for about a month and I absolutely love it. Will order a couple more through indiegogo.' 

Kickstarter, Backer No: #6047, Hai Ho , Comment:

 'I've been using the belt for the past week. Fantastic is all I can say. It's hard to wear any other belts now. Good work.' 

Kickstarter, Backer No: #3453, Corey seale, Comment:

 'Received mine last week. FANTASTIC product! The design and workmanship is on point. Well done!' 

Kickstarter, Backer No: #8961, Stanley Tso, Comment: 'Great quality and really a good idea!' 

Kickstarter, Backer No: #1173, Lim Hui Jin Eugene , Comment:

 'Just received mine a week ago!! Awesome belt and workmanship!! Regards from Singapore!!' 

Kickstarter, Backer No: #9321, Srikanth B, Comment:

 'Received it today. Looks gorgeous. The clip fitting was straight forward thanks to @Engelhart . Release is easy too. Great product.' 

Kickstarter, Backer No: #7321, Feri Ariel Jainudin , Comment: 'What a great belt you have designed. The belt have just arrived today and it works like a charm. Keep the fantastic work' 

Kickstarter, Backer No: #10009, Dinis Quelhas, Comment:

 'Guys, a big thank you for the belt. Works like a charm!' 

Kickstarter, Backer No: #9172, Narendra Khanna, Comment:

 'Excellent belt, lovely colour and finish. Your courier asked for so many details, one would think I was asking for a visa!!' 

Kickstarter, Backer No: #96, Jorge , Comment:

 'Just received mine and since day one I have been using it daily. Although it is true that you need to apply a considerable force in order to attach the buckle to the strap the first time, it can be done. As for taking it off, in a couple of minutes you will learn how to do it: try to think how it works. You need to tighten further around your waist while pressing outwards the notch in the buckle at the same time. You will feel the tension has been released so then, without releasing the notch in the buckle, just slide the belt outside of the buckle. Really a fantastic product and the quality of the leather is superb. Nice work!' 

Kickstarter, Backer No: #6283, Ben Langers , Comment:

 'I haven't gone a day without my new belt since I got it delivered. Just ordered two more. Thanks for this wonderful addition to my wardrobe!'

   HIGH RESOLUTION IMAGES > CLICK HERE   On the experience of a Super Project last year, The Smart Belt 1.0 with 15.000 backers in which we were 40 days late in starting to ship, we learned our lesson. This time, we are manufacturing beforehand and using a bit of stock as a buffer for any hurdle we might encounter. We will start shipping in August and fulfil in order of backer number at a rate of about 4000 backers per month with a better courier service this time.  “DuPontTM and Kevlar® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company."We welcome third party sharing of our product in graphic form and text but only if in accordance and in full respect of trademark and copyright use guidelines concerning Kevlar® issued by it's respective owner, E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company.For more information on using these trademarks linked to the materials we use in manufacturing THE SMART BELT 2.0, please visit:  Kevlar® Trademark PolicyWe, Harmattan Design LLC, are a responsible company and believe that quality is of the utmost importance. As such, we source our Kevlar® Fibre directly from manufacturers licensed by E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company and are Registered Customers. Patents and Intellectual PropertyPart of our due diligence as a reputable company, in launching a new product, is the undertaking of an IP Audit. Such an audit, by a well known US IP specialised law practice, has deemed our Smart Belt 2.0 to be free of any infringement on any  standing patent, domestic or foreign. Any claim to the contrary, in a public arena, in a purposeful attempt to disparage our efforts will be pursued for damages.   Video and Audio ContentAll footage, images and soundtracks presented within this campaign are our own manufacture or are licensed from their respective owners for the purpose and scope in which they are used. Testimonials of our product are voluntary and renders from actual backers from previous campaigns that have had extensive experience in using  the initial iteration of The Smart Belt 2.0. The testimonials are their own manufacture and are used with their specific and direct consent.Warranty & Money Back GuaranteeThe Smart Belt 2.0 has a limited warranty of 2 years from the receipt of the product. The warranty covers manufacturing defects, structural failure of the buckle or the strap. The Money Back Guarantee is valid 30 Days from receipt of the product and can be claimed only after the product is returned to us in a good working order and with no apparent marks or signs of wear.    We asked some of our more communicative backers to give us an opinion of the Smart Belt 1.0 and this is what they came up with. We put them all glued together in one clip in order to save space on the story board. HAVE A LOOK!   Some comments we picked up from the comments section of our previous iteration  (The Smart Belt 1.0) here on Kickstarter, some from Messages and a lot from the Satisfaction Survey we sent out. Kickstarter, Backer No: #1199, Gary Blasco, Comment:  'This belt is the best. How can I get another?' Kickstarter, Backer No: #8607, Anthony De Juan , Comment: 'I"m not going to lie, these belts are pretty awesome. Very happy with my purchase. Great job!' Kickstarter, Backer No: #7320, Niklas Stockhaus, Comment: 'I just wanna say that i love this belt. I ordered 2 belts and iven been using them everyday for a few months and they work flawlessly, and look good! Thinking of ordering 2 more since they are so great.' Kickstarter, Backer No: #32, Harish Bysani Kodanda, Comment:'Amazing at of creators, best project I have backed, thanks for sorting my issue' Kickstarter, Backer No: #1108, JP, Comment: '… I opened them and had them sorted in a few minutes. They are exactly what I hoped they would be. Very clean and seem solid. … ' Kickstarter, Backer No: #11138, Filip Hansson, Comment: 'So far so good, my two belts are doing the job as well as looking awesome. No quality issues so far, fingers crossed I dont get any in the future either.. :)' Kickstarter, Backer No: #11310, Gerard Yang, Comment: 'Great product. Is there a web store I can order a few more as gifts for my friends?' Kickstarter, Backer No: #12618, pascal.perrin, Comment: 'Hey Gents,Have just received my two smart belts and I am thrilled! The wait was well worth it! Great product, works well, I can barely feel it and on top of it: it looks premium! (Which it actually is given the quality of the materials I could experience) Nothing else to add, wonderful product at this price tag! Will order some more for all my suits. Kickstarter, Backer No: #12769, Morris Choy, Comment: 'I was incredibly impressed with my belt, and wanted to purchase another in another colour. Awesome belt and workmanship!! Regards from Singapore!!' Kickstarter, Backer No: #9321, Srikanth B, Comment: 'Received it today. Looks gorgeous. The belt have just arrived today and it works like a charm. Keep the fantastic work' Kickstarter, Backer No: #10009, Dinis Quelhas, Comment: 'Guys, a big thank you for the belt. Works like a charm!' Kickstarter, Backer No: #9172, Narendra Khanna, Comment: 'Excellent belt, lovely colour and finish. Your courier asked for so many details, one would think I was asking for a visa!!' Kickstarter, Backer No: #96, Jorge , Comment: 'Just received mine and since day one I have been using it daily. Although it is true that you need to apply a considerable force in order to attach the buckle to the strap the first time, it can be done. As for taking it off, in a couple of minutes you will learn how to do it: try to think how it works. You need to tighten further around your waist while pressing outwards the notch in the buckle at the same time. You will feel the tension has been released so then, without releasing the notch in the buckle, just slide the belt outside of the buckle. Really a fantastic product and the quality of the leather is superb. Nice work!' Kickstarter, Backer No: #6283, Ben Langers , Comment: 'I haven't gone a day without my new belt since I got it delivered. Just ordered two more. Thanks for this wonderful addition to my wardrobe!'

story:
Pigeons & Thread is a Toronto based garment production and design company.

Our goal is to achieve world domination by working with local Canadian fashion designers, as well as many other creative types to help "Take Over The World - One Stitch At a Time!"

P & T prides ourselves on helping make your vision a reality while maintaining a local, sweat-shop free environment. We focus on all aspects of the fashion design process from consultation, illustration, pattern drafting, grading and sewing construction.

Our most popular machine, the cover-stitch has been acting up and well, it's just not getting the job done. To fix this, we have put down a deposit for a brand new industrial  JUKI  MF 7923. (OHHAHH)

We are hoping to raise funds to pay it off with some fun P&T SWAG, IN-STUDIO WORKSHOPS, and maybe even a CHRISTMAS BAKESALE! Any bit helps, so if it's a $5 high five or one of our classic #NOBULLSHIT hats, we hope you can help us out. Stay tuned for MORE PERKS rolling out!

Thank YOU!
