To fix this, we have put down a deposit for a brand new industrial  JUKI  MF 7923. (OHHAHH)We are hoping to raise funds to pay it off with some fun P&T SWAG, IN-STUDIO WORKSHOPS, and maybe even a CHRISTMAS BAKESALE! Any bit helps, so if it's a $5 high five or one of our classic #NOBULLSHIT hats, we hope you can help us out. Stay tuned for MORE PERKS rolling out!Thank YOU!

story:
Short Summary

I want to first off say Thank You to everyone who views and supports this launch! I am here to raise awareness to bitcoin and the benefits it can have to today's society. I have been passionately involved in bitcoin for a few years and always enjoy introducing people to bitcoin and discussing this topic. One day I was shopping the internet looking to find shirts geared to the bitcoin community and I did not find any that I truly liked, so I decided to do something about it. I started my own line of custom design bitcoin t-shirts and men's board shorts. I wanted the designs to have meaning, while also being fashionable and enjoyable to wear.

My passion and enthusiasm for bitcoin is so great that I wish to be the go-to store for anything bitcoin related, including an interactive blog, men's and women's apparel, and much more! I would be beyond grateful if you helped me achieve this goal! 

BTCoutfitter was featured in an interview with Bitcoinist.net recently. You can read more about the company and the history here: http://bitcoinist.net/btc-outfitters-bitcoin-clothing/


    What We Need & What You Get

    In order to continue this company and have the ability to place another large order of men's and women's shirts, I need your help. With your contributions, I am going  to place an order for very comfortable V-neck shirts for men, men's and women's polo shirts, a unique bitcoin design just for women's shirts, and a limited edition run of a bitcoin sweater for the cold months to come. I am targeting my goal of $5000 for the reasoning that I want to upgrade my entire website to include an interactive blog, provide educational material on everything about bitcoin, and make the purchase order for the above mentioned products.

    Currently, I have 3 different shirt designs, which can be viewed in my Gallery and 3 different color men's board shorts. The shirts are sizes M, L, and XL; and the shorts are (waist) sizes 30, 32, 34, 36, 38, and 40. You can also view these at www.BTCoutfitter.com

    I made an initial purchase and have these shirts and shorts in stock now and will send the respective items of clothing to you according to the contribution amount. Your contribution will not only go toward my next goal, but you will immediately receive one or some of my custom bitcoin designed apparel!!


      The Impact

      My company is based in St. Petersburg, FL and we are a proud affiliate of Bitpay, the company who is sponsoring the NCAA Football St. Petersburg Bitcoin Bowl Game. With your help, we will be able to open a booth at the game and help bring awareness to not only the city, but also the football community and beyond!!

      Your impact will not only help my company, but it will help impact the lives of so many that are soon to be introduced to the world of bitcoin and the many benefits it can provide!!


        Risks & Challenges

        I have already raised capital to make my initial investment and believe with hard work and dedication, I will be able to take my company to that next level and truly be the go-to store for all of your bitcoin needs! I spent 10 years in the Marine Corps and did two deployments to Iraq and Afghanistan, so I know what it takes to adapt, overcome, and persevere.

        I have not stopped since taking on this venture and will not stop until I have helped touch and better the lives of each and every individual I can!! This is an uphill battle, as I have started this company from nothing, and I want to again Thank You for your support and generous contribution!!

        Semper Fidelis / In Bitcoin We Trust


          Other Ways You Can Help

          If you would like to make a donation by bitcoin, please send them to the following address:

          1KfTzwgf74UtcJDTQ8vftkYSTfmKa5APxG

          If you do make a donation by bitcoin and would like a shirt or short’s please send me an email at info@btcoutfitter.com and I will get your info to send you the clothing.

          You can follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram @ btcoutfitter

story:
Unser Ziel ist die Attraktivitätssteigerung der Leipziger Georg-Schumann-Straße. Hierfür haben wir das Label GRGS gegründet. Wir bieten zwischen dem 31.08. und dem 05.09.2016 in der Georg-Schumann-Straße 294 Events, witzige Aktionen, Gewinnspiele und eine begrenzte Anzahl eigens designter GRGS Aktionsshirts!. Dabei benötigen wir deine Unterstützung!

Trete dem Projekt bei, indem du uns finanziell unterstützt und im Gegenzug in das Projekt involviert wirst. Ab einer Finanzspritze von 10 EUR erhältst du eines von 140 limitierten GRGS Shirts mit dem du zeigst, dass du dich für deine Region einsetzt! Denn die Gesamtsumme der Kampagne wird zur Förderung der Georg-Schumann-Straße eingesetzt!

Nach Abschluss unseres Projekts wird eine Publikation erstellt, in der du als Finanzier deinen Platz bekommst! Auf einer Collage werden wir zeigen, wer uns bei der Aktion unterstützt hat.

Wir bieten zwischen dem 31.08. und dem 05.09.2016 in der Georg-Schumann-Straße 294 Events, witzige Aktionen, Gewinnspiele und eine begrenzte Anzahl eigens designter GRGS Aktionsshirts!. Dabei benötigen wir deine Unterstützung!Trete dem Projekt bei, indem du uns finanziell unterstützt und im Gegenzug in das Projekt involviert wirst. Ab einer Finanzspritze von 10 EUR erhältst du eines von 140 limitierten GRGS Shirts mit dem du zeigst, dass du dich für deine Region einsetzt! Denn die Gesamtsumme der Kampagne wird zur Förderung der Georg-Schumann-Straße eingesetzt!Nach Abschluss unseres Projekts wird eine Publikation erstellt, in der du als Finanzier deinen Platz bekommst! Auf einer Collage werden wir zeigen, wer uns bei der Aktion unterstützt hat.

story:
ADD ONS:  PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU WILL BE ABLE TO ADD THE FOLLOWING ADD-ONS ONCE WE SEND YOU YOUR SURVEY.  PLEASE JUST CHOOSE ANY REWARD LEVEL NOW, AND ONCE WE SEND OUT THE SURVEY, YOU'LL HAVE THE CHANCE TO ADD ADDITIONAL FUNDS IN ORDER TO PURCHASE THESE ADD-ONS. THE SURVEY WILL BE SENT TO YOU WITHIN ONE WEEK OF YOUR CONTRIBUTION.




 


The thought, detail and passion that went into the design of the GX1-A is what makes this watch stand out.


Meticulous detail has gone into every step of the manufacturing process. With the ultimate goal of creating a superior quality timepiece.


Dimensions:

  • Case diameter: 42 mm (47.2 mm with crown)
  • Case thickness: 11.6 mm
  • Total watch length, including strap: 254 mm
  • Strap width at the lugs: 22 mm
  • Strap width at the pinhole: 19 mm
  • Buckle width: 23.8 mm
  • Watch weight: 100-105 grams (depending on the strap chosen)


Go Swiss or go home. Sure there are plenty of cheaper Chinese and Japanese movements, but not for us! The LIV GX1-A Swiss Automatic Watch features the accurate Sellita SW200 Swiss Movement.
Movement specifications:
  • Frequency: 28'800 A/h (4 Hz)
  • Running time: 38 hours
  • Number of jewels: 26
  • Functions: Display by means of hands: hours, minutes, seconds; date display in window
  • Winding stem: 3 positions: 1) Manual winding 2) Quick correction of date 3) Time setting
  • Barrel spring: Nivaflex 

Why the Sellita SW-200?
It wasn't easy choosing which Swiss automatic movement to use; we needed to consider many factors: accuracy, reliability, and secure supply for many years to come.
Sellita is a solid manufacturer with a long history of building movements and great emphasis on quality and customer support.



Only sapphire (front and back) for this baby! The LIV GX1-A is the exact same high-quality anti-reflective sapphire crystal used in our first watch.







NY State Customers: Please add 8.875% to your pledge to account for NY State Sales Taxes.

We stand firmly behind our products and are committed to fanatical service. Each LIV watch comes with a limited warranty of flaws in workmanship and materials for a period of five (5) years after original purchase.

After being in the watch industry for 22+ years, Chaz realized there was a need for a new type of quality, precision watch, he set out to design watches that speak to the people who live life to the extreme, at a price point that would turn the industry on its head. He established LIV – Swiss Watches as a bold new brand for those who desire to live life to the fullest.

Chaz envisioned LIV as a brand that would be driven by the "Direct to Consumer" approach to really connect with fans and to price the products for the people, note the middlemen.

At the end of 2014, Team LIV launched the LIV GX1 Swiss Chrono right here on Kickstarter. The project was fully funded within the first 11 hours and has the most backers for a Swiss watch project on Kickstarter to date.

Thanks to our amazing fans, the LIV GX1 Swiss Chrono is now the #1 Customer Rated Men's Watch on Amazon!

Each component in this watch is crafted with extreme care and workmanship.


  


Meticulous detail has gone into every step of the manufacturing process. With the ultimate goal of creating a superior quality timepiece.

Sellita is a solid manufacturer with a long history of building movements and great emphasis on quality and customer support.





  


The dial of the LIV GX1-A is easy to read, thanks to its three-dimensional multi-layered construction and clean design. The indexes and hands are topped off with strong luminescence, the Super-LumiNova BGW9, which is aesthetically pleasing during the day and gives you great visibility at night.
 



  

Only sapphire (front and back) for this baby! The LIV GX1-A is the exact same high-quality anti-reflective sapphire crystal used in our first watch.

story:
High-End Sunglasses Everyone can Afford to Wear.

Our team sought to create ROTA from a longing passion to design high-end fashion sunglasses without the high-end retail sticker price that usually comes along with it. Like you, we were frustrated with paying hundreds of dollars for name brand sunglasses that looked nice but cost a whole days paycheck. 

We have spent the past year working tirelessly with designers in the fashion industry to create a new, original, stylish, and high-end quality collection of sunglasses at a reasonable price everyone can afford to wear this summer. 

With your support, we will be able to add fresh new designs to our collection, while still keeping our promise of keeping our prices fair and reasonable.


Our Promise. 

We've finalized our designs, ordered the initial collections and have built a strong relationship with a leading industry manufacturer for eyewear. All that is left is your generous support. 
Once our Indiegogo campaign finishes, our team will begin shipping the orders free to our awesome backers before Summer starts in June!
Your satisfaction is extremely important to us, which is why we've sourced the highest quality materials we can find all at a price that is affordable for everyone. 
Each of our glasses come with our signature packaging including a hardened case, microfiber, and custom box. Our glasses are made of a lightweight tough alloy steel blend with polarized UV400 lenses for maximum wearability and clarity. 

IMPORTANT: After placing your order on Indiegogo, please fill out this brief survey so we can get your exact sunglasses choices. We have over 50 different collections and colors of unique glasses, so please fill this quick survey carefully after ordering   https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/S5YDBL7                -Thank You!  

We Need your Support!

In order to turn this dream of ours into a successful reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our unique sunglasses, but sharing our story with your friends on social media. 


If you could do something as simple as tweeting or sharing this page on facebook, we would greatly appreciate it!


Women's Collections start at the beginning of the page, and Men's Collections start are at the end of the the page. (Sorry Guys, but Ladies first;-)


ROTA Women.

  • ROTA Women no.1

  • (8 Color Variations: Black-Black, Silver-Metallic, Gold-Grey, Silver-Grey, Gold-Pink, Silver-Light Pink, Gold-Light Blue, Gold-Green)

  • ROTA Women no.2
  • 8 Color Variations: Black, Gold-Black, Black-Blue, Black-Blue-Silver Leopard-Silver-Black, Gold-Green, Gold-White-Grey, Silver-Grey)

_____________________________________________________________________________

  • ROTA Women no.3
  • 6 Color Variations: Gold-Pink, Gold-Grey, Silver-Grey, Gold-Black, Black-Black, Black-Orange)

_____________________________________________________________________________

  • 6 Color Variations: Black, Black-Purple, Black-Orange, Black-Blue Leopard-Brown, White-Blue)

Thank You for your Support,

ROTA Team

story:
CROFT Watches is a new independent watch brand, designing and producing high quality affordable watches. Dually based out of Melbourne, Australia, and London, England, they have created watches that are versatile for the beach, yet formal enough to be in a boardroom.

For the founders of CROFT, it was essential to have a product that is as much at home outdoors, as it is for formal occasions. Therefore the watches are produced with a scratch-resistant, highly durable, sapphire crystal glass with anti-reflective coating, as well as quick-release interchangeable leather watch straps, to make sure you always keep the watch looking fresh.

The team sought to ensure the watches were affordable after seeing the brand inflation and retail markup many popular brands pass on to consumers. We know the cost to these popular brands is a fraction of what they cost to buy in store due to the many intermediaries in the sales chain. We have streamlined the entire process and deliver directly to the consumer, bypassing all of the intermediaries along the way.

No detail has been left untouched with our watches. Every aspect has been considered, from the small detail of the logo lightly engraved onto the crown, through to running a production run of 100 watches to ensure that our watches look as beautiful as they do on paper.

To streamline the sales process we have moved away from the traditional sales channels of selling products to wholesalers, sales agents, distributors and traditional marketing techniques.

Skills - We have picked a strong team, and built a diverse network of contacts in all industries. The CROFT team has a wide range of skills, ranging from automotive manufacturing, custom automotive design and engineering, sports marketing, brand management, business management and investments. Collectively they can design, engineer, crunch numbers, and run a strong business.

Design - The product designers within our team have a huge amount of experience in taking new and exciting ideas and turning them into reality. With talents ranging from drawing, through to graphic design and computer aided design, they are able to rapidly iterate and develop new ideas, whilst pushing the boundaries of what the manufacturers can produce. So much so they already have the next two models designed!

Materials - Designing and engineering the Richmond from the ground up allowed the team to be selective in what materials to use. The materials used were selected for their balance between aesthetics and their underlying properties.

Supply chain - We have spent over a year working with our manufacturers and suppliers. We have been to their factories, developed multiple prototypes and even run a small production of 100 watches (#THEFIRSTBATCH) to ensure we can deliver the product we say we can. We have dived into each and every detail, to not only ensure you will be happy but so that we can also proudly wear the watches.

The initial Richmond collection comes in 8 different colour combinations.

Case: Polished stainless steel or Matt black PVD coated

Dial: Brilliant white or Jet black

Leather strap: Black or Mahogany

Buckle: Colour matched to the watch case

Hands: Colour matched to the watch case

Our First Collection, the Richmond, has a sapphire crystal lense and a surgical grade stainless steel case that measures 43mm in diameter and 9.3mm in thickness. These watches are powered by an accurate Japanese Miyota quartz movement, including a day/date (English/French) function and are water resistant up to 50 meters.

The Richmond comes in four initial designs; the matt black case and the steel case, each with either a black or mahogany leather strap. Each style has it's own unique benefits but all are stylish for any occasion, and sturdy enough to cope with most adventures.

Sapphire Crystal

Sapphire crystal is the name given to the glass on the watch. For our watches to stand up to the challenges of an active life, we have put sapphire crystal on all our watches as standard. It is the most common part of an expensive luxury watch, particularly due to its scratch resistance (the only material tougher than sapphire is diamond) and high durability. We have also added anti-reflective coating to reduce the appearance of reflections, but also to improve the colour of the dial by influencing the light passing through the lens.

Watch Case

Our cases and steel bands are made from surgical grade stainless steel (316L stainless steel). This means it has stronger resistance to corrosion than many other metal alloys, so can handle the rigours of changing environments much better. Along with that, it has better hardness and scratch resistance compared to other alloy metals.

Movement

At the heart of every CROFT Watch is a Japanese made Miyota movement - the same movement many luxury watchmakers use. It's an excellent quartz movement, has amazing shock resistance and a long battery life.

Case-Back

The case of a CROFT Watch doesn’t just stop there, we have also specially engraved each watch with LDN-MEL to represent London and Melbourne - the joint birthplace of CROFT Watches.

The "Super Early Bird", "Early Kickstarter" and "Early Bird Double" rewards each come with a specially engraved with "FOUNDER'S EDITION" and "1 of 300". Why these rewards you ask? To really benefit from economies of scale with our manufacturers we need to place an order for 300 pieces with them. We wanted to remind you that the watch you purchased got CROFT Watches off the ground and into production.

In the “First Batch” reward (reward No.3), we have engraved it specifically with “THE FIRST BATCH" and "1 of 100” to give you that unique product that you treasure forever.

Dial

The dial is the most important part of the watch - how else will you tell the time?! At CROFT Watches, we want to invite eyes to take a closer look and be excited by the stylish, minimalist design.

The dial itself is made up of a thin metal plate, and then coated to provide the finish. The dial is then assembled with the colour matched steel markers, which requires precision tooling to place them accurately in their correct positions.

 Straps

Every watch needs a strap and the quality of this is essential because an uncomfortable strap, is an uncomfortable watch.

Every CROFT Watch uses 100% genuine cowhide leather straps that provide amazing comfort and longevity. Along with this, we have specially designed the buckle to be exactly the right size for the watch and have made them from 316L stainless steel, colour matched with the watch case and subtly branded with our CROFT crest.

Our leather watch straps come with quick-release pins, allowing you to change the strap colour in less than 5 seconds, giving the watch a whole new character.

Reward 1 - Extra Leather Strap

Order an extra genuine leather strap for your new watch. All leather straps have a quick-release pin which allows you to change the style of your watch in seconds. Saving up to 33% off the retail price!

Reward 2 - Super Early Bird (Limited to only 100 watches)

Our cheapest watch reward! As a thank you for getting onboard and supporting us so early into the campaign, we are offering 100 watches with almost 40% off retail price. Comes with the unique "FOUNDER'S EDITION" "1 OF 300" engraved casebacks. With this reward you can choose any one of our Richmond watches, in any colour combination you would like. 

Reward 3 - The First Batch (Limited to only 50 watches)

With this reward you get one Richmond matt black watch, with white dial and shiny black leather band. What makes this reward unique is that it is one of 100 pre-production watches we had commissioned to ensure the production watch had the same quality as the prototypes. However after rigorous testing, tweaking and modifications, we only have 50 left to give to you.

There are a few differences with this watch compared to the production watch; a shiny leather rather than a matt leather, the date wheel is in English/Chinese rather than English/French, and the crystal does not have anti-reflective coating. To mark the importance of this watch in our development and achieving the final design we have today, each watch is engraved on the back with "THE FIRST BATCH" and "1 OF 100".

Reward 4 - Early Kickstarter (Limited to only 100 watches)

With this reward you can choose any one of our Richmond watches, in any colour combination you would like. Comes with the unique "FOUNDER'S EDITION" "1 OF 300" engraved casebacks. This reward is limited to only 250 watches and is almost 27% off rrp.

Reward 5 - Kickstarter Single

With this reward you can choose any one of our Richmond watches, in any colour combination you would like.

Reward 6 - Early Bird Double (Limited to 125 orders)

With this reward you can choose any two of our Richmond watches, in any colour combinations you would like. Comes with the unique "FOUNDER'S EDITION" "1 OF 300" engraved casebacks. This reward is limited to only 125 orders and is almost 29% off rrp.

Reward 7 - Kickstarter Double

With this reward you can choose any two of our Richmond watches, in any colour combinations you would like. This reward is limited to only 125 orders and a saving of 23% off rrp.

Reward 8 - The Collection

With this reward you get all four Richmond watches at a huge 31% off rrp. If we hit any of our stretch goals, you'll have the option to change the colour combinations to any new colours that may become available. 

The full retail price for the Richmond will be £95/$130. We will not be selling the Richmond at retail until all Kickstarter rewards have been shipped.

Upon the conclusion of the Kickstarter campaign we will be sending out a survey, where you can confirm your colour choices, as well as confirm your shipping address and any other relevant details.

Stretch Goals

If we are successful in raising our funding goal we will announce the first of our stretch goals at the top of our campaign page.

International Shipping

CROFT Watches ships worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen.

Please note you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

Estimated Delivery

We will be fulfilling "The First Batch" rewards as early as the end of May! All other rewards we expect to deliver in September, whilst we do not expect this deadline to move, it is possible that the estimated shipment month may shift.

Warranty

We stand firmly behind our products. All CROFT Watches include a 1 year limited warranty. For more information, please see https://www.croftwatches.com/pages/warranty.

Anything else

If at anytime you would like an update, please either check the ‘Updates’ section of our Kickstarter campaign, or feel free to email: info@croftwatches.com.

The company was formed by Shaun and Tord who crossed paths at university way back in 2007!

Shaun studied Product Design Engineering at university; he previously worked in automotive manufacturing and now works as an Investment Consultant, so designing, engineering and crunching the financials was a perfect challenge for him.

Tord currently heads up his own sports marketing agency that specialises in athlete management, content creation and marketing consulting within action sports, which placed him perfectly for forging CROFT Watches' marketing efforts outside the traditional techniques.

In addition to Shaun and Tord there is:

John @ TribeFirst - Crowdfunding consultant

Jamie and Sam - Product designers

Video Production - MotionFish Media Project

With our diverse backgrounds and experience, combined with our enthusiasm for watches, fashion and pushing the boundaries, we truly believe you'll love the Richmond.

Along with that, it has better hardness and scratch resistance compared to other alloy metals.MovementAt the heart of every CROFT Watch is a Japanese made Miyota movement - the same movement many luxury watchmakers use. Why these rewards you ask? To really benefit from economies of scale with our manufacturers we need to place an order for 300 pieces with them. We wanted to remind you that the watch you purchased got CROFT Watches off the ground and into production.In the “First Batch” reward (reward No.3), we have engraved it specifically with “THE FIRST BATCH" and "1 of 100” to give you that unique product that you treasure forever.DialThe dial is the most important part of the watch - how else will you tell the time?! At CROFT Watches, we want to invite eyes to take a closer look and be excited by the stylish, minimalist design.The dial itself is made up of a thin metal plate, and then coated to provide the finish. The dial is then assembled with the colour matched steel markers, which requires precision tooling to place them accurately in their correct positions. StrapsEvery watch needs a strap and the quality of this is essential because an uncomfortable strap, is an uncomfortable watch.Every CROFT Watch uses 100% genuine cowhide leather straps that provide amazing comfort and longevity. Along with this, we have specially designed the buckle to be exactly the right size for the watch and have made them from 316L stainless steel, colour matched with the watch case and subtly branded with our CROFT crest.Our leather watch straps come with quick-release pins, allowing you to change the strap colour in less than 5 seconds, giving the watch a whole new character.Reward 1 - Extra Leather StrapOrder an extra genuine leather strap for your new watch. All leather straps have a quick-release pin which allows you to change the style of your watch in seconds. Saving up to 33% off the retail price!Reward 2 - Super Early Bird (Limited to only 100 watches)Our cheapest watch reward! As a thank you for getting onboard and supporting us so early into the campaign, we are offering 100 watches with almost 40% off retail price. Comes with the unique "FOUNDER'S EDITION" "1 OF 300" engraved casebacks. With this reward you can choose any one of our Richmond watches, in any colour combination you would like. Reward 3 - The First Batch (Limited to only 50 watches)With this reward you get one Richmond matt black watch, with white dial and shiny black leather band. What makes this reward unique is that it is one of 100 pre-production watches we had commissioned to ensure the production watch had the same quality as the prototypes. However after rigorous testing, tweaking and modifications, we only have 50 left to give to you.There are a few differences with this watch compared to the production watch; a shiny leather rather than a matt leather, the date wheel is in English/Chinese rather than English/French, and the crystal does not have anti-reflective coating. To mark the importance of this watch in our development and achieving the final design we have today, each watch is engraved on the back with "THE FIRST BATCH" and "1 OF 100".Reward 4 - Early Kickstarter (Limited to only 100 watches)With this reward you can choose any one of our Richmond watches, in any colour combination you would like. Comes with the unique "FOUNDER'S EDITION" "1 OF 300" engraved casebacks. This reward is limited to only 250 watches and is almost 27% off rrp.Reward 5 - Kickstarter SingleWith this reward you can choose any one of our Richmond watches, in any colour combination you would like.Reward 6 - Early Bird Double (Limited to 125 orders)With this reward you can choose any two of our Richmond watches, in any colour combinations you would like. Comes with the unique "FOUNDER'S EDITION" "1 OF 300" engraved casebacks. This reward is limited to only 125 orders and is almost 29% off rrp.Reward 7 - Kickstarter DoubleWith this reward you can choose any two of our Richmond watches, in any colour combinations you would like. This reward is limited to only 125 orders and a saving of 23% off rrp.Reward 8 - The CollectionWith this reward you get all four Richmond watches at a huge 31% off rrp. If we hit any of our stretch goals, you'll have the option to change the colour combinations to any new colours that may become available. The full retail price for the Richmond will be £95/$130. We will not be selling the Richmond at retail until all Kickstarter rewards have been shipped.Upon the conclusion of the Kickstarter campaign we will be sending out a survey, where you can confirm your colour choices, as well as confirm your shipping address and any other relevant details.Stretch GoalsIf we are successful in raising our funding goal we will announce the first of our stretch goals at the top of our campaign page.International ShippingCROFT Watches ships worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen.Please note you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.Estimated DeliveryWe will be fulfilling "The First Batch" rewards as early as the end of May! All other rewards we expect to deliver in September, whilst we do not expect this deadline to move, it is possible that the estimated shipment month may shift.WarrantyWe stand firmly behind our products. All CROFT Watches include a 1 year limited warranty. For more information, please see https://www.croftwatches.com/pages/warranty.Anything elseIf at anytime you would like an update, please either check the ‘Updates’ section of our Kickstarter campaign, or feel free to email: info@croftwatches.com.The company was formed by Shaun and Tord who crossed paths at university way back in 2007!Shaun studied Product Design Engineering at university; he previously worked in automotive manufacturing and now works as an Investment Consultant, so designing, engineering and crunching the financials was a perfect challenge for him.Tord currently heads up his own sports marketing agency that specialises in athlete management, content creation and marketing consulting within action sports, which placed him perfectly for forging CROFT Watches' marketing efforts outside the traditional techniques.In addition to Shaun and Tord there is:John @ TribeFirst - Crowdfunding consultantJamie and Sam - Product designersVideo Production - MotionFish Media ProjectWith our diverse backgrounds and experience, combined with our enthusiasm for watches, fashion and pushing the boundaries, we truly believe you'll love the Richmond.

story:
Oz'Lester "la fashion boutique" is my dream .

The purpose is to connect and create a consciousness in association of design and fashion.

 "Eco-animal", eco-friendly material, handmade, colorful and customizedbags, enhancing your style. 




Why ?

One morning i woke up with this crazy idea: " Why we cannot put together fashion design and help for a cause?" 

After much surveys and studies, i found out that we definitely CAN.

Living in india since almost 8 years i have discovered the beautiful country and beauty in its people. This has inspired me to do something different to help and elevate the cousciousness of people to contribute in preservation of our precious planet.

That WHY i'am here.



How ?

OZ'Lester design will create fashion bags and accesories for Woman and Men providing employment to Rural Indian Women,  for better living.  All the products will be handamde and can be cutomized to suit your unique style.

 2% of its sales will go to WWF for the protection of our wildlife forest.



All the products will be in non leather.( to save animal )

Goal: 

-Open "La fashion Boutique"

-Provide you with unique design, handmade, stylish and colorful.

-contribute in protecting our planet

-Provide employement to women

-And make you smile

where will your contributuion go?

-To rent a space for "La Fashion Boutique"

-Investe on two singer Machine and furniture for "La Fashion Boutique"

-Purchase of non leather Eco-friendly fabric.

-Create Website "La Fashion Boutique"

-To start the production 


-And finally the Grand Opening :)

But that is only the PART I of my project,  because there is so much more we can do, to make living, to give one, by being eco friendly and yet without compromising on our need of style and uniqueness. 


Oz'lester will make the difference.

story:
Hi everyone!

My name is Annie, I am a 26 years old french girl,  wishing to make my life extraordinary!


I just moved to Melbourne from France a month ago, and I have a great idea for a great project!... but I am going to need your help to make it happen.

The idea is to create the very first fashion truck of Melbourne.


A fashion truck is basically a moving version of a fashion store. Easy! :)

In the truck, I am going to be selling vintage clothing and accessories made by local designers. I find it very interesting to bring vintage clothing into modern style, and to mix it with unique accessories! I really want for the truck to have its unique style!


The truck will then be moving to any kind of event where it is relevant for it to be seen: vintage market, music festivals, parks... 


You can see it as a new selling method:  it is no longer the customer that goes to the store, but the store that comes to the customer.

Once the truck is launched, I would also like to do partnerships with other brands that could be related: have a nail day, a make-up day, a cupcake day... make everyday an exciting day!


In order to make it happen, I am going to need money to buy the truck, to change it into a fashion store, to decorate it, and finally, to buy the amazing clothes to put in it!!!

Thank you very much in advance for all your help :)


GOAL AND ACHIEVMENTS

In order to get the business started, I am going to need $15,000. This money will be used to buy the truck, to change its inside and outside look and to buy the clothes.

I will also need some money to pay for the spots in the vintage markets or music festivals.

This project is very important and exciting to me!! I have been working in the fashion industry for the last few years, but  I really want to start something new, to work on a project that makes sense to me, to do my own fashion!

Plus, this fashion truck will be the very first one in Melbourne! The truck trend is very big all over the world at the moment, so I want to jump in and be part of this adventure!


Your Impact

The big advantage with that project is that the financial investment is not huge. I really only need enough money to buy the truck and modify it into a store. There will be no monthly rent, and no other major investment.

But I will not be able to do it without your help.

I moved to Melbourne to change my life and to prove to myself that I am able to go through with my personal project. I need your help for the first push! :)

Your contribution might change my life...

Let the adventure begin :)



Get In Touch

For more information, or for any other enquiry, please feel free to get in touch: 

https://www.facebook.com/todayfashiontruck

todayfashiontruck@gmail.com

story:
Who am I?

My name is Amiel Maquilan and musically known as Summer Breeze. I'm a 23 year old singer, songwriter, and guitarist for Legaci (Justin Bieber's backup singers), Erin Paula, Michelle Martinez, and Jayne Rio.

I've been a musician since 2005 and I'm loving it! I started posting music on Myspace and then eventually carried my music onto Youtube in 2006. By posting my music on these 2 websites, I was fortunate to build fan bases all over the world and was able to accumulate 22,000 subscribers on Youtube. 

I'm very blessed that God has giving me this gift of music to share with each and every one of you out there. 


What am I trying to make?

As a musician, I think my music isn't complete without merchandise. So, I'm planning on making Summer Breeze clothing. These clothes will be more on the urban/hip-hop style shirts. I'm designing something fresh and clean so all your friends will be jealous when you wear one. With these clothes, it'll also give you something to wear in public to show your support for my music. Many of you (if you have me on Facebook) have requested Summer Breeze shirts for the longest time! I didn't want to make shirts at that time because I thought I couldn't do it. But thanks to people on Facebook, I've thought it over and decided to go for it!


Here's where I'm going to need YOUR help!

By making t-shirts, it takes money. Now, this is the part where I need your help. Throughout my music career, I've struggled with a lot of payments for my tuition for school, credit card bills, and spending money to pay for my studio. It's really hard when it comes to providing for myself in this type of career. It's always been my dream in high school to start a clothing line. This is my time to shine and to fulfill that dream that I had in high school.

Your donations will be spent to:
*pay the designer
*pay for the shirts
*pay for the printing
*pay for the shipments

So I ask you to PLEASE donate as much as your heart desires. You get cool prizes for each level of donation you make. Cool prizes from music downloads, albums, skype calls, Summer Breeze clothes, singing voicemails, Youtube shout-outs, and more! 

I don't really ask much from my supporters but I hope you can support this project. Every dollar counts! And if you cannot donate for whatever reason, please share this project and link with all your friends on Facebook, Twitter, and Tumblr. I would greatly appreciate it! 



Thank you and God bless,
Amiel "Summer Breeze" Maquilan

story:
SOLZ' solar-powered bags (first launched in a crowdfunding campaign just like this!) have been our most popular products. Now, we are excited for this new line that features our strongest and most functional, feature-filled backpack ever, taking into account all of the feedback and wishes of our backers, customers and friends -- as well as a long-awaited and (much requested) messenger bag. They both feature a 6.5volt high-efficiency solar panel and can directly charge phones, tablets (or anything that can be charged by USB) in sunlight, or be used with virtually any powerbank to store energy for when you need it. We also have added a small (but just as powerful) foldable solar panel which can attach to just about anything, including our brand new, lightweight “AnywhereChair”, made to fold up in it’s own small carrying pouch and fit inside all of our bags.  Why tell you when we can show you: 

Our prototypes are all finalized, tested and ready for production now. We are asking for your support in this campaign so that we can reach the minimum orders necessary to get them in stock and price them competitively. What this means for you as a backer is that the common campaign guessing game and wait time for delivery can be avoided. We won't run into endless backups with product finalization or production. We can make the order the day the campaign is closed and funds released. That means we will be ordering in early April and likely shipping out in May. It also means we are confident that all backers should receive their products before the start of summer. (Trust us, you will want them for summer!) As a thank you (and incentive) for helping us meet the minimum order quantities, we are offering our new products as perks for the chance to be the first to have them - and at prices that are SIGNIFICANTLY below retail. We hope you join us as a critical part of bringing these cool products to market - and hope you feel you a part of the brand and company going forward. And of course, as we say at SOLZ, we hope you “Never Stop Shining™”.

A bit more About SOLZ, Inc:

SOLZ is a designer and manufacturer of “Functional Fashion for Active Lifestyles.” Launched by Brad Carrick in 2010 right out of business school, he manages all aspects of the business from product creation to financing, legal, marketing and distribution. SOLZ was funded entirely with three crowd-funding campaigns – all averaging over 200% of their funding goals. In 2012, SOLZ’ popular solar powered backpacks led them to win Designer of the Year honors in the San Francisco Fashion Awards, followed up in 2013 with Eco-Design of The Year. SOLZ' brand-new 2018 collection was unveiled this year at CES in Las Vegas and is set to debut in San Francisco this spring at FASH TECH™ 2018. 

We also do wholesale orders, white label and co-branded bulk orders.  Please contact us to discuss more...

story:
GemPhones are necklace earphones that celebrate what happens when technology and fashion collide. We are creating the new look of sound.

GemPhones: The Styles




Fashion, Meet Function.

GemPhones are fashion, music, and conversation all wrapped in one stylish package. Whether racing to class, strutting around town, or just lounging at home, you can rest assured that you’ll always look great and feel connected with GemPhones. Our beaded necklaces serve as fully-functioning earphones and microphones – allowing you to listen to music wherever you are and chat with friends on the go. GemPhones were made with our tech-centered generation in mind.

Each pair of GemPhones includes a magnetic clasp that allows you to quickly and easily secure or remove your necklace. The beads are tangle-proof. Plus, each pair includes three sizes of earbuds to guarantee a snug fit as you set out to conquer your day.

Wear it like a necklace.

A Gem of An Idea

Your clothing, shoes, jewelry, and even your hairstyle are used to express who you are to the outside world. Now, GemPhones can add to your stylish byline, communicating a unique story that sets you apart from the crowd. We’ve designed a small handful of beautiful Gemphones for our first edition. This collection was designed to complement every personality. We look forward to releasing more collections and some of our more daring designs in the near future.


Your Life, Your Style, Your GemPhones

Did you know that GemPhones can be customized to be a true representation of you? Show your school spirit with customized GemPhones on Game Day. Or, represent your sorority with coordinating colors. Do you support a great cause? Customize your GemPhones to promote the cancer organization or other awareness group of your choice. Whatever you decide, our GemPhones can be designed with colors and materials to reflect you.

Great Sound Quality and Noise Cancelling Features

How Do GemPhones Work?

GemPhones are compatible with any mobile or audio device that has a standard 3.5mm jack (all major phones and MP3 devices have this). Simply, insert the GemPhones’ plug into the jack for playback.

To wear GemPhones, open the necklace by releasing the small magnetic clasp, place the two ends around opposite sides of your neck (like any ordinary necklace), and reconnect the magnetic clasp. The earbuds can hang discreetly behind your back or add flair to your necklace by hanging over your shoulders. Just place the earbuds in your ears when ready to use your GemPhones.

Here’s a little information about the earbuds we use for our GemPhones:

• Built-in Microphone

• Two button remote to answer/end calls or play/stop music

• Replaceable silicone earbud covers

• CE and RoHS Compliant

• Great Sound and Audio Driver Quality

• Cord Length: 1.2m

• Jack Size: 3.5mm


Our Progress

We’ve been working on our GemPhones design and functionality for over a year. We have a functioning prototype and a patent pending. We’re currently in a Memphis-based accelerator for women in technology and are proud of the traction, publicity, and interest we’ve received thus far.

Now, we need your support.

With your commitment to our Indiegogo campaign, we’ll be able to introduce the new look of sound to the world. Specifically, your contribution will help fund:

- Manufacturing tooling and equipment October 2013

- Production and shipments by November 2013

- Product Packaging by November 2013

- Global UL and Bluetooth certifications Spring 2014


The Perks

$5 Or More

“Thank You From GemPhones.” Every dollar donated gets us closer to our goal of introducing the new look of sound to the world. To show our appreciation, we’ll shout you out on Twitter and Facebook and include your name and/or website on our website’s thank you page.

$15 Or More

“GemPhones Phone Holder” Receive a new phone holder featuring the GemPhones logo when you donate $15 or more. Plus a “Thank You From GemPhones.”

$25 Or More

“Early Bird Exclusive Standard GemPhones” The first 50 backers at this tier receive a pair of standard GemPhones in our signed package featuring the 1st Edition Seal. Choose between our white, grey, or wooden styles. Plus, you receive a “Thank You From GemPhones” and a “GemPhones Phone Holder.”

$35 Or More

“Standard GemPhones” Here’s your chance to be among the owners of the 1st Edition of GemPhones. Our Standard GemPhones are delivered in our signed package featuring the 1st Edition seal and you can choose between white, grey, or wooden. Plus, you’ll receive a “Thank You From GemPhones” and a “GemPhones Phone Holder.”

$75 Or More

“Designer GemPhones” Here’s your first chance to customize our GemPhones. Your designer GemPhones come in white, grey, or wooden beads and can be paired with silver or gold accents. Plus, backers receive a “GemPhones Phone Case,” a “GemPhones Phone Holder” and a “Thank You From GemPhones.” (Case options available for iPhone 4s/5, Samsung Galaxy S4, and HTC One X/ One X+. Designer GemPhones come in signed package featuring 1st Edition seal.)


$120 Or More

“GemPhones Quad Set” Wow! What a deal! Receive 4 pairs of Standard GemPhones (available in white, grey, or wooden). GemPhones come in our signed package which features our 1st Edition seal. You will also receive a “GemPhones Phone Case,” a “GemPhones Phone Holder,” and a “Thank You From GemPhones.”

$225 Or More

“GemPhones Holiday Set” Knock out your holiday shopping with just one purchase from GemPhones. This set includes EIGHT (8) Standard GemPhones (in any combination of white, grey, or wooden). All GemPhones are delivered in our signed package that features the 1st Edition seal. Plus, you will receive a “GemPhones Phone Case,” a “GemPhones Phone Holder,” and a “Thank You From GemPhones.”

$400 Or More

“Custom GemPhones” Thank YOU for showing so much support to GemPhones. You will receive 10 pairs of completely CUSTOM GemPhones. Select any combination of three colors (white, blue, red, pink, purple, green, black, silver, orange, and gold) and we’ll create GemPhones that promote your school pride, sorority, or organization you support Along with your 10 pairs of GemPhones, you’ll also receive a “GemPhones Phone Case,” a “GemPhones Phone Holder,” and a “Thank You From GemPhones.” To show that we REALLY, REALLY do appreciate your support, we’d like to also present a personalized Thank You video to you and the organization you’d like us to shout out.

$1,000 Or More

“Rock Star GemPhones” YOU are a Rock Star that deserves ROCK STAR GemPhones. You will receive 2 pairs of completely premium rock star GemPhones. Work with our in house designer to create the GemPhones of your dream. Select from our finest jewelry collection such as: freshwater pearls, gems, Swarovski crystals, rhinestones, and precious metals.  Along with your 2 pairs of GemPhones, you’ll also receive two (2) "Custom GemPhones Phone Cases" (inspired by you, designed by us), a “GemPhones Phone Holder,” a “Thank You From GemPhones" and "A personalized Thank You video" to you. You will be the ONLY one with these ROCK STAR GemPhones in the WORLD!

Big Thanks To:

Photography by Demarcus Bowser Photography

Video produced and directed by: Lauren Squires of Scribbles Production

Soloist Evvie McKinney Instagram @evvie_music

Models: Sharhea, Hillary, and Al
story_txt:
GemPhones are necklace earphones that celebrate what happens when 
technology and fashion collide. We are creating the new look of sound.
GemPhones: The Styles 




Fashion, Meet Function.
GemPhones are fashion, music, and conversation all wrapped in one stylish package.
 Whether racing to class, strutting around town, or just lounging at 
home, you can rest assured that you’ll always look great and feel 
connected with GemPhones. Our beaded necklaces serve as 
fully-functioning earphones and microphones – allowing you to listen to 
music wherever you are and chat with friends on the go.    GemPhones 
were made with our tech-centered generation in mind. 
Each pair of
 GemPhones includes a magnetic clasp that allows you to quickly and 
easily secure or remove your necklace. The beads are tangle-proof. Plus,
 each pair includes three sizes of earbuds to guarantee a snug fit as 
you set out to conquer your day. 

Wear it like a necklace.

A Gem of An Idea






Your clothing, shoes, jewelry, and even your hairstyle are used to 
express who you are to the outside world. Now, GemPhones can add to your
 stylish byline, communicating a unique story that sets you apart from 
the crowd.
We’ve designed a small handful of beautiful Gemphones for our first 
edition. This collection was designed to complement every personality. 
We look forward to releasing more collections and some of our more 
daring designs in the near future. 



Your Life, Your Style, Your GemPhones 
Did you know 
that GemPhones can be customized to be a true representation of you? 
Show your school spirit with customized GemPhones on Game Day. Or, 
represent your sorority with coordinating colors. Do you support a great
 cause? Customize your GemPhones to promote the cancer organization or 
other awareness group of your choice. 
Whatever you decide, our GemPhones can be designed with colors and 
materials to reflect you. 

Great Sound Quality and Noise Cancelling Features

How Do GemPhones Work? 
GemPhones are compatible with any 
mobile or audio device that has a standard 3.5mm jack (all major phones 
and MP3 devices have this). Simply, insert the GemPhones’ plug into the 
jack for playback. 
To wear GemPhones, open the necklace by 
releasing the small magnetic clasp, place the two ends around opposite 
sides of your neck (like any ordinary necklace), and reconnect the 
magnetic clasp. The earbuds can hang discreetly behind your back or add 
flair to your necklace by hanging over your shoulders. Just place the 
earbuds in your ears when ready to use your GemPhones. 
Here’s a little information about the earbuds we use for our GemPhones:
•	Built-in Microphone 
•	Two button remote to answer/end calls or play/stop music 
•	Replaceable silicone earbud covers 
•	CE and RoHS Compliant 
•	Great Sound and Audio Driver Quality 
•	Cord Length: 1.2m 
•	Jack Size: 3.5mm 



Our Progress
We’ve been working on our GemPhones design 
and functionality for over a year. We have a functioning prototype and a
 patent pending. We’re currently in a Memphis-based accelerator for 
women in technology and are proud of the traction, publicity, and 
interest we’ve received thus far. 
Now, we need your support. 
With
 your commitment to our Indiegogo campaign, we’ll be able to introduce
 the new look of sound to the world. Specifically, your contribution 
will help fund: 
- Manufacturing tooling and equipment October 2013

- Production and shipments by November 2013
- Product Packaging by November 2013
- Global UL and Bluetooth certifications Spring 2014



The Perks 
$5 Or More 
“Thank
 You From GemPhones.” Every dollar donated gets us closer to our goal of
 introducing the new look of sound to the world. To show our 
appreciation, we’ll shout you out on Twitter and Facebook and include 
your name and/or website on our website’s thank you page. 
$15 Or More 
“GemPhones
 Phone Holder” Receive a new phone holder featuring the GemPhones logo 
when you donate $15 or more. Plus a “Thank You From GemPhones.” 
$25 Or More 
“Early
 Bird Exclusive Standard GemPhones” The first 50 backers at this tier 
receive a pair of standard GemPhones in our signed package featuring the
 1st Edition Seal. Choose between our white, grey, or wooden styles. 
Plus, you receive a “Thank You From GemPhones” and a “GemPhones Phone 
Holder.” 
$35 Or More 
“Standard GemPhones” Here’s 
your chance to be among the owners of the 1st Edition of GemPhones. Our 
Standard GemPhones are delivered in our signed package featuring the 1st
 Edition seal and you can choose between white, grey, or wooden. Plus, 
you’ll receive a “Thank You From GemPhones” and a “GemPhones Phone 
Holder.” 

$75 Or More 
“Designer GemPhones” Here’s your first chance
 to customize our GemPhones. Your designer GemPhones come in white, 
grey, or wooden beads and can be paired with silver or gold accents. 
Plus, backers receive a “GemPhones Phone Case,” a “GemPhones Phone 
Holder” and a “Thank You From GemPhones.” (Case options available for 
iPhone 4s/5, Samsung Galaxy S4, and HTC One X/ One X+. Designer 
GemPhones come in signed package featuring 1st Edition seal.) 


$120 Or More 
“GemPhones
 Quad Set” Wow! What a deal! Receive 4 pairs of Standard GemPhones 
(available in white, grey, or wooden). GemPhones come in our signed 
package which features our 1st Edition seal. You will also receive a 
“GemPhones Phone Case,” a “GemPhones Phone Holder,” and a “Thank You 
From GemPhones.” 
$225 Or More 
“GemPhones Holiday 
Set” Knock out your holiday shopping with just one purchase from 
GemPhones. This set includes EIGHT (8) Standard GemPhones (in any 
combination of white, grey, or wooden). All GemPhones are delivered in 
our signed package that features the 1st Edition seal. Plus, you will 
receive a “GemPhones Phone Case,” a “GemPhones Phone Holder,” and a 
“Thank You From GemPhones.” 
$400 Or More 
“Custom 
GemPhones” Thank YOU for showing so much support to GemPhones. You will 
receive 10 pairs of completely CUSTOM GemPhones. Select any combination 
of three colors (white, blue, red, pink, purple, green, black, silver, 
orange, and gold) and we’ll create GemPhones that promote your school 
pride, sorority, or organization you support Along with your 10 pairs of
 GemPhones, you’ll also receive a “GemPhones Phone Case,” a “GemPhones 
Phone Holder,” and a “Thank You From GemPhones.” To show that we REALLY,
 REALLY do appreciate your support, we’d like to also present a 
personalized Thank You video to you and the organization you’d like us 
to shout out. 
$1,000 Or More
“Rock Star GemPhones” 
YOU are a Rock Star that deserves ROCK STAR GemPhones. You will receive 2
 pairs of completely premium rock star GemPhones. Work with our in house
 designer to create the GemPhones of your dream. Select from our finest 
jewelry collection such as: freshwater pearls, gems, Swarovski crystals,
 rhinestones, and precious metals.  Along with your 2 pairs of 
GemPhones, you’ll also receive two (2) "Custom GemPhones Phone Cases" 
(inspired by you, designed by us), a “GemPhones Phone Holder,” a “Thank 
You From GemPhones" and "A personalized Thank You video" to you. You 
will be the ONLY one with these ROCK STAR GemPhones in the WORLD!

Photography by Demarcus Bowser Photography
Video produced and directed by: Lauren Squires of Scribbles Production
Soloist Evvie McKinney Instagram @evvie_music

story:
MiraCor Diffusion™ Science has solved the age-old problem of sweat! MiraCor achievements provide unequaled dryness next to the skin!

MiraCor group is a global fiber and fabric innovation company committed to finally resolving the age-old problem of SWEAT! MiraCor is Charting a New Course for comfortably dry activewear and intimate apparel. This event is one of global importance and will provide Comfort and Health to all who participate, as well as to our Wounded Heroes. As an affiliate with MiraCor group, you will help to bring MiraCor fiber and fabric achievements to all humanity and help to restore the U.S. apparel and activewear Industry production to U.S. shores. We created this crowd funding project to allow YOU to be among the first to facilitate production and enjoy MiraCor Diffusion™ Activewear.  MiraCor sends liberal perks at each pledge level.

story:
Short description

Katinka Saltzman is a German fashion-designer based in Milan. Her sense for beauty and style was defined at a very young age. Growing up she spent all the summers in Italy and this animated her to design with allure and a strong sense of colours and proportions. Geometric figures in nature are the first source of inspiration. At the age of 22 she was trained as a tailor, in the first half of the 2000s she studied fashion design in Berlin, in the second half of the 2000s she worked in Milan for ready-to-wear brands, from 2010 until today Katinka works on her own and develops her brand, with little capsule collections of shoes, bags and fashion jewelleries.  They are and will all be ‘Made in Italy’ with a lot of enthusiasm and vital energy. To make people happy is wonderful. By donating you will help Katinka to realize her dream and to do the next step. Helping her, you will help Italian entrepreneurs and craftsman, potential clients and yourself, to live a better life.Therefore, our philosophy is simple but ambitious. Be individual in what you like and sustain others to realize their dreams!

Website Katinka Saltzmann


What we need & What you get

The fashion field has the following costs: research, materials, tools, machines, manual work, advertising, marketing, keeping us in health for having excellent ideas and for putting this ideas on the paper and for realizing them in 3D. The costs are divided in three parts. The first goal is the category  fashion jewelleries, the second the realization of a micro shoes collection and the third would be the addition of bags. So in this moment we want to get worked out the fashion jewelleries business. When this is built up strong we will introduce shoes and bags. Any single Euro will help us to come closer to our dream.  Here's a calculation:

Do not hesitate to be curious about your perk, your precious gift, it will put a smile on your face, because you get this very special treatment and will keep us positively in mind. Thank you by heart!

The Impact

The idea to launch a label is like a natural reaction to the mass market phenomenon. In this fast world we wish to calm down sometimes and to focus on values. To build own spaces of creative activity helps the social life of our community. The value of this brand consists in the time we invest to produce the products. We are talking about handcrafted pieces made of precious materials like silk, leather or crystals, every single step of the production is ‘Made in Italy’. All small companies are important for the culture of a country. It is nice to create an independent story with conscious people. Katinka is a professional. In her past she participated with her shoe designs at a  wonderful fashion show in Berlin sponsored by Mercedes Benz, she directed the projects of the accessories master class of an academy in Milan and she is experienced in hard ready-to-wear work, as a first assistant of creative directors in the fashion field of Milan. So step by step she will realize her vision and she would feel definitely grateful, if you could help her in this. Thank you by heart!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would love to help us but you are in difficulties, please take a breeze and just share the campaign in your social network, Indiegogo has the right tool, you can find it easily. Thank you by heart!

story:
Welcome and thank you for joining us!  Here’s your opportunity to make the world a better place for vulnerable women and children in desperate need of opportunity. 

 We are The Common Thread Collective, a non-profit organization rooted in Kapeeka, Uganda as a school with the goal of empowering women through teachings in the fashion trade alongside other necessary skills such as reading, math, and critical thinking.  At the CTC, we help to facilitate self-sustaining empowerment through skill-based personal development to lift women out of poverty, human trafficking, and prostitution.


I know you must be thinking---This is a huge undertaking!  While it is quite a challenge, through the experiences of our graduates we have seen that it’s possible!  Please join us in this selfless and oh so important journey.  


“In too many instances, the march to globalization has also meant the marginalization of women and girls. And that must change.” -- Hillary Clinton


The Impact

We are offering opportunities for Women to empower themselves through the development of creative job skills, emotional and mental growth, and basic education. 


Upon graduation of our program, students have the skills needed to start their own business or are offered dignified work with one of our product line partners where they earn fair wages and great benefits, work flexible hours, and participate in a positive community!




 We are supporting female survivors of rape, slavery, prostitution, and physical abuse.  We help provide the stability and support our students need to speak their truths, know their worth, and know that they can do great things with their lives.



They provide the courage and will, we provide the tools to help them succeed.  With the support of this campaign, we will expand our program in Kapeeka and solidify partnerships and plans in Gulu. 


                   



Our Beginning

Uganda is considered to be the Pearl of Africa, it is ripe in beauty, full of friendly people, and is the birthplace of the mighty Nile River that provides life to many in Eastern Africa. Hidden under the multitude of beautiful layers, however, is a tumultuous past that involves political skirmishes resulting in ethnic cleansing, genocide, abductions, forced servitude, and the complete eradication of entire villages.  Many villages of Uganda recently  saw almost 80% of their  people slaughtered as part of “population control” during The War of the Bush.   As a result, today women are often in  the position of picking up the financial pieces and many find themselves forced into prostitution, taking what they are told will be a well-paying job in the city. Even worse, they are often forced to take their children along, who then fall into the same tragic fate.


It was in one of these rural war torn villages named Kapeeka, at the end of the highway from Kampala, that we started working with seven women in a bullet-ridden schoolhouse. The women came to us as peasants who made roughly $10 a month. Most of them relied on digging and prostitution at the local army bases for income. The average age for a prostitute to start work in Kapeeka was a mere 8 years old. We were devastated. 

Our seven women quickly grew to 42 as word spread throughout the village and neighboring areas. We ran out of supplies and had women cutting up bed sheets or old cloth to take lessons, and women were coming in for one on one instruction as early as 5 am and sewing by gas lantern.


Our Program Today

We now have a waiting list of over 150 women to get into our program. In Kapeeka we operate a community center that runs classes in needlework, embroidery, patternmaking, tailoring, accessories design, fashion design, and hand and machine sewing, as well as Math, English, and Writing. The participants are provided with health care, sanitation classes, mentorship, and a financial coach to teach responsible approaches to money.


Our program attendees also have unlimited access to the community center where they can utilize our equipment and supplies to create and produce goods to sell in the local market. We provide our advanced students with a living stipend and cover the costs of their children’s education. The advanced students work with us to produce a simple line of tote bags and fabric purses that we sell to help fund our program. 

These bags cover around 8% of our total program expenses.  We also want to help bring transformation to the community at large, and to that end all of our fabrics come from female owned stalls in the Kampala market or are hand woven and dyed for us out of 100% organic Ugandan Cotton at a Kampala weaving cooperative for women with Aids.

              


The Common Thread Collective is not a business or product line.  It is a training center created as a means to support women and stop the cycle of trafficking, poverty, and violence through economic empowerment.


Our Future

 We have only just begun.  In 2016, we plan to extend our reach by opening our second location in the village of Gulu.  By opening a new state of the art training center in Gulu we will be able to form partnerships with the local fair trade fashion industry that exists there, enabling us to provide good jobs for our students upon program completion.  

Over the last two years we have been fortunate to have helped over 100 women lift themselves out of their undesirable positions through the CTC’s curriculum of self-sustaining life skills.  Although we are proud of our accomplishments, we’ve only just begun!  There are so many more women in need and we won’t rest until we try to help all of them.  

With your support, we can provide The Common Thread Collective with the means to reach its full potential!


What We Need

We need your support to help us expand enrollment in 2015 to give more women the opportunity to empower themselves.  To do this, we’re in need of money to support tuition related costs, additional equipment, supplies, and educators. 

Your support will allow us to:

  • Cover our Program Costs ($4,345 TOTAL) :

*Hire and Employ an On-site Program Director to administer the program and teach/build curriculum $1,200

*Hire two additional Part Time Classroom Teachers to teach and support the curriculum $1,200

*Hire full time security $725

*Hire additional Mentors (1 per every 10 students) $720

*Cover travel to market within Uganda $500

  • Cover the running of and upkeep our Compound ($4,915 TOTAL) :

*Hire a Groundskeeper and cover compound maintenance costs $715

*Utilities (electricity, water, internet, generator, gas) $4,200

  • Cover the costs of classroom materials($7,140 TOTAL) :

*additional sewing machines: $3,150

*raw material sewing supplies $3,140

*design classroom furniture: $450


Gifts for Giving

Support The Common Thread Collective during this crucial campaign at the different donation levels and enjoy one of the many perks we have to offer.  Some of the many things you may enjoy include:

Social Media Shout Outs

  • Colorful ‘gratitude’ tote bags

  • Recognition on our website

  • CTC Custom made ‘grounded’ loop rug

  • Hand Beaded ‘time for change’ coin purse

  • Hand embroidered clutch

  • Signed photo and thank you card

  • CTC’s ‘Recipes from Uganda’ cookbook

  • Colorful hand-made ‘empowerment’ apron

  • Messages of Empowerment Napkin Set

***Product Photos Below***




Why We Will Succeed

  • We know our program works. The proof is in our successful graduates

  • We have a strong team of board members that are committed to seeing growth of the organization

  • Our board members and volunteer staff have the business savvy and apparel industry experience to propel the program to the next level

  • For over two years, we have steadily gained support from Kapeeka and surrounding communities

  • Our founder (Jessica) has established connections with socially conscious clothing brands that will help us prepare and position our students for employment after their program completion

  • We have graduated over 100 students thus far with another 150+ on a wait list eager and waiting to get started with your help!


Our Challenges

Working in Uganda is a constant challenge!  Some of these challenges include:

  • Access to fabric and other sewing materials- Kampala is the closest city in which materials can be purchased, but it is still several hours away and the suppliers can be somewhat inconsistent.  We have developed relationships with market vendors to set aside supplies we need on a consistent basis so we can pick up what we need in Kampala on a set schedule.

  • Staying Safe- Kapeeka can be a dangerous place with looting from militia and rebel fighters and citizens praying on the weak out of desperation.  For this reason we have electric fences surrounding the compound perimeter and 24 hour security to keep our program students and staff safe.  Students and staff must feel safe and comfortable so they can focus and do the best work possible!

  • Fashion Design Teachers- Finding kind, well trained Fashion Design teachers that have the sensitivity to work with the girls and women, are motivated, are good communicators and who want to have a long term relationship and employment with the CTC.

  • Staying Healthy- Uganda is a difficult place to stay healthy, especially for westerners who are not accustomed to the bacteria and pollution.  Only 64% of Uganda has access to clean water with most rural locations having to walk over half a mile to access sites.  Disease-carrying mosquitos are also a constant problem in Uganda.  We take a number of measures on campus to ensure drinking water, food, and working conditions are clean, safe, and free from contamination.  Keeping our students healthy so they can be at their best is important to their development and overall well-being.

  • Keeping up with demand- We have an ever-growing wait list of students wanting to start our program but lack the money for additional machines, supplies, teachers, and food to increase enrollment.  By increasing our grant-writing and fundraising outreach we are tackling this problem head on.  This is where you come in!  

Our future students need your help!  


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word!  Please share our campaign!  Tell our story!  #commonthreadcampaign

  • Host a Common Thread Collective Fundraiser!

  • Volunteer with us!

Gifts for Giving Reference:

Below are photos of our gracious gifts to you for your many levels of support.  We will reach out to you after the campaign for details of your gift preferences.

Pictured: ‘Grounded’ Loop Rugs, ‘Empowerment’ Aprons, ‘Gratitude Tote Bag, ‘Time for Change’ Coin Purse


Domestic Shipping and International Shipping:

Do I have to pay for Domestic Shipping?  Domestic shipping costs are already included in your campaign contribution perks.

Where do I add money for international shipping?  When you select a contribution level, you’re prompted to enter in the total contribution amount just below.  This is for people who want international shipping only.

What if I forget to add international shipping?  After the project is funded and we’re ready to ship, we’ll contact each contributor with an international address.  If you didn’t add shipping when you contributed, you can add it then.


Special Thank You:

A special thank you to our dear friends and extended families whose support has made all this possible.  

  • Abigail Coleman

  • Keith Baker

  • Melissa Plondke

  • Felicia Snell

  • Lenny Myers

  • Dale & Sharon Wright

  • Amber Kersley

  • And all of you for your incredible support of The Common Thread Collective
