 We have only just begun.  In 2016, we plan to extend our reach by opening our second location in the village of Gulu.  By opening a new state of the art training center in Gulu we will be able to form partnerships with the local fair trade fashion industry that exists there, enabling us to provide good jobs for our students upon program completion.  
Over the last two years we have been fortunate to have helped over 100 women lift themselves out of their undesirable positions through the CTC’s curriculum of self-sustaining life skills.  Although we are proud of our accomplishments, we’ve only just begun!  There are so many more women in need and we won’t rest until we try to help all of them.  
With your support, we can provide The Common Thread Collective with the means to reach its full potential!

What We Need

We need your support to help us expand enrollment in 2015 to give more women the opportunity to empower themselves.  To do this, we’re in need of money to support tuition related costs, additional equipment, supplies, and educators. 




Your support will allow us to:


Cover our Program Costs ($4,345 TOTAL) :

*Hire and Employ an On-site Program Director to administer the program and teach/build curriculum $1,200
*Hire two additional Part Time Classroom Teachers to teach and support the curriculum $1,200 
*Hire full time security $725
*Hire additional Mentors (1 per every 10 students) $720
*Cover travel to market within Uganda $500
Cover the running of and upkeep our Compound ($4,915 TOTAL) :
*Hire a Groundskeeper and cover compound maintenance costs $715
*Utilities (electricity, water, internet, generator, gas) $4,200
Cover the costs of classroom materials($7,140 TOTAL) :
*additional sewing machines: $3,150
*raw material sewing supplies $3,140
*design classroom furniture: $450
Gifts for Giving
Support The Common Thread Collective during this crucial campaign at the different donation levels and enjoy one of the many perks we have to offer.  Some of the many things you may enjoy include:
Social Media Shout Outs

Colorful ‘gratitude’ tote bags 
Recognition on our website
CTC Custom made ‘grounded’ loop rug
Hand Beaded ‘time for change’ coin purse
Hand embroidered clutch
Signed photo and thank you card
CTC’s ‘Recipes from Uganda’ cookbook 
Colorful hand-made ‘empowerment’ apron
Messages of Empowerment Napkin Set

***Product Photos Below***







Why We Will Succeed

We know our program works. The proof is in our successful graduates
We have a strong team of board members that are committed to seeing growth of the organization
Our board members and volunteer staff have the business savvy and apparel industry experience to propel the program to the next level
For over two years, we have steadily gained support from Kapeeka and surrounding communities 
Our founder (Jessica) has established connections with socially conscious clothing brands that will help us prepare and position our students for employment after their program completion
We have graduated over 100 students thus far with another 150+ on a wait list eager and waiting to get started with your help!


Our Challenges
Working in Uganda is a constant challenge!  Some of these challenges include:

Access to fabric and other sewing materials- Kampala is the closest city in which materials can be purchased, but it is still several hours away and the suppliers can be somewhat inconsistent.  We have developed relationships with market vendors to set aside supplies we need on a consistent basis so we can pick up what we need in Kampala on a set schedule.
Staying Safe- Kapeeka can be a dangerous place with looting from militia and rebel fighters and citizens praying on the weak out of desperation.  For this reason we have electric fences surrounding the compound perimeter and 24 hour security to keep our program students and staff safe.  Students and staff must feel safe and comfortable so they can focus and do the best work possible!
Fashion Design Teachers- Finding kind, well trained Fashion Design teachers that have the sensitivity to work with the girls and women, are motivated, are good communicators and who want to have a long term relationship and employment with the CTC.
Staying Healthy- Uganda is a difficult place to stay healthy, especially for westerners who are not accustomed to the bacteria and pollution.  Only 64% of Uganda has access to clean water with most rural locations having to walk over half a mile to access sites.  Disease-carrying mosquitos are also a constant problem in Uganda.  We take a number of measures on campus to ensure drinking water, food, and working conditions are clean, safe, and free from contamination.  Keeping our students healthy so they can be at their best is important to their development and overall well-being. 
Keeping up with demand- We have an ever-growing wait list of students wanting to start our program but lack the money for additional machines, supplies, teachers, and food to increase enrollment.  By increasing our grant-writing and fundraising outreach we are tackling this problem head on.  This is where you come in!  

Our future students need your help!  
Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word!  Please share our campaign!  Tell our story!  #commonthreadcampaign
Host a Common Thread Collective Fundraiser!
Volunteer with us!

Gifts for Giving Reference:
Below are photos of our gracious gifts to you for your many levels of support.  We will reach out to you after the campaign for details of your gift preferences.
Pictured: ‘Grounded’ Loop Rugs, ‘Empowerment’ Aprons, ‘Gratitude Tote Bag, ‘Time for Change’ Coin Purse
Domestic Shipping and International Shipping:
Do I have to pay for Domestic Shipping?  Domestic shipping costs are already included in your campaign contribution perks.
Where do I add money for international shipping?  When you select a contribution level, you’re prompted to enter in the total contribution amount just below.  This is for people who want international shipping only.
What if I forget to add international shipping?  After the project is funded and we’re ready to ship, we’ll contact each contributor with an international address.  If you didn’t add shipping when you contributed, you can add it then.
Special Thank You:
A special thank you to our dear friends and extended families whose support has made all this possible.  

Abigail Coleman
Keith Baker
Melissa Plondke
Felicia Snell
Lenny Myers
Dale & Sharon Wright
Amber Kersley
And all of you for your incredible support of The Common Thread Collective

story:
Hi, Indiegogo people!

We were always soooo frustrated and irritated (as we believe you are too) when our earphones would get tangled in our pockets or bags. Imagine this: it's a beautiful day, you're in a great mood. You've just stepped out of your apartment and about to listen to a new album from your favorite band. You reach for your earphones and - of course! They're a complete mess. And then you're standing in a street for few minutes fighting the most complex knot known to men. Finally, when you're done untangling wires, you're not in such great mood anymore. OK, it is a first world problem, but it's still a problem :) And now we've come up with most practical and beautiful solution to your problem.

why knot? is special for its unique design because it's the simplest and fastest way of managing your earphones. It uses the simple logic: once your earphones are in it, it creates a closed loop. Once in that position, some strange but mathematically proven law disables them from getting tangled.
Suspicious? Try it at home: use a piece of tape to put earphones and mini jack together and see for yourself.

Now, what's so special about why knot?
Unlike similar products, it will stop your earphones from tangling, but also will prevent them from damaging. When you have to wrap them or fold them, you will cause damage over time, and you'll find yourself buying a new pair way sooner than you thought. And who wants to waste their money and change earphones like you do your underwear?

It's made out of a special kind of material - an extremely dense sponge, formed and processed by laser cutting - that allows it to be light, extremely durable, firm yet flexible thus making it ideal for a product like why knot? that needs to be simple to use, soft (so it doesn't damage your phone or mp3 player) and lasting.
The first batch of why knot? makes it available in 6 distinct and fun colors. Availability of more than 12 different colors is planned for the near future.
why knot? is a product designed with functionality and aesthetics in mind while the availability of different colors allows you to mix and match it to your outfit, cellphone or your mood! So choose the ones you like best or get all of them, and never worry about your earphones getting tangled again.

The best feature of why knot? is definitely it's fun, yet carefully devised design which make it extremely simple to use. All you need is two seconds and you're ready to go. The mini jack is placed in central hole, right above the why knot? stamp, where it can rest permanently (even when plugged into your phone or mp3 player). The two earphones are placed into the other two holes, which are especially designed as to allow you to simply and quickly remove them whenever you need them and place them back when you're done with your call or finished listening to your music.

What we need is a fund of 8500$ to make it happen. why knot? will be manufactured right here in Zagreb, Croatia by a local molder, so we'll be able to guarantee to our supporters around the world quality, great design and a product that will last. We will invest the funds into manufacturing the product and will immediately place the order for our production run. Also, while we want distribute why knot? at the lowest possible price, that's something we cannot do while we're still making prototypes. Once we gain funds we'll be able to do so.


We hope you like it, we really do :)


Thank you!

story:
We’re fighting to change that.

Meet the watch made from the world’s most valuable metal: Humanium Metal—forged from destructed illegal firearms to stand for change, not status.

TRIWA X Humanium Metal 2.0 is the next step in our mission to shine a light on the gun violence epidemic.

It all began about three years ago when we partnered with the non-profit organization, IM, Swedish Development Partner. Through your support and IM’s illegal firearms destruction program, we were able to launch the first-ever TRIWA X Humanium Metal Watch on Kickstarter.

Now, we’re back with a bigger humanitarian goal than ever.

Meet TRIWA X Humanium Metal 2.0:

Forged from Humanium Metals of illegal firearms, stamped with the symbolic Humanium Metal logo, bold and sophisticated in slate grey steel with fiery red accents.

Telling a new story of hope for a country where one out of every 1,000 residents will die as a result of gun violence.

It’s time for peace.   

 

In 2015, El Salvador was considered the world’s most deadly country outside a war zone. The homicide rate was epidemic, and nearly 80% of crimes were being committed with illegal firearms. The cost of this violence wasn’t limited to human life, with staggering social and economic consequences hanging in the balance. When you wear a TRIWA X Humanium Metal 2.0 watch, you become part of the journey to change all this. The destructed firearm on your wrist is not only a firearm that can never again be used for harm but a way to infuse hope back into conflict-torn communities. Thanks to our nonprofit partner, IM, directly benefits the society from which the firearms were originally collected and supports the victims of armed violence.

THIS is a watch you can be proud to wear.

With our TRIWA X Humanium Metal 2.0 collection, we’re elevating our designs to a new level of subtlety and sophistication. Every watch comes with a certificate of authenticity, an exclusively made box, and elements of artisan craftsmanship that we firmly believe are second-to-none.

Meet Hu39 Chrono

Proven to be a robust and accurate timekeeper, the HU39 Chrono comes with Citizen-Miyota JS00 chronograph movement, a 30 min/sec stopwatch function, and 24-hour time tracking. Artisan details include a molded Humanium Metal case stamped with the Humanium Metal logo and three stamped out mini dials with matching indexes and a circular brushed finish. The hour, minute and chronograph hands are all luminous in light green, while the second hand comes in our characteristic signal red with two polished pushers as a contrast to the matte brushed case. The crown is made with the same pattern as a revolver chamber, with a signal red navel.

Available in two color/finish options: Slate grey or classic.  

 

Meet Hu39 Automatic Slate

Made for watch connoisseurs and finished in slate grey Humanium Metal, the HU39 Automatic Slate features 24 jewels, Miyota automatic movement and 48-hour running time. The movement is covered with a stainless steel backplate to make it durable and water-resistant. This statement piece is made to last for generations.

The flagship Humanium Metal weapons destruction program was initiated in November 2016 in El Salvador. In cooperation with Salvadoran authorities, IM produced 1.5 tons of Humanium Metal. Since then, the program has been directly involved in the removal and destruction of thousands of illegal firearms.

TRIWA X Humanium Metal is an extension of this program, contributing to the demand for Humanium Metal while raising funds for anti-violence initiatives.

After our first campaign in 2018, IM was able to melt down almost 1,500 illegal firearms (4,500  in total). Our flagship Humanium Metal Watch is now part of the UNs permanent exhibition of disarmament.

With TRIWA X Humanium Metal 2.0, we hope to make an even bigger impact.

More destructed illegal weapons, more anti-violence funding. More PEACE.

In 2018, the world rallied behind our cause. Later that same year, we were proud to be able to ship our first ever batch of Humanium Metal watches to backers around the world. The response was amazing, to say the least.

We are a Swedish watch and accessory brand, founded in 2007 by four friends: Harald, Tobias, Didrik, and Ludvig. Our goal is to transform the watch industry through innovation, creativity, and design. Our name “TRIWA” is an acronym for “Transforming the Industry of Watches.” We are also proud to be the Stockholm city timekeeper with 34 clocks around the city!

Without our connection to IM, the TRIWA X Humanium Metal Watch wouldn’t exist—so we’d like to take a moment to introduce them and their powerful mission:

IM, Swedish Development Partner

IM sees and reacts to injustice in the world. Their primary aim is to fight poverty and exclusion and contribute to lasting change for individuals in particularly vulnerable situations. IM was founded in Sweden in 1938 and has no religious or political affiliation.

IM is convinced that every individual has an inherent power to change their situation. With the right tools and circumstances, individuals can use this power to join with others to create change at both individual and societal levels.

story:
Introducing Marlon. French for little falcon, pronounced like Marlon Brando. Light, spacious, and uber functional, it's the last carry-on you'll ever want. 

Three years ago we set out to design the perfect carry-on for the modern traveler. At the onset we asked ourselves and fellow wanderlusts, what do travelers really care about? The feedback was surprisingly consistent: 

  • More packing space
  • Amazing wheels
  • Light weight
  • USB charging
  • User-friendly compartments
  • Modern, clean design

With these features front and center, Marlon was hatched. While over the last few years we’ve seen quite a few new luggage brands take flight, we’ve been surprised by the focus on cumbersome tech gimmicks. A tracker, biometric sensor, or built-in laptop charger seem cool at first glance but in practice, they just add complexity, price, and weight without much added value.

Marlon is different. Instead of rushing to the market with the fanciest features we could think of, we kept our heads down as long as necessary to design the very best carry-on in the market. A case that actually will make traveling simpler and better. Not a case that reports traffic conditions — that's what Google Maps is for...

Marlon is your new best travel mate, championing what you care about most:

  • Packing space – The truth is we’ve all had an overpacking moment. With at least 35% more space than comparable luggage, Marlon introduces assisted compression technology (ACT), allowing you to painlessly pack more with just one click.
  • Weight - At under 7 lbs, Marlon is the lightest carry-on in its class.
  • Wheels – Marlon’s wheels are three times the diameter of traditional luggage wheels creating a host of benefits, including easier movement over varied surfaces and enhanced durability. Not to mention they are virtually silent with an amazing glide. And should they ever break, they're easily replaceable. 
  • Charging – Dual USB ports and a built-in, easily removable battery charge your devices.
  • Compartments – Marlon has tons of practical spaces including a quick access pocket for the security line and a padded sleeve for a laptop / tablet.
  • Design – Most travelers prefer softside luggage for its flexibility and versatility. But let’s face it, softside luggage tends to be an eyesore. Not Marlon. Minimalist construction and clean lines are enhanced by a refined color palette.
     

 

ONE CLICK ASSISTED COMPRESSION TECHNOLOGY (ACT)

Overpackers, rejoice! Marlon’s game-changing feature is its patent-pending exterior ACT, which helps you pack in more clothes than any other carry-on. You simply pack while Marlon’s expanded, then press down to compress to carry-on size. This eliminates the need to sit on your luggage while struggling to force the zippers closed, often breaking them. Though seemingly simple, this mechanism is the cornerstone of Marlon and has undergone extensive development and modification over the last three years. Utilizing a proprietary gradient lever and banded grip mechanism, Marlon is easily compressed and expanded. The mechanism is very robust and benefits from a security zipper to maintain the case's minimalist design and mitigate unnecessary stress on the internal components. The first time you travel with it, you won't know how you ever traveled without it.  

 

EXPANSION - TRANSFORM MARLON TO CHECK-IN LUGGAGE

Like most travelers, we do whatever it takes to travel with carry-on luggage, and don’t even own check-in luggage. However, in the rare instance that you need to pack a bit more, Marlon’s expansion feature converts your case into check-in size.

 

REMOVABLE BATTERY + 2 USB PORTS

Technology can integrate beautifully with luggage, and that’s why we opted to include a charging function, as this is one of the most practical features we've tested. Designed with connected travelers in mind, Marlon comes with a 10400mAh removable battery and two USB ports. Unlike other connected luggage, Marlon’s battery pack is easily accessible and has no internal wires. This means you’ll breeze through security without being interrogated.

 

OVERSIZED WHEELS

One of the chief designs we explicitly pursued was two oversized wheels that are easily user-replaceable rather than omni-directional wheels which have become a popular gimmick. They provide three critical advantages:

1. More packing space. Omnidirectional wheels occupy at least 20% more space.

 

2. Greater mobility on rough surfaces. Two large wheels with a stronger attachment to the body can better handle rough terrain and survive longer in impact tests than four small exposed wheels.

 

3. Stability. Two wheels will never tip or roll away from you on an incline like omnidirectional wheels. Have you ever seen someone on the metro or AirTran desperately trying to stop their luggage from flying around? Not a good look.

 

 

Designed in London using only premium materials, Marlon is built to last. The central material is a molded 1000D weather proofed, triple coated ballistic nylon. This proprietary nylon construction is perfectly balanced for light weight and abrasion resistance. In addition we use industrial grade aluminum and premium, custom YKK zippers. The Aquaguard zippers also allow you to lock the bag using a standard TSA lock.

 

Our robust handle with a soft-touch, ergonomic grip, looks as good as it feels, even when rolling Marlon at its heaviest.

 

 

Marlon's interior gives you the largest packing compartment in the market plus two mesh pockets on either side for socks, underwear, or anything else you don’t want to lose track of.

 

Marlon has a versatile, full-access compartment that tailors to your needs. Whether you're storing button down shirts, shoes, makeup and accessories, or dirty laundry, this space gives you the flexibility to adapt your packing for any trip. Also, the exterior of this compartment houses two additional mesh pockets for organization.

 

If you're a minimalist traveler, Marlon lets you go backpack- or tote-free by storing your laptop and tablet in a padded sleeve for protection. The front, gusseted pocket is also ideal for a pair of running shoes, sandals, notebook or documents, or other semi-flat items.

 

Outside of the laptop sleeve is a designated quick access pocket to store your phone and loose items at the security line. No more grabbing one of those little buckets to throw your phone and watch into last minute.

 

Marlon even has a concealed back pocket that stores the battery and provides an out-of-sight holder for your phone while it’s charging.

 

Please note. Shipping will be charged upon the conclusion of the campaign through a fulfillment platform called BackerKit.

 

 

The team at Morrama have worked with established brands including Virgin, Homeserve, and Braiform as well as upcoming start-ups and entrepreneurs, to take their ideas from concept to manufacture. With over 15 years of industry experience, the multidisciplinary team have brought their understanding and enthusiasm for great design to Marlon Travel, helping to develop the connected compression carry-on. With the tooling data ready for production, it is only your financial support needed to make Marlon a reality.

REMOVABLE BATTERY + 2 USB PORTS
Technology can integrate beautifully with luggage, and that’s why we opted to include a charging function, as this is one of the most practical features we've tested. Designed with connected travelers in mind, Marlon comes with a 10400mAh removable battery and two USB ports. Unlike other connected luggage, Marlon’s battery pack is easily accessible and has no internal wires. This means you’ll breeze through security without being interrogated.
 
 
OVERSIZED WHEELS
One of the chief designs we explicitly pursued was two oversized wheels that are easily user-replaceable rather than omni-directional wheels which have become a popular gimmick. They provide three critical advantages:
1. More packing space. Omnidirectional wheels occupy at least 20% more space.
 
 
2. Greater mobility on rough surfaces. Two large wheels with a stronger attachment to the body can better handle rough terrain and survive longer in impact tests than four small exposed wheels.
  
 
3. Stability. Two wheels will never tip or roll away from you on an incline like omnidirectional wheels. Have you ever seen someone on the metro or AirTran desperately trying to stop their luggage from flying around? Not a good look.
  
 

 
Designed in London using only premium materials, Marlon is built to last. The central material is a molded 1000D weather proofed, triple coated ballistic nylon. This proprietary nylon construction is perfectly balanced for light weight and abrasion resistance. In addition we use industrial grade aluminum and premium, custom YKK zippers. The Aquaguard zippers also allow you to lock the bag using a standard TSA lock.


 
Our robust handle with a soft-touch, ergonomic grip, looks as good as it feels, even when rolling Marlon at its heaviest.
 
 

 
Marlon's interior gives you the largest packing compartment in the market plus two mesh pockets on either side for socks, underwear, or anything else you don’t want to lose track of.
 
 
Marlon has a versatile, full-access compartment that tailors to your needs. Whether you're storing button down shirts, shoes, makeup and accessories, or dirty laundry, this space gives you the flexibility to adapt your packing for any trip. Also, the exterior of this compartment houses two additional mesh pockets for organization.
  
 
If you're a minimalist traveler, Marlon lets you go backpack- or tote-free by storing your laptop and tablet in a padded sleeve for protection. The front, gusseted pocket is also ideal for a pair of running shoes, sandals, notebook or documents, or other semi-flat items.
 
 
Outside of the laptop sleeve is a designated quick access pocket to store your phone and loose items at the security line. No more grabbing one of those little buckets to throw your phone and watch into last minute.
  
 
Marlon even has a concealed back pocket that stores the battery and provides an out-of-sight holder for your phone while it’s charging.
 Please note. Shipping will be charged upon the conclusion of the campaign through a fulfillment platform called BackerKit.   The team at Morrama have worked with established brands including Virgin, Homeserve, and Braiform as well as upcoming start-ups and entrepreneurs, to take their ideas from concept to manufacture. With over 15 years of industry experience, the multidisciplinary team have brought their understanding and enthusiasm for great design to Marlon Travel, helping to develop the connected compression carry-on. With the tooling data ready for production, it is only your financial support needed to make Marlon a reality.

story:
Pocket Sky works just like the sun: It uses soft blue light to suppress the production of melatonin, the sleep hormone. This is the most natural way for enhancing your wakefulness, performance and well-being.

 

 

Pocket Sky will lift your mood and power you up in only 20 minutes a day. 

Get our official press kit here.

 

Whenever we are out of sync with the day-night cycle, for example when we travel overseas or work at night, or when winter deprives us of sunlight, we feel down and tired.

Pocket Sky helps to adjust your body clock by suppressing the production of melatonin, the sleep hormone. Seize the benefits of biologically active light to energize yourself, lift your spirits and enjoy better sleep.

Whenever you need an extra dose of natural energy, a dash of light from Pocket Sky will get you going in no time. Its soft blue light helps athletes, workers, and students improve their cognitive and physical capacities. 

During a long, dark winter, our body is in night mode throughout the day, craving sunlight. Pocket Sky mimics a brilliant blue morning sky and will animate you perceptibly.

When you are jet-lagged after a trip across time-zones, your internal clock is out of harmony with your environment. By emulating the sun, Pocket Sky resyncs your biological clock with the world around you.

Enjoy your trip overseas from day one!

A wearable which energizes and improves sleep at the same time? That's Pocket Sky. By helping you to achieve and maintain wakefulness throughout the day, Pocket Sky also ensures that you enjoy consolidated sleep at night.

Pocket Sky is a great companion on your travels or your daily commute. It blends into your lifestyle and lets you use it wherever you are, whatever you do, and whenever you need it most.

Pocket Sky is just like the sun. It’s truly the most natural way for compensating for a lack of daylight. Pocket Sky also meets the highest safety standards:

  • Eye-safe - tested to be photo-biologically safe according to EN 62471:2008
  • 100% glare-free due to low intensity blue light
  • 100% flicker-free 
  • 100% UV-free 
  • 100% bluetooth-free 
  • Soft-start for smooth familiarization
  • Swell-proof battery (stainless steel body) and other brand-name components
  • Designed, engineered and manufactured in Austria

 

Wondering how to use it? Just open the case, put on Pocket Sky, go! To please your eyes, Pocket Sky starts its sequence with a beautiful sunrise. After 20 minutes, it switches off automatically. 

We’ve packed many other smart features into Pocket Sky:

  • One-size-fits-all (3 different nose pieces)
  • Case doubling as wireless charging unit 
  • Automatic activation/deactivation
  • Case connecting with USB-C 
  • No app needed for operation

 

Pocket Sky builds on longstanding science, most recently recognized by the 2017 Nobel prize in Physiology or Medicine. Special receptors on the retina of our eyes respond to sunlight by suppressing the production of melatonin. 

This process is in charge of setting our body clock - the Circadian rhythm - and can be harnessed for coping with a number of discomforts:

  • When we yearn for sunlight during the winter 
  • When we suffer from jet lag after a trip across time-zones 
  • When we find it hard to sleep after working late or in shifts 
  • Or when we need energy for a mental or physical challenge ahead of us
  • It's also a great little helper for falling and staying asleep!

That’s what Pocket Sky does for you: After twenty minutes of exposure to its soft blue light, Pocket Sky significantly boosts your wakefulness, performance and wellbeing.

 

Institute for Sleep-Wake-Research, Vienna

“Since bright light is one of the strongest “Zeitgeber” to regulate our circadian clock and thereafter our sleep-wake rhythm, the application of light has a wide range of beneficial properties.

Pocket Sky is a user friendly and easy-to-apply tool for ambulatory light exposure and may be beneficial for stabilizing the sleep-wake rhythm as well as improving wellbeing during periods of low exposure to natural light. Therefore, the ISWF will use Pocket Sky in studies to apply blue light to enhance alertness (e.g. on the road, during nightshift) or as a tool to boost fitness and performance (e.g. for sportive activities).”

 

Michael Geyer and Mark Wallerberger are the founders of Pocket Sky. The two tech- and design savvy Austrians and their team have a history of developing sophisticated wearables together.  

 

Mark is an award-winning product design professional with a knack for smart wearables such as glasses, headwear and shoes. He studied industrial design in Vienna. He spent many years as a lecturer at the Vienna University of Technology and working for the renowned Austrian design bureau EOOS. Mark loves to travel and hates jet lag.

Michael is our expert in microelectronics, software design and opto-electronics. He studied electronics, IT and health data processing. Before coming up with the idea of Pocket Sky he was the founder of a company specializing in hard- and software development, testing and simulations. Being quite the creative inventor, Michael holds several patents in the field of wearables. He also builds cameras for 3D photography and likes to draw photo-realistic portraits. He knows what it means to suffer during a long and dark winter.

Harald is responsible for communications. He writes blogs, social media postings and press releases. Nikola wrote Pocket Sky’s software, which for example controls the light intensity, loading time or the indicator LEDs of Pocket Sky. Hans is the team's expert in finances and business strategy. Miriam is our marketing specialist with experience in growth marketing and crowdfunding. Clemens is the man for the internet, our website and social media activities.

 

 

Each shipping of Pocket Sky comes with the following items: 

Pocket Sky has been in the making for several years. The good news is: It will be ready for shipping in September 2019. What you see in the videos and images are not prototypes, but injection-moulded originals from the zero-series.

 

If you like what you see, here’s how to get your Pocket Sky - and support us in the process:

1 - Go back to the top of this page.

2 - Select one perk (if you have a special request or need help please send us a message)

3 - Enter your details and that’s it! Now you only have to wait until October 2019 to get your perk.

 

By the way: We are ready to start production! We have the tooling ready and our sample-items are already injection-moulded originals from the zero-series. Watch this short video from our production site:

story:
VitalBand is the first ever fully automatic fall detection smart watch. This sleek activity band also monitors heart rate, respiration rate, calories burned, step count, and can be programmed for medication reminders and goal notifications. 

 

 

In Production

 

 

VitalBand Features

 

Features & Functions:

  • Fully automated fall detection
  • Automatic emergency call and text
  • Automatic panic button call and text
  • Heart rate monitor
  • Respiration rate monitor
  • Activity levels monitor
  • Calories burned
  • Fully customizable medication reminders and goal notifications
  • Waterproof for wear in tub or shower
  • On-wrist charging for continuous coverage
  • Works with iOS and Android phones

Fashion & Science:

  • Sleek, stylish sports watch
  • Lightweight
  • Compatible with any standard watch band
  • 6 Axis Accelerometer with Proprietary Fall Detection Algorithms
  • Advanced Integrated Intel Curie SOC
  • 110 Node Neural Network AI
  • On-wrist magnetic charging module
  • Bluetooth enabled
  • Easily updated over the Internet 
  • NO monitoring service required

 

Automatic Fall Detection

This is real, unedited footage of how the VitalBand detects a fall and initiates automatic call out and text notifications:
 

 

Use Cases

 

For Seniors

The main use case for VitalBand is for seniors who either choose to age in place or want to maintain their independence. Without anyone around to see a fall or hear cries for help, VitalBand automatically detects a fall and calls out and alerts pre-programmed emergency contacts so help arrives quickly.

 

For Teens

As we finished our first prototype, many of our friends suggested this watch would be useful for their children in high school or college. Because of the 'panic' button on the face of the watch, if your student feels threatened or in danger, he or she could automatically call out and text for help.

 

For Athletes

Aside from emergency alerts, VitalBand also monitors heart rate, respiration rate, activity levels, calories burned, is fully waterproof, shows date and time, and can be pre-programmed to show medical reminders and goal notifications. Because of these sports-oriented functions, many athletes have also shown interest in our watch as well.

We have successfully Beta-tested VitalBand through participant studies and messaging on Facebook. With your contribution, we can begin to mass produce to meet our recent demand. 

 

Perks

Our goal is to raise $100,000 to begin producing these watches to meet the demand. We have chosen to build VitalBand in the United States, and therefore more capital is needed to achieve the necessary volume.

We have various packages available depending on your contribution. 

  • Economy VitalBand Package:
    • With your purchase of the Economy Package, you will receive a VitalBand in your color of choice with a tethered charger. 
      This package has a value of $199.
  • Base VitalBand Package:
    • With your purchase of the Base Package, you will receive a VitalBand in your choice of color, plus an on-wrist charging option. 
      This package has a value of $229.
  • Extended VitalBand Package:
    • With your purchase of the Extended Range Package, you will receive a VitalBand in your choice of color, plus an on-wrist charger and a hub to extend the range. 
      This package has a value of $279.95.
  • Full Protection VitalBand Package:
    • With your purchase of the Complete Protection Package, you will receive a VitalBand in your color of choice, plus an on-wrist charger, hub and WiFi camera with two-way audio.
      This package has a value of $349.

If our crowdfunding goal of $100,000 is not met, the raised funds will still go towards the production of our devices.

 

Our Inspiration

VitalBand began out of necessity; many of us at the company felt strongly that as "aging in place" became the norm, our parents were facing more danger than ever. Falls are the number one cause of death for people over 65 years old, and despite these facts, our parents were too humiliated to wear the pendant. It's an admission of infirmity. 

As a result of this need, we created VitalBand, the first ever automatic fall detection smart watch. Unlike the pendant, when you fall, it calls - automatically. It's also a fully functioning smart watch, so anyone would be proud to wear it. 

 

Our Team

 

Ernie Ianace 

President

Ernie Ianace has a full range of experience, from startups, to complex global matrix organizations. He has extensive relationships both domestic and international with tier one channels, large enterprise and government customers plus many leading services providers. Mr. Ianace has over 30 years of extensive sales, marketing and management experience. Mr. Ianace has a track record of driving revenues to $100+ million in a record 12-24 months. He has held executive positions at Siemens, Efficient Networks, NoMagic, and 3Com Corp.

Tom Hansen

Chief Marketing Officer

Tom Hansen was President and CEO of Heeling Sports Limited (HLYS:NASDAQ), President of TMAdvertising / McCann Worldgroup (IPG:NASDAQ), and President and CEO of Gigasphere Group. He is an award-winning Creative Director for: Leo Burnett, Y&R, Tracy-Locke for McDonalds, Hallmark, Miller Brewing Company, Frito Lay, and  American Airlines.

Dr. Glenn Hamilton

Chief Medical Officer

Dr. Glenn Hamilton has spent more than 30 years as an experienced emergency physician. He has written three textbooks and published over 100 papers and articles. Dr. Hamilton served as Professor and Chair in the Department of Emergency Medicine, Wright State University and is a Professor Emeritus.

James Hamilton

Board of Directors

James Hamilton has 25 years of experience in network and security industries. He has taken four companies public and was an executive of three other private companies that were acquired with total acquisition value exceeding $3.8 billion. He is currently President of Valletta Capital.

Pete Ianace

Board of Directors, Corporate Development

Pete Ianace has over 35 years of experience building and leading successful technology businesses. He successfully started and launched four technology companies in the last fifteen years.

Dan Flaherty 

Board of Directors

Dan Flaherty is a serial inventor and entrepreneur, founding two companies. He is the founder and inventor of Varidesk, the stand-up desk that has been featured on the popular TV series Silicon Valley. His company was awarded the honor of Top 100 Fastest Growing Companies of 2016. He is also the founder of Gemmy Industries, Corp.

 

Follow Us!

Facebook: VitalBand

LinkedIn: VitalBand Smart Watch

Instagram: @VitalBand

Website: http://www.vitalband.com

story:
The Idea was to produce shoes you personilze by wearing them- every day, every night. Use the clean canvas of your POULS boots to create your own story. Make them yours. This is what like to say. Get them muddy as you hike along a trail, you bike around the city or just wear them as your everyday companion. 

 

 

In the beginning POULS will start with two well known pair of boots. Therefor we took the traditional Casual Boot and the Ankle Boot or Chelsea Boot. Both shoes are available for Men and Women.

Like other big companies we don't want to separate between genders. Develop your own canvas.    

 

 

This is what we like to say.  

Get them muddy as you hike along a trail, you bike around the city or just wear them as your everyday companion. Don‘t worry about the dust and dirt that gather during your daily routine.

 

Our handcrafted POULS boots be your go-to footwear all day, every day. They are made in Portugal under fair conditions. One big issue we had in mind to get amazing products with the ability to last: Find a manufacturer in Portugal, currently the leading country for high-quality production of footwear. 

 

 

We came up with a style, that works for every occasion and activity, while keeping our design to one, that not only looks good but feels great as well.  For us, it was very important to install a Corporate Product Language. You will remember a POULS Boot.  

And the best thing is: These shoes are UNISEX!

 

 

We want you to get full use out of your shoes for years to come and use high-quality rough& tough leather or vegan microfibers to fulfil the different needs of our customers. 

Our goal was a portfolio of different shoes. Different types of shoes, a different type of innovative materials.

 

 

Great details like rivets or waxed laces and a couple of added values make PØULS shoes to Allrounder for all seasons and moments. 

 

 

UNISEX

We don't want to seperate between genders. For us it is really important, that everybody can enjoy his or her pair of PØULS-Boots.

 

 

 

 

We wanted to start with these two boots. The timeline is still full of ideas and concepts. At the moment we have two new boots in the pipeline. Interesting times we would like to share with you guys. The design is an iterating process.

 

 

BACKING

Unfortunately we have issues with some perks. You can't type in your country when you make the payment. So we have to do that manually. You will write a mail to us where we have to send the shoes. The problems with the order are in the early bird perks.

You will remember a POULS Boot.  And the best thing is: These shoes are UNISEX!  We want you to get full use out of your shoes for years to come and use high-quality rough& tough leather or vegan microfibers to fulfil the different needs of our customers. Our goal was a portfolio of different shoes. Different types of shoes, a different type of innovative materials.  Great details like rivets or waxed laces and a couple of added values make PØULS shoes to Allrounder for all seasons and moments.   UNISEXWe don't want to seperate between genders. For us it is really important, that everybody can enjoy his or her pair of PØULS-Boots.    We wanted to start with these two boots. The timeline is still full of ideas and concepts. At the moment we have two new boots in the pipeline. Interesting times we would like to share with you guys. The design is an iterating process.  BACKINGUnfortunately we have issues with some perks. You can't type in your country when you make the payment. So we have to do that manually. You will write a mail to us where we have to send the shoes. The problems with the order are in the early bird perks.

story:
Having an on-the-go lifestyle can make it challenging to know what to do with the everyday items that you always carry, but the newest designs of stylish gym bags are sure to keep everything you need. Lightweight backpack like Fitnedix come in compartments to help you stand organized. 

1st Compartment

For Sneakers / Shoes, Shower accessories, Flip Flop & Umbrella

2nd Compartment

For Dry Clothes

3rd Compartment

A Detachable Tote Bag - Perfect for Happy Hour or going to groceries after workout!

Don't let anyone dull your success in the gym. A detachable Tote bag is convenient to detached and carry to go shopping after workout. A great carry-on and everyday Tote.

 
 

Fitnedix Drawstring Bag is to Die For!

story:
After our first successfull Kickstarter campaign in 2016 we went back to the drawing board with an idea of making a brand new collection of sunglasses. The idea of making the perfect Aviator-style sunglasses made us both very excited and we decided to quickly turn the idea into reality. After a lot of back-and-forth about the look, what materials to use etc. we finally came to a decision and are now proud to present our new prototype to you. 

Since we first started our own brand about 2 years ago we have always kept the same objective: to beat the market prices while using the best materials possible. While most sunglasses out there are easy to break and/or are being absurdly over prized we went out to try to find a way to make our sunglasses as durable as we could, while at the same time keeping them as delicate as they should be. We decided to go with titanium.

Titanium metal is the top material of choice in the aerospace industry due to its high strength-to-weight ratio As it also owns extreme temperature and corrosion resistance, we figured that it would be the ideal material for us to use. 

Always be in style with the Titan Black. These will definitely fit any occasion.

These badass aviators goes with everything. Class and elegance in perfect symbiosis.

For the more luxurious look, be sure to draw looks with the Titan Gold.

As shown above, our titanium aviators comes in three different colors - Black, Gun metal and Gold. As a backer you can choose the one that you think will fit you best. If you have a hard time choosing we also give you an awesome package deal where you can mix the color of frames and lenses as you like!

Besides just giving our aviators a cooler look, the color we use has a protective function. This new technology we use as coating of our frames is super strong, have a high antioxidant capacity and is much healthier to our environment to produce.

We always look for the best quality we can find. Therefore we use hyper-extendable german OBE hinges for our Titan sunglasses.

All of our Titan sunglasses comes in an exclusive foldable PU leather box.​

We all know how important it is with good packaging and how happy we get when we recieve a gift where the package feels at least as exclusive as the content. We have tried out a whole bunch of different boxes in the search for the right one. One that gives the right protection as well as the right look. Every pair of our Titan sunglasses comes with an exclusive PU leather box that easily can be folded so it does't take up any space when you have your shades on!

The lenses might just be the most important part of a pair of sunglasses. And what good would they do if they didn't match the high quality of the titanium frames? We have searched long and hard to find the right lenses and are proud to present the optics for our Titans.

First off we use 7 layer polarized lenses that effectively reduces glare, eliminating dazzling light reflection and scattered light which makes the vision more soft and clear. The polaroid lenses have seven layers composite materials with UV400 ultraviolet ray standard. This means that they block all wavelengths of light from 400 nm, which covers all of the UV spectrum. The first and last layer features a clear and durable scratch-resistant layer to avoid any damage you expose them to.   

Besides the quality of the lenses we wanted to highten the diversity so that you can give your Titans a more personalized look. The solution was to design them so that you safely and easily can change the lenses yourself. With bunch different colors of polarized lenses you can give your Titans a new look every day of the week! 

We provide an easy and safe way to change your lenses.

 

We do not settle for mediocre. We do not believe that we would gain anything in the long run if we would over-price our products, using cheap materials and fine words. We believe that if we put ourselves out there with products we can be proud of, knowing that all the time and effort we put into them 

In return for your support and belief in us we offer some great rewards. Besides our new exclusive Titan collection, we also give you the chance to get our previous collections with great discounts. 

 

Go to www.zerpico.com for more of our Carbon Fiber sunglasses.

Native and Wade from our Eyewood Collection. Go to www.zerpico.com for more.

 

 

 

Twins Sara and Carmen rocking the Gun metal and Gold.​

 

First of all, all of you! We would't be what we are if it wasn't for Kickstarter and the fans we have recieved through the community. We have built lasting bonds through medias like these and are grateful for being able to bring ideas into reality and to live in an age where this is possible.

We are on a mission to show you all that there is more than the big corporations out there. That you don't have to pay such high prizes just because they are established brands. We try our best to promote and provide our products at a fair price and by selling directly to consumers through social media and our own website we can accomplish just that. 

This campaign is yet another steppingstone and on this road we have come in contact with a lot of awesome people that were happy to work with us and together make something we all can be proud of. This project wouldn't be what it is today if it wasn't for them.

Risks and challenges

First off. this is our second Kickstarter project. Our first campaign went as expected and we kept the timeline perfectly. We have carefully chosen the best factories, and can garantee that the process will run as smoothly as possible.

Of course there can always be unforeseen problems that we cannot control. But if a problem comes up, we will do everything we can to fix it as fast as possible.

We will always keep you updated on any crucial information about the production and shipping of products.

Thank you for believing in us!

story:
PATENTS PENDING - MADE IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA

The Pirate Printing Press is revolutionizing the printing industry with it's ability to print on just about anything!

Note: (View all "Critter Scents" Characters in Gallery)

          I invented the Pirate Printing Press out of a need for my own uses.   

          I had been using a similar version I had designed over 20 years ago, so I decided to modify the design and make it user friendly for kids, and artist of all ages. 


          This is an artisans tool and needs to be in every creative persons arsenal of art supplies.

          I have recently unleashed this creation on to the public and it is now available on a crowd sourcing platform to get it out to all the creative people yearning to unleash their creative powers!

         The unique feature of this Pirate Printing Press is it's ability to raise and lower the screen while keeping it parallel with the substrate, and repeating this step for consecutive prints thereby allowing precision printing and color registration at an endless variety of printing heights for the successful printing on all kinds of substrates of various sizes!

          This function is integrated into the design to allow the artisan complete flexibility in printing and for allowing adjustments on the fly,  with extreme quickness and efficiency as most inks begin to dry immediately when exposed to air.

          The press is supported by my T-shirt Company and will supply individuals with materials and supplies, but the best part is I am offering the sale of Exposed Screens to the general public.  This makes getting into the printing field that much easier for the average person.

           Just send us electronically or by mail any black and white graphic art using our Dedicated Pirate Printing Press Templates and we will send you a screen ready for printing complete with image!, I do not know of any other screen printing press and kit system in the world that offers this service!

Short Summary

Hi, my name is Mark and I own a small t-shirt company.  I founded the company in 2008 and business is growing, but I find myself at a cross roads that I myself can not undertake.

Growing a business is hard without having the proper capital needed to invest in equipment.  Currently we are doing well in the traditional screen printing market and expect business to only pick up even more with our new "Critter Scents" line as it is Exclusive to this Indiegogo Campaign,  . . . but, I am losing business in the digital printing market because we do not have a digital t-shirt printing press.

I am here on indiegogo to let everyone know about my offering of 10%+ of my business in exchange for a digital printer and in exchange I think I have come up with some nifty perks for my investors, but wait, the best part is, this is one investment that keeps paying as the corporate shares perk will pay investors long after this indiegogo is over.

You see, I am serious about my business succeeding and I believe people who invest in me should also share in the rewards of the company's acheivements, Corporate Stock seemed like a great way for me to express my gratitude for helping us reach our goal, but more importantly business is really built on relationships with others and for this reason I thought if people could own a piece of greatness they would feel as inspired and enriched as I do.  Giving up 10% of my company was not an easy desision to make, but I wanted you to understand how important this printer is to our business and how much your contribution means.  I would like to thank everyone in advance for taking the time to look at my offering, I understand this is not for everyone, but maybe you know someone you think this would be great for, please feel free to pass along this info.  

What We Need & What You Get

O.K., so what I need is this, a digital printing press!

Every week I turn down countless t-shirt printing jobs because I am limited by the economics and limitations of traditional screen printing.  Digital printing technology will allow my company and yours too if you invest to maximize profits and collect on the untapped stream of revenue that would other wise be turned down.  As a perk I am giving away 10% of my company so others can share in the joy of being a part of a creative young company that is growing every year (5 years strong).  I feel that if you are willing to help this company grow you should also share in its future.  It is my way of showing my appreciation and giving back to those that want to see this company move into tomorrow. 

and what you get is,

First off you get to choose between several styles and over 60 colors of t-shirts we have available, then you get to choose any one of our designs from any of our exclusive T-Shirt Lines including our Brand New "Critter Scents" line Exclusive to this indiegogo to put on your shirt, or upload your own single design and have it printed instead, for this I will give away 10% of common stock in K12 Tshirts Incorporated.

Or raid me like a pirate, push me aside and start your own printing business with my Pirate Printing Press and Screen Printers Kit.  It includes everything you need for stencil screen printing using eco friendly water based inks.  This kit is an introductory kit and will allow you to screen print on a variety of items such as t-shirts, gift cards, posters, jeans, wood, glass, metal, etc . . . (as seen in video)

When we reach our economic goal the money will go to purchase a new digital printer, the accessories that are needed to go with it, 2000 shirts, ink for 2000 shirts and shipping cost to send a shirt to each of our new 2000 Share Holders, you could be one of them, . . . oh ya and Taxes, cant get away from that one.

There is a certain amount of pride that comes with ownership, no matter how small, One Share may seem insignificant, but to me it is everything as each share is a little part of me.

The Impact

Your participation in this is more than just another t-shirt business, for me it is a sign that people want me to move forward in business and in life. It is also a chance for me to share with others my knowledge of screen printing with the introduction of my Pirate Printing Press developed for kids, artisans, artist, and craftsmen, or any one with an interest in design and printing Exclusively available here on Indiegogo.

Other Ways You Can Help

I get it, you read this far so you must be interested! I greatly apreciate that and I understand that this may not be for everybody, but I am sure you know someone this would be perfect for, so if its not to much trouble and since you already read this much anyway could you please like this on Facebook and shout out a tweet!  Without a grass roots movement from individuals like you, I alone can not make this happen.

Thanks so much!, Cheers, Peace, Good Printing!, . . . you Pirate you 

 

For those considering a Pirate Printing Press, I will be providing a service of exposing screens for the system.  Just send me your art and I will send you a screen ready to print with your art on it, this is made easy using the dedicated Pirate Printing Press Template.

I am also bundling in packs of 3, screens ready to print with popular cool motifs, such as Hearts, Wings, Skull n Bones, Tribal Patterns, etc . . .

This will make the press super apealing for kids and entrepreneurs looking for a ready to go system, modify with additional screens for full color printing and for branding and customization!

 

"yo ho, yo ho,

the printers life's for me,

we print lots of stuff, were artisans first

pick up your squeegees yo ho,

 

yo ho, yo ho,

the printers life's for me,

mix colors with ink, I like what you think,

pick up your squeegees yo ho

 

yo ho, yo ho,

the printers life's for me

like us on facebook, give this a tweet

share me 'earties yo ho"

story:
Hi, it’s Jake and Taylor here, and we want to help guys in and near Tulsa know the “411” on how to be the best man they can be.  We both have dedicated our lives to studying the finer things in life, and how to enjoy them on a budget.  Taylor’s even been featured several times in the top men’s fashion periodicals.

You see a LOT of lifestyle tips in magazines and TV shows, but most of them don’t apply to men… now there is a show that is completely for men.  We will be taking you all around Tulsa, showing where to get the best haircut, how to enjoy a cigar, what are the hottest date spots, and most importantly, how to look while you do it all.

Now I need your help.  We want you, the viewer to take ownership in this program.  Every dollar counts; whether you are a viewer that wants this in Tulsa, or a business that can benefit from the public awareness through sponsorship.  As with any professional production, there are many different types of costs involved; from production cost including equipment, the online broadcasting expenses, to paying for our camera men.  In order to get the word out, as well as insure a high number of “impressions” for our corporate sponsors, we do need to invest a small portion directly into the online tools we are using (Facebook, Twitter, Google, & YouTube). 

Please share!  Sharing this campaign with your friends on Facebook or even just telling people about it is just as important.  Your endorsement is valuable to us!  Also, feel free to follow us on Facebook and Twitter too: @TulsaFeed.  The Tulsa Feed is the channel our show is on.  There are several other shows raising funds too, so please check those out as well.

Thank you for your financial support, your “sharing”, and your viewership!  See you around Tulsa!

Here is an example show while we are in pre-production:

story:
Our Story and the Birth of Technical Adrenaline

Hello my name is Kimberly Tanny and I am a martial arts and fitness instructor.  I have been training in the martial arts for 10 years and earned my 3rd degree black belt in ITF Taekwon-do last year in June 2011.  I own a small martial arts school in Aurora, CO where I teach Taekwon-do, fitness kickboxing and women's self defense.  I recently started a new program that is a fusion of traditional martial arts with modern martial arts (acrobatic techniques, powerful jumping/flying kicks and martial arts weapons).  In the quest to search for the perfect name for my new class and wanting to use the abbreviation of my martial arts school (TAMA), I came up with Technical Adrenaline Martial Arts.


The technical aspect fits because we focus on proper technique, making each kick, strike, block or stance as sharp and correct as possible.  The adrenaline comes from all the jumping and flying techniques or acrobatic moves.  It also comes from the adrenaline rush of competing in a tournament or demonstrating in front of a large crowd.  


The clothing line came about because I wanted my students to be able to wear our own logo t-shirts and training apparel.  Eventually I became stuck on the idea of turning Technical Adrenaline into a clothing line.  


Well, what makes Technical Adrenaline unique?  We're not just another t-shirt brand.  Technical Adrenaline represents a population of martial artists that is fairly large. There are millions and millions of martial artists practicing world wide, but there isn't a whole lot of basic martial arts street wear that exists, mainly just shirts and apparel for MMA, but not that other side of martial arts.  Technical Adrenaline's goal is to outfit these extreme martial artists and provide a way for them to truly express themselves all while looking stylish.  


My goal

My goal is to create a new t-shirt brand that represents modern martial artists (not just MMA).  I am hoping to create comfortable street wear that represents who these kids, teens and adults are.  Those who live and breathe martial arts and have that passion and drive to train, compete and learn.  The style of the t-shirts is simplistic with an urban/modernized design.


Here's where you can help out and what you get (PERKS!)

My goal is to raise $1500.  As mentioned in the video above, although I will be creating t-shirts and some training apparel for my own students, in order to launch my clothing line to the public, I will need some start-up capital that I simply don't have right now.  

The funds I raise in this campaign would go directly to printing t-shirts, apparel and other accessories, which will be available for purchase on my website: www.technicaladrenaline.com.  

Funds from this campaign will go towards:

- Paying for the shirts
- Paying for the screen printing
- Paying for the shipping 

Anything extra I make from my sales would go directly into producing more shirts and also hopefully hiring a designer to come up with some new/unique designs.  It would also go towards improving our website, since we have just a bare bones site right now.

Anything you can donate is greatly appreciated, even just $1.  

Thank you for your support!


Other Ways You Can Help

Help me get the word out by sharing this campaign with others!  Thank you!!!  Visit and share our website with your friends:  http://www.technicaladrenaline.com

story: We need your help!! I am a 35 year old photographer working on a photography production with 6 other very talented people titled 'Vernal Flowers", a spring time fashion spread.  We are turning to our friends, family, and strongest supporters to ask for contributions to help cover the expenses and overhead for this production. All proceeds will help bring this production to its full potential. Please take a look at what we have to offer you for any contribution you can make. Your contribution will help us bring this production to the level we envisioned.

Your contribution will help us bring this production to the level we envisioned.

story:
Summary

Hello, my name is Amanda. Some of you may know me from my jewelry line,
Adelina Mictlan. I am now starting a new project called "From the Black Lodge"
and I need your help getting the project going.

"From the Black Lodge" is a popup shop that travels to different venues around
the world. We strongly believe in handmade, small batch, independent business. The shop will be filled with products from artists and designers that sell
primarily on the internet. My goal in the creation of “From the Black Lodge” is to
help these artist bring work to shoppers which they may not have had the chance
to see, and will allow the shoppers to experience and appreciate a unique,
specific style. I will also be giving the artists I represent an opportunity to share
their efforts, and to spread the awareness of their craft without taking a huge
financial risk on their own.

What We Need & What You Get

To get the ball rolling, at the very least, I would need $4,000. This will directly go
to the first venue, Austin Psych Fest, that will debut "from the black lodge". Psych
Fest is a 3 day musical festival that draws up to 10,000 potential shoppers from
all over the United States and the world. This setup would include a booth fee,
shelves, mannequins, tables and other supplies, that would be utilized to fill the
space. I will also need flyers & business cards to keep the project alive and well
promoted.

The revenue from the first popup shop at Austin Psych Fest will go towards
starting a website that will feature an online store that will continue to sell
products from our contributing vendors. This website and other social media sites
linked to "from the black lodge" will continue to spread hype about my project and
the small businesses I support. I will also use the revenue to start planning my
next popup shop.

When you contribute to this project, you will be offered a handful of rewards. I
hope something appeals to you because I am truly thankful for any and all help!
My goal is to help others, both shoppers and artists in the pursuit of keeping a
unique style, and handmade, artisan projects alive, and I am hoping this goal will
be shared by friends, family, artists and all those who appreciate the small batch,
independent business.

 Check out the gallery for photographs of your rewards!

The Impact

From the minute "From the Black Lodge" initiative begins, it will benefit the
progress of small businesses and independent artists. I know that creating and
maintaining your art, integrity and business can be difficult, and this is why I
would like to step in, and drive the success of others, who are in a position just
as myself.

I know it is not easy to get a small movement started, and everyone is struggling
in this economy, working multiple jobs, taking care of their families and making
sacrifices to stay afloat. I also know this barely leaves time to do the things that
make us happy. At the end of the day it is difficult for a working artist to find the
time that they need to promote themselves, so “From the Black Lodge” will take
on this burden, bringing valuable art to the global community.

The artists I represent are just like you and I, and I want to see them succeed by
promoting & selling their goods in my new shop.

In the past, the community that Jewelry by Adelina Mictlan has been a part of
has been very giving and supportive. All of the designers I have worked with
have gone out of their way to promote each-others work, whether it is a blog
post, instagram photo, or tweet. We genuinely believe in each other and I feel
that this strong community sense will be carried on in my new endeavour.

Some of the artists I will be working with are:

Ovate

Guts, Glam Glory

Morph

Death/Traitors

Terra Luna

Wicked Apothecary

Thrillhaus

Lisa Muerta leather works

David Guy

& many others

Other Ways You Can Help

Please remember to share this on facebook, twitter, instagram, tumblr, e-mail,
word of mouth or any other way you can think of to spread the word.
I realize that not everyone can support this project financially, but sharing this
project is just as important!

Thank you!

Anyone who would like to be included in this project please e-mail me at fromtheblacklodge@gmail.com

story:
October is Breast Cancer Awareness Month. Chances are you know someone who has been affected by breast cancer, if not yourself. Together we can support the fight against cancer and research towards a cure. 

Gunsdaily has teamed up with the owner and designer of defendthesecond.com to create this limited edition "Gun Down Breast Cancer" Design. Personally I know 3 personal freinds who have at some point in their life battled breast cancer and won. I want to increase the odds for every woman in the fight againts breast cancer, with that said, we will be donating 30% of all Shirt sales after covering our costs of production.

story:
IF YOU WISH TO PRE-ORDERING YOUR XS-4, follow this instructions:

- Choose the option that you prefer among the ones listed on Indiegogo

- Send your contribution directly to PAYPAL, id. info@exetech.it

- Write in the object "XS-4 pre-order"- seen on Indiegogo

- Write in the message your full details for shipping

- Deliveries are planned within November 2014

- Follow the project on Indiegogo "updates" sections

Exetech was founded in 2012 with the goal of designing, building and marketing a "stand alone" Smart Watch- Phone based on the Android operating system.

The first Smart Watch-Phone by Exetech, the "XS -3", was officially presented at the SMAU exhibition in Milan in October 2013, and soon after, at the WEB-SUMMIT in Dublin (where EXETECH has been selected among the most innovative startups worldwide). The XS-3 is on the market since December 2013. The first production batch has been delivered in just one week!



XS-4: THE NEW CHALLENGE by EXETECH 

In the ICT market there is never the possibility to rest, and so, since January 2014, Exetech is already working upon the new model, the "XS-4", that will come out in 2014.

The "XS-4" will be an evolution of the XS-3 characterized by a smoother design and by a great deal of amazing new technical solutions. The aim of EXETECH, with no doubts, is to create, with the XS-4, a device with the potential to become a new landmark in the growing market of the Smart Watches.



XS-4 HIGHLIGHTS

Design - by Synthesis Design
Compared with the XS-3, the XS-4 is a result of an evolution process aimed to obtain smoother surfaces without changing too much the initial "concept". The touch screen surface will become slightly curved, and the cover of the touch screen will be made in a single "glass looking" piece. Furthermore, the XS-4 will be WATER PROOF IP 67 certified.


IP67 "waterproof" through nanocoating technology

For making the XS-3 IP67 waterproof we will adopt the nanocoating technology. The internal and external surfaces of the device and of the battery will be coated by an ultrathin fluoroplymer coating, so water and aother liquids will be repelled. Exetech is the first manufacturer of Smart Watches introducing this solution.

Operating System and Software

The XS-4 will boast Android 4.4. When it comes to the Operating System, the evolution process in EXETECH is a continuous challenge: the owners of the XS-3 will take advantage of the new releases, and, in the same way, the future owner of the XS-4 will be enabled to upgrade to the new versions. The research carried on by the EXETECH engineers is aimed to improve the ergonomy of the navigation system, to reduce the battery consumption and to introduce new features and new design in the screenshots. The XS-4 will surely be equipped with the brand new choice of built-in "Exetech Chronographs". The software will include vocal commands.


Connectivity

XS-4 will upgrade to 4G

Battery

XS-4 will be equipped with an addictional 800 mah spare battery. The target is to obtain 48 hours of standby time and at least 15 hours with intense use of GPS and data connection.

Solar charging system

XS-4 will be equipped with a technology that will transforms the screen into a solar panel that can generate its own electricity. The solar cells act as light receptors and transforms that light into electricity. This technology will help to recharge the battery and will improve the standby time.

The touch screen of the XS-4 will be covered by a layer of solar cells especially designed for the SmartWatch application.

Camera

The camera of the XS-4 will be 5.0 MP

BLACK INDIEGOGO LIMITED EDITION



Features

This is the complete list of the features of XS-4

Connectivity
4G
3G
2G

Operating system
Android 4.4

Display
AMOLED
Touch screen 1.54 "
Resolution: 240x240

Processor
Model: MTK 6592 

Memory
Int Memory : 2 Gb
Est Memory : Expandable with Micro SD up to 32 GB

Size / Weight
Size (cm ) : Height 6.46 x Width 4.40 x Thickness 1.76 (case)
Weight: 66 gr

Battery
450 mah + Interchangeable spare battery 800 mah
Photovoltaic layer for battery charging

Housings underbody
Sim Card
Expansion Micro SD memory up to 32 GB

Type of call
Stand alone
Hands free
Wireless Bluetooth

Audio Video
MP3, Video 3GP/MP4

Connectivity
WI-FI
Bluetooth

Messaging - Camera - applications
SMS / MMS , E-mail
CAMERA 5.0 MP
Recorder

Sensors
GPS
G sensor

Water Resistance
Water Proof (IP 67)

Vocal Commands

Certifications
CE - FCC - ROHS


Packaging Content:

  • XS-4

  • Bluetooth headset

  • Mini Headphone

  • 420 mah Battery

  • 800 mah Battery

  • Micro USB cable

  • Wall adapter

  • Intruction Manual

XS-4 Prototype - 1st stage - 4/6/14

Find here below the first picture of the 1st stage prototype of the XS-4. We have already used the new touch screen with curved surface (you can appreciate its remarkable luminosity!), and the new processor MTK6592. We are currently carrying on the debugging of the version 4.2.2 of Android (intermediate step before skipping to the final version for the XS-4 that will be Android 4.4) Unfortunately our funding campaign is still so slow....we hope that this news will help people to give us some more trust!

Note: the materials and the colours of this prototype are not definitive..it's made with prototyping techniques!


FUNDRAISING AIM

The aim of the fundraising will be to finance the manufacturing of the new dies that are necessary to produce the XS-4. Furthermore, the fundraising will help to produce the first batch of XS-4. We can warrant the delivery of the XS-4 within November 2014.

Analytics Cloud Service NEW - IF WE REACH AT LEAST 20,000 EUROS
If we reach at least 20.000 Euros, the XS-4 smart watch will be powered by a smart data and analytics cloud service. The cloud platform will gather XS-4 usage data and transform it into user analytics and insights – a unique and key value-add compared to other market offerings. The XS-4 would include a much richer application experience that would provide the users with personalized usage analytics, inform them on how they are benefitting from the XS-4 smart watch, and  enable them to share their data with other users. Moreover, users will be able to share the XS-4 smart watch with friends and family and still enjoy a personalized experience.


THEY TALK ABOUT EXETECH

http://smartwatches.org/crowdfunding/exetech-xs-4-solid-investment/

http://www.engadget.com/2014/04/24/exetech-xs-4-re-launch-indiegogo/?ncid=rss_truncated

http://noticias.terra.es/exetech-xs-4-el-reloj-que-tambien-es-telefono,9ed9134b69395410VgnVCM20000099cceb0aRCRD.html

http://www.androidheadlines.com/2014/04/exetech-turns-indie-gogo-help-new-smartwatch-xs-4.html

http://www.engadget.com/2014/03/11/exetech-xs-3-smartwatch-hands-on/

http://www.morningledger.com/exetech-xs-3-is-the-new-italian-made-standalone-smartwatch/135544/

http://www.forbes.com/sites/ewanspence/2013/11/02/2014-will-be-the-year-of-wearable-technology/

http://www.telecomasia.net/content/2014-nomophobia-and-device-debutantes

http://www.dazeddigital.com/artsandculture/article/18152/1/best-top-ten-wearable-tech-inventions

http://www.vitadasmartphone.it/smartwatch-quale-scegliere/ 

http://www.androidsmartwatch.net/xs-3-smart-watch

http://multimedia.quotidiano.net/video/cronaca/smau-2013-le-migliori-innovazioni-in-mostra-gi-52283



TECH BLOG FB Page


Many articles and reviews published all over the world. Just go on the "Google", type "Exetech XS-3" and check!

REFER AND WIN

Indiegogo allows users and backers to advertise the URL of a project. When doing so, the URL will include automatically your username, allowing Indiegogo and us to track how many people have been referred and how much money has been raised through the referrals. We will give one of XS-4 for free to every Indiegogo user which referrals will generate at least 1000 Euros of fund raised!
