with friends and family and still enjoy a personalized experience.THEY TALK ABOUT EXETECHhttp://smartwatches.org/crowdfunding/exetech-xs-4-solid-investment/http://www.engadget.com/2014/04/24/exetech-xs-4-re-launch-indiegogo/?ncid=rss_truncatedhttp://noticias.terra.es/exetech-xs-4-el-reloj-que-tambien-es-telefono,9ed9134b69395410VgnVCM20000099cceb0aRCRD.htmlhttp://www.androidheadlines.com/2014/04/exetech-turns-indie-gogo-help-new-smartwatch-xs-4.htmlhttp://www.engadget.com/2014/03/11/exetech-xs-3-smartwatch-hands-on/http://www.morningledger.com/exetech-xs-3-is-the-new-italian-made-standalone-smartwatch/135544/http://www.forbes.com/sites/ewanspence/2013/11/02/2014-will-be-the-year-of-wearable-technology/http://www.telecomasia.net/content/2014-nomophobia-and-device-debutanteshttp://www.dazeddigital.com/artsandculture/article/18152/1/best-top-ten-wearable-tech-inventionshttp://www.vitadasmartphone.it/smartwatch-quale-scegliere/  http://www.androidsmartwatch.net/xs-3-smart-watchhttp://multimedia.quotidiano.net/video/cronaca/smau-2013-le-migliori-innovazioni-in-mostra-gi-52283TECH BLOG FB PageMany articles and reviews published all over the world. Just go on the "Google", type "Exetech XS-3" and check!REFER AND WINIndiegogo allows users and backers to advertise the URL of a project. When doing so, the URL will include automatically your username, allowing Indiegogo and us to track how many people have been referred and how much money has been raised through the referrals. We will give one of XS-4 for free to every Indiegogo user which referrals will generate at least 1000 Euros of fund raised!

story:
What is Woolings?

Our spiritual journey called Woolings started 4 years ago. .. Our inner calling for human warmth, peaceful mind and unity made us launch the production of handmade footwear. As devoted environmentalists we use only best wool as a centrepiece of our product and we take special pride in that.All is 100% handmade in ideal conditions bringing forward positive energy to our customers.Our product is warm, light, soft, waterproof, anti-slippery and comfortable to wear. 

Help us to build new process of manufacturing

We thoroughly look after all the elements of production and maintain the highest possible level of quality. One pair of Woolings requires about 10 hours of precise and methodic handcraft. Every small detail including back-heels and soles are handmade using special rubber material that we invented ourselves.

We believe that our footwear must be accessible for a wider audience and this is why we reach out for your support. The time has come for us to rethink our production strategy and look for more ergonomic and modern ways of manufacturing. We need to upgrade our existing machinery and tools in order to lower the production costs. When all is done our beautiful and comfortable, nature-friendly, original, custom-made, footwear will be available for everyone in many different variations and great prices!

The money received for this campaign will be used for reducing the costs of manufacturing, which will substantially reduce the price and make our shoes affordable for more people around the world!

If we receive:

1 000 EUR we would buy wool, eyelets, shoe laces and material for soles and back heels in bulk. 

2 000 EUR we would buy new wooden lasts instead of old plastic lasts and get a European patent on our current production technology.

3 000 EUR we would buy forms for making soles and back heels that would speed up the production in several times!

5 000 EUR right now we produce 20 pairs of Woolings shoes per month. Due to financial constraints we are forced to produce our rubber for soles and back heels in the courtyard, which is unreliable, since we are highly dependant on weather. That is we need to upgrade our old machinery, buy new ones and reorganise our current manufactory in order to increase monthly production capacity up to 50 pairs of cheap Woolings shoes and 20 pairs of custom made Woolings.

30 000 EUR and more we would organise a completely new manufactory, where it would be possible to produce up to 200 pairs of cheap Woolings and 80 of custom made Woolings per month. Also, we would use different, more innovative production technology that would allow us to produce our shoes more cheaper and in a way that is even less harmful to the nature!

What you receive?

Everybody who will support our campaign will receive something special from us!

– Woolings on-line shoes 

Choose any presented model you love!  Help us to create a new Woolings line witch will present 5 to 8 models every season and will be ready for shipping. Oh... You get them twice cheaper n' quicker.

To starf of with...our first on-line collection called "Light" .

Light as a feather, 

Bright as the light.

Woolings on your feet

Make you feel right! 

– Woolings shoes 

Woolings  offers You unlimited design choice, but only You know what is best for your feet!  Inspire yourself from any given model at our website and create your own pair @ http://www.woolings.com/constructor 


– Handmade pashmina scarfs 

made from finest cashmere fibre. They are hand spun, woven and embroidered specially for Woolings in city Kasmir, a historical place in India where cashmere shawls have been manufactured for thousands of years.

Below you can find the colour card where you can choose any colour you like and a pashmina scarf will be handmade specially for you!


Please share the campaign on social networks with a has tag #woolingsgogo

If you have any ideas that might help us to improve our brand or promote this campaign, please send them on m@woolings.com

Please visit our page, go share and like and help us build a stronger and more accessible footwear for each and everyone around the world! 

Thank you!

story:
I have to admit that it was somewhat daunting at first to design a watch to succeed our current SQ38 Plano, due to its universal appeal and debonair balance between elegance and modernity. In the end however I decided that the best way to follow up was simply to keep the soul intact, but give it a body and character all its own.

Novem, Latin for the number 9 refers here to the 9 phases of the moon, but has been an auspicious digit in the history of many ancient cultures. It also traditionally represents the limit or ultimate attainment, as it is the last number in the base 10 system.

The geometries of Novem's case and detailing draw inspiration from a wide variety of sources, but one stands out in particular. The Hallwyl Museum in Stockholm. Both Palace and practical residence at once, with sweeping eccentric forms as well as sharp geometries. It embodies both the classic turn of the century elegance along with many technically advanced, and for it's time, futuristic features such as telephone, electricity and central heating.

Now since this campaign is running InDemand, after successful funding on Kickstarter, it does already come with some pretty amazing add-ons for everyone. Starting at the top there's the FREE strap & battery change when you need it, then at the 500% mark we added a double layer of AR coating on the inside of the lens to remove unwanted reflections, and lastly, not too long ago actually, the final 50 backers unlocked the FREE Suplon Summer strap (seen here below). So in order to get to the, eh... bottom of this, we need your help! Let's reach 1300% so that I can finally make those screen printed initials!

Suplon Summer Straps come Flax, Navy, Black, Cognac & Army. It's basically the replacement for both and NATO. A shape knitted Nylon wristband made on the same type of machine as those lightweight sneakers on your feet. Washable, breathable, super adjustable, hypoallergenic & comfortable. What more do you want!? Developed completely in-house here at squarestreet. No one else has this, unless they copied us. 

Anyway, without further ado, here it is. Asymmetric case, hidden pushers, true sapphire crystal lens, custom moon phase and a look all its own. Scroll down to get up close and personal with Novem, and if you like what you see, let's push this all the way home!

Detail shot showing the engraved intersecting lines of the dial

Reverse detail shot showing off hidden pusher and case assymetry.

Showing off the lines of the case and the screw-in strap attachment.

Detail shot of the polished gold buckle.

Perspective shot showing both case and dial in all its glory.

The SQ39 Novem GWCR

Up close with our geometrically padded calf strap.

Detail of the laser etched guilloche case back and notches.

All Paper box made from micro patterned art paper.

The watch rests gently on a paper support structure inside.

No foam, no plastic, no waste. 100% recyclable. The way a box should be made.

With Novem it's all about the details, so let's take a closer look at what it is that makes this Chronograph Moon Phase so intriguing.

Bored of telling the time? Get a magnifying glass and solve this maze.

Dual layer dial for more depth and three dimensional detail.

The horns of Novem. A case shape as iconic as they come.

The machined solid stainless steel buckle echoes the geometries of our Ridgeback strap.

The Novem dial showcases a wealth of intersecting engraved Guilloche lines.

So these 3 options are the core collection that we shot for the campaign. The most natural combination of case and strap, at least according to us.

These are the other 6 good looking possibilities.

The All Black was added during the Kickstarter campaign due to popular demand, and is actually a bit of a personal favourite now.

Alexis & William

Behind every great brand are equally amazing people, and squarestreet has 2. Alexis Holm on your left spearheading the creative and William on the right keeping it all together. We don't bring in any 3rd parties. Every image, video, graphic, idea and copy is designed, shot, fillmed, created, thought up and written by us.

If you're still not convinced, then click play below to check out our short style video showing Novem in motion.

story:
Summary

Hello! I’m Mary Alice, the founder and designer behind the brand Alice Alexander. Alice Alexander is a size-inclusive, ethically-made women’s apparel company. We’ve launched this crowdfunding campaign to fund the next stage of growth in our development! We’re seeking funding to grow our company, expand our reach and open our combined brick and mortar shop/ production studio in Philadelphia.

As a plus-size consumer myself so much of what’s available in my size is either cheap, flimsy, fast-fashion or oversized boxy silhouettes in muted colors—definitely not my style. Furthermore finding garments that were ethically-made and of natural materials felt impossible. I started sewing my own clothes and fell in love (and became just a wee bit obsessed). Simultaneously, I enrolled in design school while working full-time.

We launched our company in September 2017 with a small collection for sizes 12-28. With our newest collection we’ve expanded our size range to be truly size-inclusive including sizes 0-28. And our promise to you is that if our size chart doesn’t work for your body, that’s on us, and we’ll make something just for you at no additional cost. 

Unlike most clothing companies, we design, manufacture and retail 100% of our garments. No outsourcing and no wholesale means we’re able to provide a truly superior garment made of natural fibers and constructed using high end finishes at a fair price. It also allows us to build a relationship with our customer, inviting them into our process and cultivating an appreciation for slowed-down fashion. 

Campaign contributors will help us bring our message of size-inclusive, ethically-made women’s apparel to the world! We’re offering a variety of perks to backers including 30% off our entire warm weather collection through pre-order.  Pre-ordering allows us to control our costs by only ordering bulk fabric and producing garments after they’ve been purchased by the consumer. This means less waste for the planet, and more savings for you. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $20,000 to get our warm weather collection into the hands of 100+ women through PRE-ORDER and take the first step towards opening our combined brick and mortar shop/ production space in Philadelphia. We’re offering supporters a variety of perks in exchange for their contribution! 

All of our perks can be viewed in detail in the right hand column (as well as on alicealexander.co) but here are some we’re most excited by (but let’s be serious, they’re all awesome!) 

  • Commemorative Hand-stamped Copper Plaque- Show everyone your support for the campaign! This hand stamped copper plaque will be proudly displayed in our retail shop/ production studio for years to come. Write your name, well wishes, or inspirational quote.  
  • The Linen Joggers-comfortable and styish, our linen joggers can go anywhere.  Made of 100% 7.5 oz Belgian linen, sturdy enough to last for years to come, but light enough to keep you cool.

  • The Moto Jacket/ Jogger Set- Wear it together to look like a total boss, or mix and match these pieces with other items in your wardrobe. Our moto jacket is cropped at the waist,  has an asymmetrical zipper, button cuffs and fully functional zip pockets (that are actually big enough for stuff! Trust us, we tested 'em!). 

 

Here is how we plan to spend funds raised:

  • Fulfill all our perks! You guessed it, fulfilling the clothing orders will be the bulk of our expenses. Between non-clothing (commemorative plaque, tote bags) and producing the collection (wholesale fabric, hangtags and labor) this accounts for 51% of our expenses. 
  • Research and development- as a clothing company truly dedicated to size-inclusivity this takes a lot of hard work (and funds!). Working with an experienced pattern maker, fit models in a variety of sizes and customer feedback we plan to further refine the fit of our garments. We plan to invest 18% of our funds into this aspect of our business. 
  • Branding and marketing- it’s hard to grow a business if no one knows about us! Up until this point all our website, branding, writing, social media has been 100% DIY. It’s time for our visual presence to reflect the quality of our garments and for us to expand our reach connecting with more women who are looking for size-inclusive, ethically-made apparel. 
  • Upgraded equipment- Faster machines, a larger cutting table, better organizational systems will all contribute to increasing both our efficiency and quality. We plan to invest 10% of our funds into equipment. 
  • Credit Card and Indiegogo Fees: A portion of funds will go to Indiegogo for hosting the     campaign as well as credit card transaction fees. 

We’ve elected the flexible funding option. If we do not reach our entire goal, we will still fulfill perk rewards and will seek alternative funding to meet our other goals. 

The Impact

Often times when I talk about this company I talk very little about the actual clothes. In fact Alice Alexander is about much more than the garments (although they're amazing). It's about demonstrating that women of all sizes deserve beautifully made, high quality clothing. It's about inclusion and visibility. It's about proving that you don't have to choose between style, ethics and size--you really can have it all. 

Risks & Challenges

Launching a clothing company and sustaining that company is no small feat and comes with risk in sourcing, production and retail. We've purposefully designed our business model in such a way that takes on the least amount of risk. By using a pre-order model (instead of producing THEN selling) helps us control our costs. By manufacturing ourselves allows us to ensure quality.

Thankfully we've surrounded ourselves with an amazing team and resources and we are confident we will be able to meet our goals. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Beyond contributing to this campaign, absolutely the most important thing you can do is SHARE this campaign. Personal emails are incredibly effective! Email your friends and family and share why you believe size-inclusivity and ethical fashion matter! Sharing on Facebook takes just a second and posting to Instagram is also a great way to share. Indiegogo makes it easy using built-in sharing tools, so don't be shy! :)

Thank you for reading, sharing and contributing! And if you have any questions you can reach us directly at hello@alicealexander.co 

Special thank you to Linda Mattice at Aztech Productions  aztechproductions.com; Adam Barnard at adambarnardphotos.com; and Sarah Elizabeth FACE https://www.sarahelizabethface.com

story:
The science | Design | Which one is You? | Tricks | Leather designs | The ball | Why Indiegogo? | Shipping | Perks detailed | FAQ

Dear Friends,

Feel Flux is now available again via Indiegogo's InDemand service and our new online store as well. We still offer FREE shipping to Europe, USA and Canada!

We are super excited to announce that we have finally released the Magnet Shield as a new perk on our Indiegogo campaign page. This cast iron case will help you hold your neodymium ball while protecting your hard drives, mechanical watches, bank cards, etc. from the strong magnetic field. (SOLD OUT)

If you have already pre-ordered your set of FLUX, choose the new perk and we will ship all items in the same package. If you have not contributed yet, choose your favourite perk and add $30 for the Magnet Shield.

Please note that the look of the final product might slightly differ from the rendered image due to manufacturing reasons.





FEEL FLUX is a brand new physics-based toy that amazes and amuses you with its jaw-dropping anti-gravity effect. Whether you’re a a science enthusiast, a juggler, or a design fanatic you’ll find endless fun in playing with FLUX.

Each FLUX  product is a set of two components made of the most exquisite metals on Earth, natural materials, which behave very surprisingly while interacting with each other. One of the components is a metal tube made of aluminum, copper, or even pure silver. The other one is small, shiny ball, made of neodymium, the strongest kind of permanent magnets available on the planet. To get started, just drop the ball through the tube, but be prepared for something absolutely unexpected.

The ball falling through the tube slows down seemingly defying gravity, and does it without any former sign of unusual behavior. You feel no attraction or repulsion between the parts prior to the drop, you don’t see the effect coming and you most probably cannot explain it. Yet.

Back to the top

Design

When we first encountered the amazing effect caused by Lenz’s law as undergraduate students, we instantaneously knew that we need to make a product based on it. Not only did we want to create an experiment tool, but also a design that is a testament on our respect for science, and also enables ways of use which make the effect fun and impossible to get bored of. We wanted a product which lets you understand and feel magnetodynamics in your very own sensual way, and encourages you to take the magic you've learnt and use it to amaze your friends.

That’s how we came up with the final designs of Flux, a fine piece of modern engineering to play with, and a timeless beauty to behold.

The tubes come in multiple materials and different shapes, but each version is precisely turned and comes wrapped in a fine natural leather ribbon that seamlessly blends into the surface of the metal. This cover gives flux a unique and premium look, gives your palm a soft touch and solid grip, and most of all gives you the opportunity to choose your very own set of colors. No matter who you are and how you intend to use Flux, there is a version which is you. The only question is:


Back to the top

Which one is You?


FLUX Original

The first and mightiest version of all is FLUX Original. It is crafted from solid copper, a luxurious and beautiful metal that has an outstanding electrical conductivity. This means that FLUX Original offers the most intense and stunning gravity-defying effect. 

Holding the copper tube in your hands and gazing into the slowly receding reflections on the almost floating ball makes you forget about the rushing world outside. FLUX keeps your hands busy, but unleashes your thoughts. We recommend it for those who love to feel something physical in their hands during relaxation, meditation or thought experimentation. FLUX Original was born to be in the hands of daydreamers.


Skill FLUX

Skill FLUX is the choice of those who are ready to take Lenz’s law to a whole new level. It’s lathed from solid aluminum, which is a great conductor and much lighter than copper. Its size and shape has been designed to support playful gaming and to enable mastering creative tricks.

For skill toy magicians Lenz’s law and its anti-gravity effect is a brand new field with endless unexplored possibilities. Grab a Skill FLUX, and be the first to create tricks on your own, that would have been impossible before. With this unknown and hidden rule of physics in your pocket, you can do tricks that will leave even your juggler friends speechless.



Fluxury

And there is Fluxury. It is, quite simply,  the most luxurious version - not for everyone, but for those who are really longing for a magical treasure that signifies their admiration for science. Made of solid sterling silver, Fluxury is like a jewelry that is completely hand-made by a silversmith artist to last centuries in the possession of your family, and be passed on for endless generations. Beside uniqueness, Fluxury also excels in performance. For silver has the very best electrical conductivity among metals, it gives the most intense effect you can get with metals according to physics as we know it. Such a treasure might be the perfect graduation gift for an engineer student, or someone who appreciates physics, beauty or value.


Back to the top

Tricks

We made this video after just a few hours of play to show you where the fun with FLUX begins. Have you ever played with a yoyo or a kendama? Juggling balls, maybe? Imagine what you could achieve with this entirely new generation of skill toys. Create new tricks, share with other players and join the building of a new sport community. There is a lot to come. Choose Skill Set if you want to start mastering tricks right away!


Back to the top

The Science

FLUX is based on a complex, thus rarely known law of physics, a phenomenon called Lenz’s law, which can defy our most commonly experienced physical law, gravity itself. It’s actually nothing new. Heinrich Lenz discovered it in the 1830s, we call it Lenz’s law to honor his discovery ever since.

Every time the magnetic field changes inside a conducting material, it induces a voltage called electromotive force. Depending on the resistance of the material, it creates a current which behaves just like in traditional electromagnets: produces an additional magnetic field. Lenz’s law states that the magnetic field created by this induced current is so directed as to oppose the change in the source flux. To put it more simply, if you create a changing magnetic field by moving a magnet, it will produce a mechanical force trying to slow down the motion. The faster you move, the stronger the force gets. Every time.

Back to the top

Leather designs

Chose your favorite leather colour for your new FLUX.

Back to the top

The Ball


Beside the beautiful tubes of Flux, the magnet ball you get is a spectacularity itself. 

Neodymium magnets are the most powerful types of permanent magnets available on the planet, and even they come in different strengths of magnetization grades (N35 – N52). The ball you get is a grade N52 magnet, which means it is the strongest magnet humankind can produce – and it’s manufactured just for us. This means you cannot purchase this level of strength in this shape and size anywhere else right now. The magnet can hold a weight of up to 15 kgs, it turns toward north of a flat surface and will even find nails underneath a wooden floor and orbits around them. Its strength is a lot of fun, but as always, great power comes with great responsibility. You need to be aware of the strength and the potential danger of the ball, and there are a few restrictions you should observe.

  • Keep a distance of at least 50 cm between the ball and any magnetizable object or other magnets.

  • The magnet can produce extremely high acceleration to magnetizable objects or other magnets. This can cause high speed impacts thus injuries.

  • Do not put the magnet close to any medical appliances, especially a pacemaker or metal implants.

  • Avoid the magnet getting close to sensitive devices especially measurement instruments, precise mechanical clocks/watches, hard disk drives, displays or any electronic devices.

  • Neodymium magnets are fragile, and may shatter on high impact. Make sure you play above soft surfaces away from other magnets and attractable objects. Learn more about fragility in the FAQ.

  • Never give the magnet to a child without adult supervision.

  • Never give the magnet to anyone who is not informed about the aforementioned rules.

  • PLEASE NOTE THAT WE DO NOT TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR ANY INJURIES OR DAMAGES CAUSED BY THE MAGNET

Back to the top

Why Indiegogo?


We’re a team of industrial designers and engineers with a dream of delivering a magical law of physics into the palm of those who would admire it. We have the passion and the expertise to execute this project, all we lack is the financial background. So that’s where Indiegogo and you guys come into the picture.

We’ve built up a supply chain for the metal tubes and the magnets, we have partners who are ready to do the CNC lathing and the leather-work, and we even haggled the most competitive worldwide shipping prices available. All we need now is you and your contributions to bring our well planned process to life and deliver this extraordinary product to the world. To express our gratitude we will get the first FLUXes ever created right into your hands. Moreover we guarantee that you won’t believe your eyes and that is one tough promise to keep.

Back to the top

Shipping


Every perk includes FREE SHIPPING to the US, Canada and Europe including countries outside of the European Union.

Back to the top

Perks detailed

Back to the top

FAQ


Q: How can I specify the leather color and the desktop stand design?

A: After the campaign has been finished successfully, we’ll send you an email asking about your preferences in leather color and desktop stand variations.

Q: How can I add the price of the shipping to my perk?

A: Once you've selected your perk, you are asked to set the amount of the contribution. There you see the default contribution value, which can be modified. Just rewrite that number to the one that includes the shipping price (+$20 for most cases) and you're done.

Q.: Does EU shipping mean the continent, or the European Union?

A: Free shipping includes all european countries, even those outside the EU. So it’s free for Switzerland, Norway, Liechtenstein, Andorra, Iceland, and for Eastern Europe as well.

Q: You only give one magnet ball in each reward. Why? Can I get more?

A: We only give one ball for each set, because two of these super-strong neodymium magnets would be capable of producing so strong attractions that would make the set more dangerous. Even one ball requires very careful attention while playing, but we have found this level of risk well below the threshold of being considered as potentially dangerous if you keep the few restrictions in mind. However, handling two balls exceeds this threshold, the two balls can perform a very high speed collision even if careful attention was payed. If you completely understand the potential risk of multiple balls and still want to get more, contact us and we’ll discuss it.


Q: What if I forgot to add the shipping cost?

A: If you forgot to add the cost of international shipping to your perk, you can do it by placing another perk of donation in the same value. In this case please send us a mail to inform us about the separately placed contributions. If you don’t realize you forgot adding the money, we’ll send you a PayPal invoice so you can refund the difference. If you refuse to pay for the shipping, you can chose to set an EU or US address, or get your money back, but in the latter case the Indiegogo and PayPal transaction fees will be discounted.

Q: Are the tubes getting deformed throughout the practice?

A: Skill Flux is made for performing great tricks which comes with numerous high impacts with the ball. For aluminum and copper are being relatively soft metals, the powerful impacts may leave small dots on the surface of the Flux. At just a few dots it could look like damage, but hard-core fluxers will soon have tubes continuously covered with ball marks, which lead to an even more unique and just as beautiful surface. For this we say Flux doesn't get damaged, it matures.

Q: Neodymium magnets are known to be fragile, how about that?

A: Yes, Nd magnets are usually fragile and capable of cracking and chipping. However, the spherical form of the ball makes the magnet durable and less likely to crack. We had numerous drops on concrete and ceramic floor, we even collided two balls several times and still experienced no breaks. But this does not mean that the balls can't crack, be very cautious all the time and avoid dropping the ball on hard surfaces. Play above grass or carpet or anything soft. While you shouldn't expect instant breaks, the coating of the ball is likely to get damaged and that's something you don't want.

Q: Does the copper tube gets oxidized?

A: Yes. It is made of pure copper and behaves accordingly. We did not find any suitable coating that preserves the shiny finish of the freshly turned copper and proves to be durable enough for the ball impacts. As soon as we find out anything useful, we'll let you know and you can decide to take the coating or not. However, many people liked the matte surface better, it also goes well with the leather cover.

Back to the top

story:
Watch My Video Above to Hear and See What I'm Doing for You and Why!

What is Jules - More than Makeup?

Jules - More than Makeup is a line of makeup kits designed to create beautiful looks on anyone, without the guesswork. Jules kits come in a variety of color pairings matched to to work perfectly together. Plus, they come with education, in the form of video tutorials, so that anyone can master application and think like a makeup artist!

Who is Jules?

I am! My name is Jules De Jesus Fritz and I have been a makeup artist for 17 years. I have spent the past 7 years as the creative mind and heart behind Dollface by Jules in Savannah, Georgia. I make women look and feel gorgeous, whether on their wedding day or on the catwalk. My work and I have been featured in print in South Magazine, Do Savannah, and Savannah Magazine, and online on Wall Street Journal, Simply Stine, and Travels with Minis, Shop My Savannah, and on TV with WTOC, Paula Deen Network, and Entertainment Tonight.



But, before all that, I was a counter girl. That job required me to push products that clients didn’t need and that I didn’t believe in. Having to do that hurt, and I knew that in the future, I wanted to do everything I could to give clear, honest advice and develop products both you and I can trust.

I have had over a thousand women sit in my chair and talk to me about their concerns. You wish you knew exactly what to use and how. You wish you had a makeup artist in your pocket who understands your needs.

I am that makeup artist, I hear you, and I want to help you.


My mission

My mission is to connect and engage with clients, helping them to think like a makeup artist with simplified products and education.

I understand the concerns of the busy bee and the mom -- I am both! You’re loaded down with tasks but you still want to look and feel good. It’s so important to invest whatever time you can in yourself to accomplish that, but with the sea of products out there, it gets overwhelming and confusing. I don’t want you to waste what little, precious time you have. I designed products that you can trust to look great on you. 

I wiped away stress by composing the palettes with colors that work seamlessly together, on truly anyone. And, these products are so high quality, you can even dance in the rain with them. Look, I proved it!


But great products aren’t enough. That’s why I teach you step by step how to use every product so you can create looks you’ll feel confident in.

Why I need you

Dollface and More than Makeup are both completely homegrown brands. My husband Josh and I have been putting in the hours and passion to the Jules brands, even from within our own home. In fact, Josh has been applying the labels to our products himself in our kitchen! As much as we can do on our own and with our incredible team, we need your support to help us make this line a tangible reality.

With your investment, our team will be able to produce and fulfill product orders, film videos for each collection, and teach more classes. In the future, we'll design more kits, release new colors, and produce more tutorials.

Plus, your pledge is a pre-sale of one of our perks! You can view the descriptions of these on the right, but here are the kits we’re so proud of:


Our Redy or Not Lip Kit includes a gorgeous gold retractable brush and a crème pot of lipstick that comes in a shade of red that looks beautiful on everyone, including you! Or, try our exciting orange shade, Orange You Glad!


Brighten up your beautiful face with this splash of citrus color! This orange shade is incredibly versatile and can be used as a cheek stain too!

In support of Breast Cancer Awareness, we are releasing our amazing HOT pink lip color. Help us Paint The Town PINK and get yours now!

This Ninja aka amazing gel eyeliner pencil is a must have!  Intense, rich color that lasts all day and into the night. Glides on easily and dries waterproof!


Not sure which brushes to buy?  Here's our handy 6 piece travel set with the essential you'll need. I'll show you several ways to use these PRO tools in upcoming video tutorials.


Need a crème eyeshadow that won't let you down? I've got you covered! My Evershadow Crème Pots are creaseless and waterproof, so they won't melt off throughout the day. They also make for gorgeous bases for powder shadows!

Left to right: Onyx, Dark Chocolate, Bare, Lavender, and Plum



Check out Our Kits!


Select your Brooke Atwood Leather Tee! Only 5 Available!



Our Calendar

  • Research & development - 2010-2012

  • Featured in South Magazine - April-May 2011

  • Featured in South Magazine - October-November 2012

  • Soft launch at Savannah Fashion Week - May 1, 2014

  • Featured on Interview by the Wall Street Journal - June 8

  • Featured on Travels with Minis - August 11

  • Featured on Simply Stine - August 13

  • WTOC story: Savannah's Fashion Night Transforms Broughton Street - August 26

  • IndieGoGo Campaign Launch - September 4

  • First ever Red Lip Bar at Fashion’s Night Out in Savannah - September 4

  • Featured on Entertainment Tonight - September 23

  • Featured on Paula Deen Network - September 24

  • Savannah Sharks debut on Paula Deen Network Episode "Cheer Paula Up" - September 24

  • Featured on Extra - September 25

  • Special Class for Tater Bugs Eco Baby Store "Mommy & Me Makeup" - September 27

  • Featured in South Magazine - October-November

  • Sponsored makeup for Dancing with Savannah Stars - October 2

    • Red Lip Bar at reception

  • Startup Lounge venture capitalist event - October 9

  • Red Lip Bar at DineSouth - October 16

  • Hot Pink Lip Bar at Shades of Pink event for breast cancer research - October 16

  • WTOC story: Starting Your Business Through Crowd Funding - October 17
  • Lip Bar at The Great Ogeechee Seafood Festival - October 18
  • Special Class for Savannah Sharks All-Star Cheer Squad - October 21
  • Special Class for Savannah Chamber Council "Makeup for the Busy Woman" - October 28

  • Featured in Savannah Magazine Christmas Shopping Guide (not yet on shelves) - November 1

  • Savannah Sharks' Cheer Showcase - November 9
  • Beauty series on WTOC debuts - TBA
  • Savannah Weddings Magazine Cover - December
  • Savannah Sharks' Cheer Competition - December 6
  • Jules - More than Makeup officially launches - December, with your help!


Shipping Notes


  • Once the campaign is over, we will email you to confirm your kit selection.

  • Our goal is to deliver by Christmas 2014.

  • Shipping is included in your chosen reward level for continental US orders.

  • Shipping to non-continental US, Canada, or Mexico require an additional $10.

  • Other international orders require an additional $20.

Why I need you
Dollface and More than Makeup are both completely homegrown brands. My husband Josh and I have been putting in the hours and passion to the Jules brands, even from within our own home. In fact, Josh has been applying the labels to our products himself in our kitchen! As much as we can do on our own and with our incredible team, we need your support to help us make this line a tangible reality.
With your investment, our team will be able to produce and fulfill product orders, film videos for each collection, and teach more classes. In the future, we'll design more kits, release new colors, and produce more tutorials.
Plus, your pledge is a pre-sale of one of our perks! You can view the descriptions of these on the right, but here are the kits we’re so proud of:

Our Redy or Not Lip Kit includes a gorgeous gold retractable brush and a crème pot of lipstick that comes in a shade of red that looks beautiful on everyone, including you! Or, try our exciting orange shade, Orange You Glad!

Brighten up your beautiful face with this splash of citrus color! This orange shade is incredibly versatile and can be used as a cheek stain too!

In support of Breast Cancer Awareness, we are releasing our amazing HOT pink lip color. Help us Paint The Town PINK and get yours now!

This Ninja aka amazing gel eyeliner pencil is a must have!  Intense, rich color that lasts all day and into the night. Glides on easily and dries waterproof! 


Not sure which brushes to buy?  Here's our handy 6 piece travel set with the essential you'll need. I'll show you several ways to use these PRO tools in upcoming video tutorials.
Need a crème eyeshadow that won't let you down? I've got you covered! My Evershadow Crème Pots are creaseless and waterproof, so they won't melt off throughout the day. They also make for gorgeous bases for powder shadows!









Left to right: Onyx, Dark Chocolate, Bare, Lavender, and Plum


Check out Our Kits!






Select your Brooke Atwood Leather Tee! Only 5 Available! 







Our Calendar


Research & development - 2010-2012
Featured in South Magazine - April-May 2011
Featured in South Magazine - October-November 2012
Soft launch at Savannah Fashion Week - May 1, 2014
Featured on Interview by the Wall Street Journal - June 8
Featured on Travels with Minis - August 11
Featured on Simply Stine - August 13
WTOC story: Savannah's Fashion Night Transforms Broughton Street - August 26

IndieGoGo Campaign Launch - September 4
First ever Red Lip Bar at Fashion’s Night Out in Savannah - September 4
Featured on Entertainment Tonight - September 23
Featured on Paula Deen Network - September 24
Savannah Sharks debut on Paula Deen Network Episode "Cheer Paula Up" - September 24

Featured on Extra - September 25
Special Class for Tater Bugs Eco Baby Store "Mommy & Me Makeup" - September 27

Featured in South Magazine - October-November
Sponsored makeup for Dancing with Savannah Stars - October 2
Red Lip Bar at reception
Startup Lounge venture capitalist event - October 9
Red Lip Bar at DineSouth - October 16
Hot Pink Lip Bar at Shades of Pink event for breast cancer research - October 16
WTOC story: Starting Your Business Through Crowd Funding - October 17

Lip Bar at The Great Ogeechee Seafood Festival - October 18

Special Class for Savannah Sharks All-Star Cheer Squad - October 21


Special Class for Savannah Chamber Council "Makeup for the Busy Woman" - October 28

Featured in Savannah Magazine Christmas Shopping Guide (not yet on shelves) - November 1
Savannah Sharks' Cheer Showcase - November 9
Beauty series on WTOC debuts - TBA
Savannah Weddings Magazine Cover - December

Savannah Sharks' Cheer Competition - December 6

Jules - More than Makeup officially launches - December, with your help!



Shipping Notes

Once the campaign is over, we will email you to confirm your kit selection.
Our goal is to deliver by Christmas 2014.
Shipping is included in your chosen reward level for continental US orders. 
Shipping to non-continental US, Canada, or Mexico require an additional $10. 
Other international orders require an additional $20.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Kathryn Paterwic and I am a Fashion Designer based out of CT. I mainly design Steampunk fashion but have also been know to wander into the realms of Pin Up, Goth, Lolita, Punk, Renaissance wear and Historical Reenactments. I have been seen at fashion shows as far west and Teslacon in WI (where I was the featured Designer) and Steampunk Worlds Fair in NJ and as close as TempleCon in RI. I have been popular fashion books: Anatomy of Steampunk and 1001 cosplay creation to name just a few and have had the honor of being asked to be the keynote speak for a meeting of the Costumers Association of America where we discussed retrofuturisim.

I am looking to raise money to get us to another convention, normally I make it on my own but due to circumstances beyond my control I can’t do it alone this time. This convention is literally what I do and will open us up to a bigger and more influential market (NYC). It will also get us more exposure outside the Steampunk Community, and allow me to sell of my accumulated stock built over the course of the past year. 

What We Need & What You Get

I am looking to raise $1000, not for me to make the line, that has already happened and not for me to get a table to sell at but for things like Gas, food, and most important a hotel room. I am looking at getting a suite (not a fancy one, more like to rooms one with a bed and one with a pull out couch) at a hotel for my assistant, myself and for more importantly for the models and hair and makeup to make sure they have a place to stay incase we get out really late. I want my best foot forward on this so I am recruiting my best girls (which are also all volunteers) who happen to be from MA and RI, My hair and make up are also from RI.  I am not sure how many people it will end up being, but it could range from 3 to 6. No matter how much money I raise here, all the money will go to getting Redfield designs to RuffleCon whether it is a tank of gas or a hotel room. 

    The Impact

    Part of it is to let people know that there are people like them out there. I was a geek in high school and that was before being a geek was cool. I did not know that half of the stuff that is out there now was out there and yeah it was kind of lonely. I fell into sewing and the fashion world through theater and my fashion has a very theatrical bent. I also manly do custom work and with them it goes deeper. When they come to me with a thought or image of some piece of clothing they want and usually have wanted for a while but cannot find. To see their face light up when those dreams come true because it is exactly what they want and it fits well, is made well, and THEY feel good and not alone. I live for that.  This opportunity will also allow me to sell off my old stock to make way for new lines in 2015.

                        They say to write out your track record, I have never done an Indiegogo, I have never had to as I have just managed to make it on my own. If it was a line I was asking for help with sure I have done many of those or a outfit I can give you examples but in this case I just need a room and even then if it was just for me and my assistant then no problem but I just need a little more than that. Any help you could give would be have a huge impact.

story:
Shammane understands that people require more out of their wristwatch then just telling time. 

The Shammane Smartwatch is an elegant, timeless wearable that helps you stay connected to the people, places, and events you care about most, without sacrificing style.

Our watch is a discreet way to stay connected to the people and things not immediately in front of you, without distracting you from the ones who are.


3 Sets available 

Each set is composed of :
- The smartwatch core (display)
- 2 straps made of different colors, textures and/or materials.



Compatibility

You can connect your SHAMMANE Smartwatch to your iPhone (iOS7+) or your Android Phone (4+).


The watch in a few words

A smartwatch is at the edge of jewelry and technology, is not a smartphone nor a computer. Its emotional dimension is much stronger, it is an object in contact with our own skin. We design our watch so it adapts to our lifestyles and wardrobes. We made it user-friendly, beautiful, pure and elegant.

The Shammane smartwatch case is made from polished rose gold-plated aluminium that looks great with any outfit . 

Your writs are tiny? The diameter of 39mm and the size of our straps (18mm) make our watch designed for any size of wrists. 

Men and women can wear a SHAMMANE smartwatch.


Functions : how smart is the watch ?

Life is complicated. Your watch shouldn’t be. 

The SHAMMANE Smartwatch sit comfortably at the intersection between daily life and the digital world.

We’ve kept it simple - focusing on the essential features of a smartwatch:  you will be able to see a number of different notifications, like texts, calendar reminders, incoming calls and instant messages from applications installed on your smartphone.

For the healthy part, the watch has a pedometer to track your steps and efforts.


PHONE NOTIFICATIONS

Thanks to a Bluetooth 4.0 technology, the watch alerts you (sound alert or vibration) when you receive a notification. It can be a call, a text message or a Facebook Messenger. You also have the ability to display all the notifications from your phone. Messages are displayed on our 1.22-inch LCD touch screen display (240x240 pixel resolution).


Customize which alert have to be pushed from your smartphone using our dedicated APP (available on Google Play and Apple app store).


PEDOMETER

Beyond looking nice and being simple, the watch does not forget to track your physical activity. We included a pedometer to track your steps. The watch will allow you to set daily goals and inform you about your progress, achievements.


EASY WATCH SETUP

Setup directly from your watch basics like brightness, bluetooth activation, switch to vibration/sound alert...


SWAP TO SEE MESSAGES & ALERTS

Messages, alerts, calendar notifications will be pushed to your smartwatch : scroll through the notifications to see them. 

Our current UI (User Interface) is pure and simple so you can read clearly your messages without being distracted by anything else.


Each moment its strap

Having a collection of straps means the SHAMMANE Smartwatch adapts to your life : choose your straps to fit your mood and your style.


Change your straps in 5 seconds

The straps are using a "flash system," which means the bands have a quick release mechanism.

Straps in details

Drawing its inspiration from the idea of shamanism, you can choose between 6 interchangeable, stylish bands so you can keep your look unique fresh, and smart everyday. 

The bands come in 3 collection packs of 2 colors for the Indiegogo campaign. Our idea will be to launch one new collection per year that will be designed based on a theme linked to shamanism and the latest trendy fabrics and colors, like a fashion collection.

"Working like you need a smart watch to, the Shammane Smartwatch offers all the functionality you'll expect but with a slew of awesome colors and styles of bands to choose from to make it uniquely your ownChangeable Bands Make Shammane a Watch You Want to Wear Everyday. " - TRENDHUNTER


Elegant Watchfaces

You can choose from three bespoke watch face designs that you can easily swap out based on your outfit or mood :



Pick your perks & help us fund SHAMMANE



Specifications

Shammane will filter out only the most important of notifications. You choose what is a worthy distraction and filter the continuous stream of incoming, to just what you want to hear about.

A LONGER BATTERY LIFE

Unlike most of current touch screen smartwatches, the SHAMMANE does not need to be charged daily, you can use it up to 3 days (in normal use). 

The watch has a simple architecture : it allows use to extend the battery life.

WATER PROTECTION

The SHAMMANE Smartwatch is IP67. It means the watch is protected when you wash your hands or if you get caught in a heavy rain storm. It does not mean the watch is 100% waterproof : you should take it off when swimming or having a shower.


SHAMMANE Featured on



"We now have some good news for our female readers. A new watch aimed at women has hit Indiegogo and it’s called the Shammane." - Yahoo

"With this fashionable smartwatch, you can change your style every day" - Wearable

"Shammane designed this watch with fashion in mind, but it was also important to provide the right amount of “smart” features" - Digital Trends

"Wearing a smartwatch can sometimes feel like you're wearing a science fiction prop on your wrist depending on the make and model you get, but the Shammane Smartwatch looks anything but a smart device and instead looks like a piece of jewelry" - Trendhunter

"Shammane, the most desirable of connected watches" - Maddyness

"Liking elegance and fashion, the timeless minimalist watch is available with several bracelets options" - Clausette cc


The team




Our Journey


First batch of delivery : April 2016

End of delivery : June 2016


Where are we now?

The SHAMMANE Smartwatch design and engineering is done. We need your help to  finalize the software customization and start manufacturing. 

To minimize the time between the Indiegogo campaign and production, we worked with our local suppliers for electronic parts in Shenzhen and we have established costs, quantities and deadlines. We are currently working with the best local electronical suppliers working off an already existing module so we can stay 100% focused on Firmware/Software customization

We worked for months with our partners to design our product. Today, we are at an advanced stage : our casing and watch straps are prototyped. 


Industrials 3D designs, technical drawings and volume mapping have been finalized. 

About Production

Our team is comprised of three engineers, experts in manufacturing, quality control, electronics and programming.

"I worked in China for 6 years as an electronical engineer. For the first 2 years, I was in Shenzhen working as an Operation Manager for a quality control company. I learned how to optimize manufacturing processes and obtained all the knowledge necessary to run a project such as SHAMMANE. I then moved to Beijing where I worked for 4 years at LENOVO, the world’s number 1 PC and wearables vendor. This experience gave me the know how to build wearable objects and the necessary tools to anticipate production, hardware, supplier relationship and logistics related constraints.”

Erwan, COO  - Systems & Electronics Engineer
linkedin profile


About Supply Chain

Arnaud, CEO of SHAMMANE, was the General Manager of a manufacturing company building parts for particle accelerators and magnetic systems. 

"Supply chain was my major concern over these past 5 years. I setup and ran a manufacturing plant making parts for particle accelerators which were shipped worldwide. The success of the company was highly dependent upon how the supply chain was controlled. I had to design efficient processes and adapt them over time to maximize cost savings. SHAMMANE is a brand making beautiful, connected objects and our first product is a smartwatch. It is a complex object embedding a mother board, a battery, a display, memory, parts etc. For a project like this, it is obvious that the management of our supply chain will be the key to success for our company. 

Together with my partners, we have the knowledge to face, understand and solve production and supply chain related issues."

 Arnaud, CEO - Mechanical Engineer

linkedin profile


When will I get my SHAMMANE? 

Delivery is scheduled on June 2016, including a reasonable margin  

What if my SHAMMANE is broken or has defects? 

The SHAMMANE watch has a 1 year warranty.

Do I have to download any APPs on my SHAMMANE?

There is no APP to download on the smartwatch. The only existing APP is the one you have to install on your smartphone, to setup the watch properly. 

Is the SHAMMANE waterproof? 

The SHAMMANE Watch is "IP67", meaning it is not 100% waterproof. We prefer use the term of protected against water, instead of waterproof.

How long can I use the SHAMMANE Watch without recharging it? 

The watch includes a 240maH battery. In normal use, you will have to recharge it every 3 days.

Can I use the SHAMMANE Watch is my Iphone and/or my Android phone? 

Yes, the watch is compatible with both.

I have small wrists, can I still wear the SHAMMANE Watch? 

Yes, you can refer to our pictures. Our model has small wrists. The dial diameter is 39mm.

What about the watchfaces? 

The SHAMMANE Watch comes out with the first three watchfaces you can see on our page.

Can I change the watch straps easily? 

Yes. Thanks to our system, you can remove and attach a new strap in 5 seconds.




Rewards


Arnaud LANCELOT, CEO of SHAMMANE speaking during the French National Startup Contest. 250 startups were competing, SHAMMANE ranked 2nd.

SHAMMANE, finalist at the Fashion Tech Week at NUMA (Paris) represented by Erwan COLIN and Arnaud LANCELOT, the two co-founders.

story:
About Our Workshop:

We have a small Central European workshop dedicated to fine, vintage mechanical movements.  We are in the watch and jewelry business for almost 20 years now! We just love the ticking beauties, so we decided, to save at least 300 pieces of vintage mechanical movements for the future generation by making fine accessories out of them, and establish a brand around this new collection!

That is why we need your support!

Gergo is at work in the office (designing watch cases with autocad)

We usually build watch cases for huge caseless pocket watch movements, you can find some of our previous projects on our website (www.rebornoflegends.com) and on this site also. We used to produce tiny accessories for men also, but now we would like to launch an exclusive series of silver and gold accessories.

Beside our main goal which is saving mechanical movements for the future, we also would like to focus the attention of the modern people for the importance of fine craftmanship combining with the latest technology. (autocad designing process, using cnc lathes in certain cases)

Crafting a case for a pocketwatch movement. (drilling the hole for the stem)

We would like to launch a collection of exclusive accessories and build a brand around it. It would be called "Mechanical Movement Dream", and we would also sell these pieces worldwide under the brand name. This collection will include cufflinks, cigar cases, pins, keychains, and even pendants made of silver and gold. Certainly all pieces will consist genuine, tiny mechanical movements, like our previous pieces. (see pictures and videos below)

CIGAR TUBE in sterling silver, with a "Mechanical Movement Dream" cap.

CIGAR TUBE in sterling silver, with a "Mechanical Movement Dream" cap. (close up)

"Mechanical Movement Dream" CUFFLINKS in rosé gold.

"Mechanical Movement Dream" Cufflinks in sterling silver.

"Mechanical Movement Dream" pin in sterling silver on a tie.

"Mechanical Movement Dream" keychain in sterling silver. The logo of the owner was engraved on the glass.

"Mechanical Movement Dream" sterling silver cufflinks.

During this campaign we would like to collect enough money to purchase at least 300 vintage mechanical movements from collectors worldwide. Certainly we also would like to establish a brand around the collection we produce, and in the future sell our products in retailer shops worldwide.

We would save as many vintage, caseless mechanical movements as possible. 

With the collection you support to create, we not only would make sophisticated accessories and high-end timepieces, but we would also save a lot of vintage mechanical movements for the next generation. 

Crafting a new stem in the workshop for a vintage mechanical movement. 


A vintage high end mechanical movement in a stainless steel case made by our workshop. 

This is a really important task for us, as it is very important, that the future generation meet and understand the beauty of high grade mechanical movements. 

By this way, we could make the world a better place, where people give respect for the hard work, and skilled craftsmen. 


What We Need & What You Get

5000 USD - We will be able to purchase 100 tiny antique movements and launch the collection.

15000 USD - We will be able to purchase as much as 300 pieces of tiny antique movements. It could be possible, not only to launch a collection of unique accessories, but to establish the brand, called "Mechanical Dream". It could be also possible to start the exclusive website dedicated to the "Mechanical Movement Dream" brand. We will be able to create installations, stands, and other gadgets, to exhibit the collection in shop windows.

25000 USD - We will be able to purchase not only tiny movements and establish the brand " Mechanical Movement Dream" see above, but we will be able to puchase at least 20 pieces of fine antique pocket watch movements, for this ammount of funding. Out of these movements we will make a wristwatch collection and start saving pocket watch movements also.

We are very happy, if  you support our project to save as many vintage mechanical movements, as we can. We would share our passion with you by giving unique perks for our supporters. 

For your trust, and for your donations, we would like to offer you, pretty cool perks. Please check them out above!


The Impact

As we mentioned above, we are in this beautiful industry for more than 20 years, we had several customers during the long years, and they were always satisfied with our service and products. Just read the few positive feedbacks from our customers.

We always do everything not to dissappoint our customers and business partners.

We will build a stable brand around this project, and we would change the way of thinking about antique movements, and about the value of hard work in this beautiful industry.

Every penny counts!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not support our project with money, it does not mean, that you can not help to realize our dream of saving antique mechanical movements for the future generation. 

Please make some noise about our campaign, and share it with your friends also! Please do not to forget to use the Indiegogo share tools! 

Please spread our passion by sharing this project page on your Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and other social network sites.

About Our Workshop:We have a small Central European workshop 
dedicated to fine, vintage mechanical movements.  
We are in the watch and jewelry business for almost 20 years now! We 
just love the ticking beauties, so we decided, to save at least 300 pieces of vintage 
mechanical movements for the future generation by making fine accessories out of them, and establish a brand around this new collection! That is why we need your support! Gergo is at work in the office (designing watch cases with autocad)We usually build watch cases for huge caseless pocket watch movements, you can find some of our previous projects on our website (www.rebornoflegends.com) and on this site also. We used to produce tiny accessories for men also, but now we would like to launch an exclusive series of silver and gold accessories.Beside our main goal which is saving mechanical movements for the future, we also would like to focus the attention of the modern people for the importance of fine craftmanship combining with the latest technology. (autocad designing process, using cnc lathes in certain cases)Crafting a case for a pocketwatch movement. This collection will include cufflinks, cigar cases, pins, keychains, and even pendants made of silver and gold. Certainly all pieces will consist genuine, tiny mechanical movements, like our previous pieces. Short Summary

Hi. I'm Andy and I need this Rag & Bone leather jacket.  Some of my favorite men, including Ashton Kutcher and David Beckham can be seen wearing these styles.  I am fashionable, but there is a huge hole in my wardrobe that needs to be filled.

What We Need & What You Get

 I just need this jacket.

The Impact

If you give me the money I will send you pictures of me wearing the jacket and maybe even video.

Other Ways You Can Help

I mean....

story:
BTC Bags is a company based on the 1 for 1 model. For every bag we sell, we donate a book to help improve childhood literacy around the world. BTC stands for Break The Cycle. By giving books to children in need, we hope to help break the cycle of poverty, one book at a time.  

BTC Bags is proud to support Room to Read as our first giving partner. Room to Read has been ranked a four star charity by Charity Navigator six times in the ten years they have been operating. 6 million children have benefited from the books they give and the libraries they build. You can learn more about them at www.roomtoread.org. 

Our first bag is a durable, canvas messenger bag with pockets for a laptop, tablet device, phone, and more. It can hold laptops up to 15". It is made of double layer heavy duty canvas, perfect for students and professionals alike.

We are currently raising money to:

- place our first bulk order

- finish building our e-commerce website

By funding this project, you will help us bring this product to market so that we can continue to advance education throughout the world and help children break their cycle of poverty. For more about our mission and cause, visit www.btcbags.com.

Some pictures of the BTC Classic

Music in video by 

"Fireworks" by Jahzzar (http://betterwithmusic.com)

story:
OVERVIEW

 

The minimal design of pilot watches during the 1940’s is something that we really appreciate, it takes the least effort to read, no matter of what angle, light source or condition. The design later becomes our inspiration of making the EO-2.

The EO-2 is simply enjoyable, in terms of user experience.

 

 

 

 

NO MORE BATTERY CHANGE, ALL POWERED BY YOU.

 

 

We have always been fascinated by the mechanism of a automatic watch.

However, that being said, automatic movements haven’t been the most accurate way to tell time, it requires re-adjustment and cleaning from time to time in order to maintain its best condition.

For the EO-2, we like to combine the advantages of both automatic and quartz movements, which are no need for battery change and time accuracy.

 

 

The EO-2 is powered by a Japanese movement designed by SEIKO EPSON. It is a self-powered quartz movement, it doesn’t require battery changes. The EO-2 has a small mechanism on the back of the movement that spins around when you move. As it spins, it generates an electrical charge which is stored by an internal capacitor.

After the movement is fully charged, power reserve is up to 6 months.

The EO-2 will always be on time, yet there’s no need for battery changing anymore.

3 PREMIUM NATO STRAPS ( ALL INCLUDED )

 

 

All the EO-2 watches come with 3 premium nato straps. The Classic Brown-- for Silver Edition / The Classic Black-- for Black Editions, The Suede and The Nylon.

The Classic Brown and The Classic Black are both made of hand picked premium leather from Italy.

 

 

The most appealing part of a nato strap is that everyone can exchange and install straps instantly, no tools of any kind is required whatsoever.

We've also have extra holes made on the straps so that they stay fit on all sizes of wrists. ( For both men & women )

 

You will be really amazed that how you can shift style just by changing the strap of your EO-2, the 3 included premium straps enable the EO-2 to match all kinds of outfits and style.

REWARDS

-- SILVER  EDITION

 

 

 

 

 

 

-- PVD BLACK EDITION

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ONE DESIGN FOR ALL

Not just from a modern point of view, The EO-2 is definitely unisex. You will be surprised that how the EO-2 would look on both a male and female’s wrist.

43 mm wide, we believe that is the magic number for a wrist watch. Not to much, not to less. The EO-2 is wide enough for us to place a slightly larger dial with clear luminous index, which makes this watch so easy to read and looks so nice on both men and women.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It fits all sorts of style in terms of fashion. You wear it to work, you also wear it to all your weekend activities. It simply blends in, you will have no trouble at all switching watch for different occasions once you start wearing your EO-2.

 

NOW WITH COLLECTOR'S LEATHER POUCH

 

 

 

SPEC DETAILS

 

 

  • 3-hand time with second hand, day and date at 6 o’clock position.
  • Size 43mm diameter, 10mm thick
  • Movement?Japanese EPSON YT57 AGS by SEIKO
  • Scratch-resistant sapphire glass
  • 2-step dial with luminous index
  • 316L stainless steel case with crown guard and screwed in see-through case back.  
  • Accuracy?-20/+20 seconds per month
  • Water resistance?5ATM (Don't swim with it !)
  • Separate parts made in Taiwan, Japan and Italy,  assembled in China.

SUPPLIERS & MANUFACTURERS

 

 

 

 

All our chosen suppliers and manufacturers from Taiwan, Japan, Hong Kong, Italy and China are experienced and reputable in their professional fields. They have all work with top brands that you might heard of, and will maintain the same quality and craftsmanship while producing the EO-2.

BEHIND THE EO-2

 

 

EVERYDAY OBJECT is a design and fashion blog based in Taipei, Taiwan. We have become one of the most popular and influential fashion media in Asia for the past few years.  We've launched our online store at 2013, where you can find everyday objects selected by our staff.

Our team has worked really hard to feature all the greatest daily used products around the world to our readers. The EO-2 project is the actual realization of an ideal daily gadget to us.

IS THERE AN EO-1?

At 2012, we’ve launched a project called the "Hybrid Pilot Watch" at Taipei, where our business was founded.

We only made a limited amount of them and had no idea that people would like it or not. Surprisingly, the hybrid watch project later turned out to be quite a hit.

All the watches were literally sold out within hours. And there are demands from all over the globe, asking us to make some more of them. Despite of a really good start, we had to start working on other projects for our business, the watch project just sort of got discontinued at that moment, until this year.

CREDITS

Project Director?Chia Chun Tsai

Photography by Ricor
Product Shooting by Alonso Chiang
Video by Kao Cheng Kai
Models: Lai Yu & Fly Wu
