story:
My name is Samantha Rei and I'm launching my new eponymous clothing label!





I've been designing fashion for most of my life. In 2000 I started my label Blasphemina's Closet. If you're familiar with my work, that's probably how you know me.  For the better part of the last 13 years I've been designing subculture fashion, most of which were made popular by different Japanese style tribes.

Look from F/W 2013 collection "Party Monster"


While I love alternative fashion, I know I fell into it because I thought it would be safer, allowing more risks in my design (funny , right?). I had a feeling I would be more easily accepted. I came to realize over the last couple of years that this actually pigeonholed me.  In the last two years I've slowly started to distance myself from the alternative umbrella.  Oddly, inspirations have started to come more easily to me. My reviews have been fantastic, I've made great connections with other industry professionals and have gotten to be a part of amazing events.

Over the last couple of years I have learned a lot. Learned about my family, my community, the fashion industry, and myself. Of course things have been tight.  They tend to be when you run your own business.  Over the last two years I was the main breadwinner while my husband went back to college to get his bachelors. But my productivity went up because I moved my operation out of my home.  Recently I was even able to move to a store front. My business has thrived as I evolve.  Now is the time to make the big change.

But I can't do it alone!




Beauty.  Strength.  Rebellion.


Like a lot of women, as teenage girl I was stuck between being assertive and having low self-esteem.  I knew what I wanted.  I knew I could achieve it.  But so many people tried to scare confidence out of me.  Many girls seem to have a point in their developing years where they feel this way. It didn't help that I was bullied.  For being the brown girl, the goth girl, the weird art girl who read comics.  

My mom, like most moms, used to say, "Ignore them.  They're just jealous."  Like every teenager, I rolled my eyes and said, "Yeah, right."  As an adult I found out in actuality that many of them were.  I'm not saying this in a pompous way.  This wasn't really a sense of justice in my eyes the way some victims of bullying feel.  It made me want even more to instill a sense of strength in women and girls.  A lot of girls are jealous of strength in other women because they can't figure out the formula for that strength in themselves.  They are scared of being seen as "masculine" or "b*tchy".  And the saddest part of the whole thing is we're conditioned to feel this way from a very young age.  Well, I want to teach women and girls that beauty, strength and pride are all things they can simultaneously have and that we all deserve it.  Just not at the detriment of anyone else.  It's about personal strength, personal beauty and personal responsibility.

Designing is my life blood. When I'm creating I feel it deep within my heart and pulsating through my fingertips. My creative process is deeply personal. I forge a concept, I nurture it with research and my own type of meditation and I tell the story through each piece of clothing. As far back as I can remember I have been an artist. Over the years my medium has become fashion. My goal with each piece is to create your own wearable art that is imbued with love and dedication.



"The first time I saw Samantha's designs, I was immediately enchanted. I knew I had to work with her, even if it was just to wear one of her designs to an event. Not only is her work beautiful, unique, and a joy to wear - but Samantha herself is an intelligent, kind woman whose style and vision continues to evolve and impress."
          - Scarlett Pomers: Actress/Musician

"Samantha has an incredible eye for detail and design. Not only do her creations make the wearer feel like they shine, but her warm personality also makes it such a pleasure to work with her on bringing your vision to life." 
           - Shien Lee: Shien Lee Creative Group, LLC/ Dances of Vice

"Samantha is an amazing woman! She is positive, confident, and a loyal friend. Fashion is her game, and you can be sure that she brings it! Everything Sam designs turns out gorgeous. I love her aesthetic!" 
          - Jamie Walton: The Wayne Foundation

I have been working with Samanatha Rei for over 6 years. Her designs and creative solutions have never failed to bring enjoyment to my guests and convention attendees. We have always included her collections in the fashion shows that have become one of the largest in the Steampunk community and for good reason, they sell. I am proud to call Samantha a friend and a business associate who truly brings good ideas and a fresh approach to my business.
           - Eric Jon Larson: President of Vector Art House/TeslaCon

"Samantha Rei emanates a glow of brilliance, warmth and harmony which she sews into her creations. Her designs exude a certain magical charm that is synonymous with her beautiful smile. When you put on one of those designs, which I have had the pleasure of doing, you feel transported into a person that you read about in fairytales-dainty yet strong. Samantha Rei will equip you with a set of armor that shines a light of beauty and strength against those things that may hold a negative charge. Take that armor and wear it proud, I do!"
          - Carla Haglund: Fairshadow Photography

"Samantha Rei is a bright and intelligent designer.  She has an uncanny way of connecting with her clients to meet their ever changing needs.  Her knowledge and creativity allow her to create inspired one of a kind clothing that commands a second glance.  When wearing  "Samantha Rei" it shows from the inside out.  Clothing by Samantha Rei is a statement of confidence and empowerment."
          - Thom Navarro: Tim + Thom 



Detail shots of my upcoming collection "Cyclone Wasteland"

I believe that quality and comfort are essential.  And I'm not talking about comfort like a fleece body suit or a pair of flannel pants.  I'm talking about comfort in your own skin.  When you put on a garment and think, "Oh!  This is how I have always wanted to feel! This is how I want to feel all the time!"

Ladies.  You can be soft and commanding.  You can all be beautiful and strong.  Rebel against the things that are making you doubt yourself.  Put on your beautiful armor and face the day.  Your size, age, race or station in life shouldn't matter if you find that glow inside and wear it for the world to see.  Wear something that means something to you.  Dress with intent. Don't buy something because you need it “right now.” You'll end up with a lot of disposable things. Invest in beautiful, well-made garments that will last and can stand up season after season.

Now I'm not saying what you wear will change your life, but it can give you a little boost!

Louis Bustos Dress Design Challange


"Samantha Rei" is about reveling in your femininity and finding the strength to own your life while doing it.  You can be soft and sweet while still having a warrior's spirit.  People seem to think you have to be one or the other.  I believe if you want to, you can be more.

"Samantha Rei" is about being an individual.  It's about feeling the most YOU you have ever felt in your life.  It's about carving out your corner of the world and owning it with quality garments, made in small runs with love.  And lovers of my custom sized items, don't be afraid, I will still be offering custom sized garments!



To quote Vera Wang:

"I was always taught that anyone should be able to pursue their dream and that the biggest crime is not to try. That made me motivated, and I didn't want to wonder what could have happened."

Fabric from my upcoming collection "Cyclone Wasteland"

This isn't JUST for a fashion show or a new collection in the up front (not on credit or loans) - it's a step closer to realizing a lifetime dream. It may seem like a big chunk of change, but trust me in saying I've done years of research and the majority of fashion start-ups actually require two to four times this amount.  Luckily for me I have a lot of carry over from my years in the industry from machines to tools.  That really helps keep the cost down, so currently I'm asking for the bare minimum to take flight.  If I make above and beyond my goal, I'll be able to hire more help and crank things out even more efficiently!

I'm excited about the perks I'm offering because not all of them are just things - they are experiences.  I know the most memorable gifts I've ever received are interactive experiences.  Custom clothing, accessories, trips - they are all a bit of an adventure, aren't they?  So many people feel so separated from the fashion community. It seems like some kind of weird, unattainable group.  This is your chance to get right in the thick of it!

Every cent of the funds from this campaign will go towards building my label effectively and responsibly.  This includes web design for the new online shop, fashion show expenses, collection costs, graphic design, filing fees, machines to expand the workshop, advertising, hiring employees, small production runs (fabric, notions, etc; production will stay domestic!), packaging, shipping, and MORE!  For a more comprehensive list of expenses, feel free to contact me. Total transparency.

I am a stickler for detail. Getting funded ensures I can contract with people I trust who I know have my level of quality control.

Finale dress from S/S 2013 Collection "Second Star"


I also have a long term goal of partnering with the human trafficking charities I support in the hopes of offering training to rescued victims so they can go into the world with a skill that will help them get a job. They don't have to work for me.  I just want to know that what they learned helped them in some way.  That's in my five year plan.

If for some reason I don't reach my entire goal, the funds will go to the most pressing things.  Filing my LLC, paying my accountant, graphic designer and contractors, materials for samples for my next two collections, marketing and supplies (dressforms, iron, etc).


As we reach different milestones in the campaign, we will offer add-ons to existing contributors AND unlock more limited perks!

I want to show you how much I appreciate your support so keep sharing and checking back to see what we add!


I know not everyone can contribute financially.  An easy way to to help me make Samantha Rei a success is to share this campaign with all of your friends and followers on your social networking pages.  Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, even your blog.  Your confidence and support can help make this happen!

There are easy to use share tools right on this page.  Thank you so much for your contribution!

Thanks to Nic Abrego for the beautiful video, Carla, Matt and Rhea for the pretty pictures, Helen Bednar for the gorgeous new logo, my assistant Christian and everyone else who has helped me put together this campaign <3


And thank you out there!  I appreciate your support more than you know!



PERK DETAILS

**Flight not included.  If you are unable to make the trip I will give you a gift of equal monetary value upon request.

***If you live out of state, I will fly you out for either the September 25th show or Fashion Week next spring.  If you are unable to make the show in September I will give you a different gift  upon request.

****continental US only

EDITS

-In the Sapphire level, I accidentally posted Katherine Gleason's name as Rachel Gleeson.  It's a very odd mistake seeing as how she wrote one of my very favorite books/gifts from my best friend "Alexander McQueen: Evolution."  Apologies to Katherine and if you're unable to contribute to one of the upper tiers, make sure to pre-order her book "The Anatomy of Steampunk: The Fashion of Victorian Futurism"!
story_txt:
My
name is Samantha Rei and I'm launching my new eponymous clothing
label!










I've
been designing fashion for most of my life. In 2000 I started my
label Blasphemina's Closet. If you're familiar with my work, that's
probably how you know me.  For the better part of the last 13
years I've been designing subculture fashion, most of which were made
popular by different Japanese style tribes.


Look from F/W 2013 collection "Party Monster"


While
I love alternative fashion, I know I fell into it because I thought
it would be safer, allowing more risks in my design (funny , right?).
I had a feeling I would be more easily accepted. I came to
realize over the last couple of years that this actually pigeonholed
me.  In the last two years I've slowly started to distance
myself from the alternative umbrella.  Oddly, inspirations have
started to come more easily to me. My reviews have been fantastic,
I've made great connections with other industry professionals and
have gotten to be a part of amazing events.
Over
the last couple of years I have learned a lot. Learned about my
family, my community, the fashion industry, and myself. Of course
things have been tight.  They tend to be when you run your own
business.  Over the last two years I was the main
breadwinner while my husband went back to college to get his
bachelors. But my productivity went up because I moved my operation
out of my home.  Recently I was even able to move to a store
front. My business has thrived as I evolve.  Now is the time to
make the big change.
But
I can't do it alone!











Beauty.
 Strength.  Rebellion.

Like
a lot of women, as teenage girl I was stuck between being assertive
and having low self-esteem.  I knew what I wanted.  I knew I could achieve it.  But so many people tried to scare confidence out of me.  Many girls seem to have a point in
their developing years where they feel this way. It didn't help that
I was bullied.  For being the brown girl, the goth girl, the
weird art girl who read comics.  
My
mom, like most moms, used to say, "Ignore them.  They're
just jealous."  Like every teenager, I rolled my eyes and
said, "Yeah, right."  As an adult I found out in actuality that
many of them were.  I'm not saying this in a pompous way.  This wasn't really a sense of justice in my eyes
the way some victims of bullying feel.  It made me want even
more to instill a sense of strength in women and girls.  A lot
of girls are jealous of strength in other women because they can't
figure out the formula for that strength in themselves.  They
are scared of being seen as "masculine" or "b*tchy".  And the saddest part of the whole thing is we're conditioned to feel this way from a very young age.  Well, I want to teach women and girls that beauty, strength and pride
are all things they can simultaneously have and that we all deserve it.  Just not at the detriment of anyone else.  It's about personal strength, personal beauty and personal responsibility.
Designing
is my life blood.  When I'm creating I feel it deep within my heart
and pulsating through my fingertips. My creative process is deeply
personal. I forge a concept, I nurture it with research and my own
type of meditation and I tell the story through each piece of
clothing.  As far back as I can remember I have been an artist.  Over
the years my medium has become fashion. My goal with each piece is to
create your own wearable art that is imbued with love and dedication.
 












"The first time I saw Samantha's designs, I was immediately enchanted. I knew I had to work with her, even if it was just to wear one of her designs to an event. Not only is her work beautiful, unique, and a joy to wear - but Samantha herself is an intelligent, kind woman whose style and vision continues to evolve and impress."          - Scarlett Pomers: Actress/Musician


"Samantha
has an incredible eye for detail and design. Not only do her
creations make the wearer feel like they shine, but her warm
personality also makes it such a pleasure to work with her on
bringing your vision to life." 
           - Shien Lee: Shien Lee Creative Group, LLC/ Dances of Vice


"Samantha is an amazing woman! She is positive, confident, and a loyal friend. Fashion is her game, and you can be sure that she brings it! Everything Sam designs turns out gorgeous. I love her aesthetic!"           - Jamie Walton: The Wayne Foundation


I have been working with Samanatha Rei for over 6 years. Her designs and creative solutions have never failed to bring enjoyment to my guests and convention attendees. We have always included her collections in the fashion shows that have become one of the largest in the Steampunk community and for good reason, they sell.

I am proud to call Samantha a friend and  a business associate who truly brings good ideas and a fresh approach to my business.


           - Eric Jon Larson: President of Vector Art House/TeslaCon


"Samantha Rei emanates a glow of brilliance, warmth and harmony which she sews into her creations. Her designs exude a certain magical charm that is synonymous with her beautiful smile. When you put on one of those designs, which I have had the pleasure of doing, you feel transported into a person that you read about in fairytales-dainty yet strong. Samantha Rei will equip you with a set of armor that shines a light of beauty and strength against those things that may hold a negative charge. Take that armor and wear it proud, I do!"
          - Carla
	Haglund: Fairshadow Photography


"Samantha Rei is a bright and intelligent designer.  She has an uncanny way of connecting with her clients to meet their ever changing needs.  Her knowledge and creativity allow her to create inspired one of a kind clothing that commands a second glance.  When wearing  "Samantha Rei" it shows from the inside out.  Clothing by Samantha Rei is a statement of confidence and empowerment."          - Thom Navarro: Tim + Thom 






Detail shots of my upcoming collection "Cyclone Wasteland"



I believe that quality and comfort are essential.  And I'm not talking about comfort like a fleece body suit or a pair of flannel pants.  I'm talking about comfort in your own skin.  When you put on a garment and think, "Oh!  This is how I have always wanted to feel! This is how I want to feel all the time!"
Ladies.  You can be soft and commanding.  You can all be beautiful and strong.  Rebel against the
things that are making you doubt yourself.  Put on your
beautiful armor and face the day.  Your size, age, race or
station in life shouldn't matter if you find that glow inside and
wear it for the world to see.  Wear something that means
something to you.  Dress with intent. Don't buy something
because you need it “right now.”  You'll end up with a lot of
disposable things.  Invest in beautiful, well-made garments that will
last and can stand up season after season.
Now
I'm not saying what you wear will change your life, but it can give
you a little boost! 




Louis Bustos Dress Design Challange


"Samantha
Rei" is about reveling in your femininity and finding the
strength to own your life while doing it.  You can be soft and
sweet while still having a warrior's spirit.  People seem to
think you have to be one or the other.  I believe if you want
to, you can be more.
"Samantha
Rei" is about being an individual.  It's about feeling the
most YOU you have ever felt in your life.  It's about carving
out your corner of the world and owning it with quality garments,
made in small runs with love.  And lovers of my custom sized
items, don't be afraid, I will still be offering custom sized
garments!





To quote Vera Wang:
"I was always taught that anyone should be able to pursue their dream and that the biggest crime is not to try. That made me motivated, and I didn't want to wonder what could have happened."




Fabric from my upcoming collection "Cyclone Wasteland"



This
isn't JUST for a fashion show or a new collection in the up front
(not on credit or loans) - it's a step closer to realizing a lifetime
dream. It may seem like a big chunk of change, but trust me in saying I've done years of research and the majority of fashion start-ups actually require two to four times this amount.  Luckily for me I have a lot of carry over from my years in the industry from machines to tools.  That really helps keep the cost down, so currently I'm asking for the bare minimum to take flight.  If I make above and beyond my goal, I'll be able to hire more help and crank things out even more efficiently!

- they are experiences.  I know the most memorable gifts I've
ever received are interactive experiences.  Custom clothing,
accessories, trips - they are all a bit of an adventure, aren't they?
 So many people feel so separated from the fashion community. It
seems like some kind of weird, unattainable group.  This is your
chance to get right in the thick of it!
Every cent of the funds from this campaign will go towards building my label
effectively and responsibly.  This includes web design for
the new online shop, fashion show expenses, collection costs, graphic design, filing
fees, machines to expand the workshop, advertising, hiring employees, small production runs (fabric,
notions, etc; production will stay domestic!), packaging, shipping, and MORE!  For a
more comprehensive list of expenses, feel free to contact me. Total transparency.
I
am a stickler for detail. Getting funded ensures I can contract
with people I trust who I know have my level of
quality control.

I
also have a long term goal of partnering with the human trafficking
charities I support in the hopes of offering training to rescued
victims so they can go into the world with a skill that will help
them get a job. They don't have to work for me.  I just want to
know that what they learned helped them in some way.  That's in
my five year plan.
If
for some reason I don't reach my entire goal, the funds will go to
the most pressing things.  Filing my LLC, paying my accountant, graphic designer and contractors, materials for samples for my next two collections,
marketing and supplies (dressforms, iron, etc).



As we reach different milestones in the campaign, we will offer add-ons to existing contributors AND unlock more limited perks!

story:
’It’s more than just a box!’


Rapide One is the first true desktop 3D Printer to offer professional rapid prototyping with stunning design and functionality at an affordable price.

What is Rapide One?

Rapide One is an affordable professional desktop 3D Printer. What makes Rapide One unique is it has been built from the ground up with the goal of creating a fully functional desktop 3D printer, which fits the gap in the market between high-end 3D printers and the hobbyist 3D printers currently available.

Rapide One is fully enclosed; we enclosed Rapide One to ensure a constant temperature throughout the build and to make the printer office, school and home safe. There are two large Plexiglas viewing panels, which allow easy viewing during the build. The constant temperature reduces the cracking and shrinking issues open 3D Printers have and it increases the build success rate substantially.

Rapide One has a full cartridge system built into the top of the printer to reduce over all size and to make usage simple and easy with zero mess, which is common with external, mounted spools. You can choose to use a cartridge or just load material into the top of the machine without a cartridge. The cartridge system allows users to change color and material type for each print easily and quickly.

Unlike all the other current desktop 3D Printers Rapide One is designed to be plug and play. Due to our unique enclosed housing and cartridge system you just set the print up, click start and walk away. When the build is complete you simply return and remove. This opens up endless possibilities for ‘bot queues’ and ‘print shops’ because the requirement to supervise each build is no longer required.

Rapide One is ideal for office, school or home use. It is as quiet as it is efficient as it is safe. There are no over powering fumes, no constant rattle and being enclosed no way for anyone to interrupt the build by placing objects or hands into the printer when in operation.

Rapide One is the answer to the current dilemma facing those wanting to utilize the benefits of a 3D Printer without all the negatives of fumes, noise and safety. Rapide One is ‘more than just a box’ it is a complete solution and the next generation in desktop 3D Printing.

Rapide One will have a RRP of $2499 when it is released mid 2014. We are offering our Indiegogo contributors the opportunity to get the first Rapide One’s produced for $1499 (a saving of $1000). By being a part of our campaign you will not only be receiving Rapide One at a substantial saving but also providing valuable feedback for enhancements, future models and development of our brand.


Rapide One has been featured in:

Why We Developed Rapide One

Our motivation; there are no low-cost Desktop 3D printers that meet the quality standards of the professional designer or that offer a safe, quiet and an office friendly design.

Our goal; to provide a high quality Desktop 3D printer that is not only affordable but has the power and resolution of a professional 3D Printer without the high price tag right on your desktop.

Our design; we looked at all current Desktop 3D printers on the market and realized that they just don’t offer the ability to make the beautiful designs a reality or meet the high demands required for rapid prototyping.

With Rapide One, we think we have created a Desktop 3D Printer that is easy-to-use whilst still rivaling the output of high-end printers at a fraction of the cost.

Rapide One is every thing a high quality affordable Professional Desktop 3D printer should be and it’s not UGLY!.





Rapide One is about to change the way people see 3D Printers.

In our research we found that there was a big gap in the market between the low-end 3D printers and professional-quality 3D printers. An entry level professional 3D printer is ridiculously expensive, is complex to use and requires you buy an expensive software package to operate it which then involves upwards of 1 year to master.

As a result of this research we decided to design a 3D printer that not only fills this gap but one that is the solution to the problem. We believe Rapide One ticks all the right boxes and we are now ready to move this vision into full production.

Quality Desktop 3D Printer Comparison Chart



High Resolution Printing Belongs on Your Desktop.

Over the past 18 months we have worked tirelessly to design and develop Rapide One. With your help, we are ready to take the final step and put Rapide One into full production. By supporting our campaign, you will not only be one of the first to get one of our amazing 3D printer’s but you will also assist us to usher in a new era of 3D printing - an era in which your creative output is no longer limited by price or dauntingly complex machines.





Design

Rapide One’s design is Innovative, Dynamic and Fresh. A fusion of technology and design built to seamlessly integrate with your surroundings.

We have gone to extraordinary lengths to design the complete 3D printing experience for you from the ground up. Rapide One has been engineered to produce quality high-resolution parts with ease. From its unique fully enclosed housing to a simple to use cartridge system for material Rapide One ticks all the boxes of the most discerning designer and maker.

We didn’t invent the 3D Printer but we believe we have moved the benchmark for what a 3D Printer should be and in the process made professional quality 3D printing a reality for many.





Hardware

Our extensive research, design, and experimentation, has allowed us to work out how to create a Professional 3D printer at a much lower cost, making this dynamic technology available to everyone.

The results are simply amazing. Rapide One can print layers as thin as 100 microns with features as small as 200 microns in a build volume of 170 x 170 x 170mm. This means you can print complex geometries with the exquisite details and beautiful surface finish that will make your prototypes and creations stand out with little or no finishing required.

Rapide One gives you the ability to precisely generate prototypes and rapidly print them. This means your creations will be in your hands much faster and at a fraction of the current costs.



Software

Great hardware is only the start. We understand how important being able to use Rapide One with any platform will be. Rapide One is compatible with all open source software applications including Repiter and Replicator G.

A key advantage of the open source software is it is constantly being upgraded and enhanced, its free and easy to use. This means with Rapide One you are not locked into using our software, you do not have ongoing costs in terms of maintenance for that software and you are free to choose the software you are most comfortable using.

But, we didn’t stop there, we created Rapide One to work just as perfectly with both PC & Mac so everyone has the opportunity to create not just a select few.

Materials

When Rapide One is released, it will come with filament (material) developed in our own factory especially for Rapide One.

You will also be able to purchase additional material from our full range of ABS, PLA and PVA in a wide range of colors. However, unlike many manufacturers of 3D Printers we do not require you use Rapide One exclusively with our filament, you are free to use what ever filament you want in Rapide One but it will perform at its best with our filament.



Why We Need You

Without your help we would need to sell Rapide One through our existing supply channels. This means:

  • Rapide One will be sold at considerably higher price,
  • Rapide One will enter the market much later,
  • Rapide One will have less features, and
  • Rapide One will have no customization possibilities.
Backing us now, you will be ensuring the development team can complete our goal, and help us realize the full potential of this amazing technology and at the same time getting your very own 3D Printer at a substantial saving on the RRP cost in the future.

What's in it for you?

As a backer of our project you will be one of the first to get a new Rapide One on your desktop and by being a part of our project in its infancy you will receive your very own Rapide One with the knowledge that you were a part of something big that created something that will take the 3D Printer market forward again.



What Rewards Will I Get?

As a token of our appreciation of your support you will receive your very own Rapide One from our first full production run’s (based on when you make your contribution to our campaign) and the satisfaction of knowing you were there when we needed you most.

Where Are We Now?

We have completed the development phase, have negotiated a new factory and are ready to launch full production. The chassis, components and industrial design are already complete, we are now testing the software with prototypes in our office and at the factory. We just need to compete the tooling and molds for the housing and we are set for full production.





Where Will Your Funding Go?

We have invested a substantial amount in the development phase of this project. Your funding is the critical link to the completion of our project and will be used to realize our dream of the world's first 3D Printer that has been designed with you in mind and one that is not just a concept but a reality.

Use of Funds

We have working prototypes and our new factory is being readied to go into full production once we have the funds to complete the tooling and molds.

Our new production facility has over 3200m2 dedicated floor space which will give us the capability to produce Rapide One at a rate of 500 – 1000 per month which is a substantial leap in production capability compared to the majority of 3D Printers on the market. We need your help to take the next step.

Funding Milestones:

The first $20,000 raised through the campaign will be used to purchase the additional tooling with the final $80,000 used to make the molds we require for the housing and some internal sections. This phase of production requires we produce a minimum of 1000 housings and this is a substantial investment.

Your Contribution

We have put a lot of time, funding and effort into our project but like many things in life not everything can be completed by just a few.

You and your contribution will enable us to reach our goal. You will be a part of a world first in enabling us to complete production of arguably the most beautiful 3D Printer in the market which has been designed and built to enhance your home, work space or workshop.



Why Trust Rapide 3D

Rapide 3D has more than a decade of experience in the design and development of advanced technology. We have worked with technological integration and development with our partners in China and around the world and are now at the cutting edge of 3D Printing technology and design.

We have completed 30+ projects for our international partners on time and on budget. We now want to take it one step further by developing our own 3D Printer range.

Moving our business exclusively to 3D Printer technology and its production means we will be able to offer a 3D Printer range that is functional, flexible and beautiful at an affordable price.

Today, it is rare to be able to design a product, which can totally change how we see or use a technology, but Rapide One does just that by changing how you perceive what 3D Printing is and will be in the future.





We Are Ready For Full Production With Your Support.

We have engineered Rapide One to be mass-produced efficiently using a full CNC chassis, which simplifies the currently complex issue of manufacture that other 3D printer manufacturers encounter.

We have produced 3 generations of prototypes, tested a wide range of materials (ABS, PLA, PVA) using different formulations to find the best match for Rapide One and started producing our own filament.

We have now commenced the set up for full-scale manufacturing to get your Rapide One delivered to you as soon as possible. This is the most critical component of realizing our dream and we will need a lot of support to do the job right. That’s why we’ve turned to Indiegogo to get the production lines up and running!

If you decide to become one of our foundation contributors, you will get a large discount and be one of the first to have our product on your desktop. But more importantly, you’ll play a huge part in starting this revolution in 3D printing and rapid prototyping by providing your feedback to help us with upgrades and enhancements so we can all do amazing things with Rapide One.



Our Exciting Range of Perks:

Risks and Challenges

Like many Indiegogo projects, we have faced several key risks and challenges in getting Rapide One as far as we have. The primary risks for us included:

Engineering

To achieve the level of simplicity in user experience that we have, we had to design and engineer a very complex machine. We have taken two key steps to ensure our engineering success.

We have brought together a team of engineers and designers who are amazingly talented.

We have tested Rapide One with an obsession for perfection.

In the last year, we have built 3 generations of prototypes, a production run of alpha machines and now have a run of beta machines that are getting put through their paces in our factory.

This is giving us an amazing amount of data for ongoing research and development.

Supply Chain and Logistics

Many Indiegogo campaigns encounter problems when taking their prototypes to production. This includes issues finding suppliers and engineering products for mass-production. Smooth execution is absolutely essential to overcoming such risks.

We have eliminated 95% of these issues by having our own factory where we will produce the printer. Our internal construction is CNC Aircraft Grade Aluminum which means we can rapidly produce Rapide One in quantities ranging from 1 to 1000 simply and most importantly cost effectively because we own the factory. As a result we will be able to meet all our promises on time and on budget.

Every thing is now in place, we only require the resources to commence production.





The Rapide 3D Team

Finding the right people is a challenge for any endeavor. Successfully developing a 3D printer to the standards we have requires a team of talented, passionate, and motivated designers, engineers, and entrepreneurs.

We have formed an awesome team, but we will have to bring in more talent in to realize our dream. We are actively looking for new team members to join Rapide 3D so we can hit the ground running!

If you think you have what it takes to not only be a part of our team but bring inspiration and dedication email us your resume. hello@rapide-3d.com






Specifications










FAQ’S

Who is Rapide 3D?

Rapide One is a dedicated team of Australian designers and engineers who believe in bringing the best technology to the world sooner rather than later. We have offices in Perth, Melbourne, Hong Kong, Shenzhen and Guangzhou and our own production facility where the design and development of Rapide One will be headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

What is Rapide One?

Rapide One is the future of 3D Printing. It is as affordable as it is quite and sleek as it is functional. Rapide One brings together advanced design and technology that will put Rapid Prototyping in the hands of many faster and cheaper than possible before.

What makes this campaign unique?

We are the designers, we are the manufacturers and most importantly we are the people in the factory. No other 3D Printer campaign has been run by people who can honestly say, I designed, built and packed your printer with my own hands, which is what we will do.

How Does Rapide One Work?

Rapide One is essentially a rapid prototyping 3D Printer which uses FDM technology to produce 3D print designs from any .stl file. Rapide One can print using either a Mac or PC. We have even included an SD Slot so you can print straight from an SD Card.

Where Will Rapide One Be Produced?

Rapide One will be produced in our own production facility in Shenzhen, China. We will take possession on the 15.12.2013 and this will facility will become the new home of Rapide 3D. We will do all development and the production of Rapide 3D Printers, Scanners and other cool products used in 3D design and production there. We will also produce our own custom filament to match the Rapide 3D range of printers.

Why Trust Rapide 3D

Rapide 3D has more than a decade of experience with design and development of advanced technology. We have worked with technological integration and development with our partners in China and around the world and are at the cutting edge of 3D Printing technology and design.

We have completed 30+ projects for our international partners on time and on budget. We now want to take it one step further by developing our own 3D Printer.

We have the ability to offer a 3D Printer’s that are functional, flexible and beautiful at an affordable price.

The key advantage of contributing to this campaign is you are dealing direct with the manufacturer of the product. We have designed Rapide One and we will build Rapide One in our own factory. There are no 3rd Parties involved which means we can offer Rapide One at substantial savings to our foundation contributors.

When Will My Rapide One Arrive?

We are already working hard to plan our supply chain and manufacturing operations to make sure you get your Rapide One as soon as possible.

We feel comfortable targeting February - March 2014 for our first full-production shipments to our foundation contributors (Early Birds), and April 2014 for other contributors.

At this stage we have a target production of 250 units for the first month and 500 units per month there after.

How Big Is Radipe One?

Rapide One is 532 x 449 x 345mm when closed. When the cover is opened, you need about 300mm clearance at the top. Rapide One weighs 17.5kg

What Is The Retail Price of Rapide One?

We have set our retail price at $2499 for Rapide One with single extruder. Our Indiegogo supporters are definitely receiving special treatment for believing in what we do!

How Much Will The Print Material (filament) Cost?

We estimate ongoing filament prices will be $29USD per kilo, but Indiegogo supporters who buy a Rapide One print package will be guaranteed 1 kg spools of either ABS or PLA at $25USD for the life of their printer. This is compared to high quality materials currently available through other manufacturers for around $100 per kilo.

How Many Parts Can I Print With 1kg of Material?

Depending on your printing output and part size, 1kg of material can go a long way. Our head, for example, which is 120mm high and has a circumference of 260mm uses 249gms. You could theoretically print 4 heads with 1kg of material!

What Are The Material Properties of The Filament?

Our materials are made from bio materials which is good fro the environment and good for you. We have worked tireless to develop consistent quality with the key focus on strength and durability.

Does Our Filament Need to Be Handled Carefully?

Our filament is safe to handle and will not produce any dangerous fumes when printing.

Can You Use Third Party Materials / Filament With Rapide One?

We've engineered our material (filaments) to work with the Rapide One. It's a huge part of the technical work that has gone into this project to ensure your prints have a much higher success rate than with other printers.

The filament properties are closely linked with the Rapide One design. However, you are welcome to use any filament you choose with Rapide One bearing in mind we will not be able to offer support for third party filaments due to variations in properties which we are sure you can understand.

How Does The Material Tray and Cartridge System Work?

With the Rapide One, you simply load up to 500gms of material / filament into the holding tray or what is necessary for your prints. The top cover conceals the filament inside the machine.

Our cartridge system allows for the easy removal and change over of filament. This is very convenient if you intend to print in different material types and or colors on a regular basis. You simply lift the top of Rapide One and place the cartridge in. Our cartridges come with 250gms of filament / material and are stackable so you can easily store and access the materials you require.

Can You Design With The Software? What Operating Systems Will Support The Software?

Rapide 3D firmware has been designed to work with all open source 3D printing software. We will provide the links to this software with each machine. This will allow users to take advantage of easy and intuitive tools for designs from any 3D CAD package and allow you to simply set up and start the print process.

Rapide will print standard .STL files. We have worked hard in the development phase to have Rapide 3D work effortlessly with this software which is available for all major operating systems. As a result Rapide One will work seamlessly with both Mac and PC, which has always a key priority of our development.

Can You Explain The Resolution Metrics (feature size, layer thickness, X/Y resolution etc.)?

3D print manufacturers often use layer thickness to define “resolution”, although any one metric provides an incomplete analysis of printer capabilities. Rapide One can create layers as thin as 100 microns, which is generally finer than other desktop machines.

Another metric, the minimum feature size is 300 microns, which is limited by the diameter of the print head spot. Minimum feature size refers to the smallest possible bumps and ridges on a part.

Rapide One’s print head, however, has extremely precise movement capabilities in the X/Y plane. For example, the spot is 300 microns, but it can be moved as little as a few microns at a time, allowing for the impressive surface finish.

What Is The Build Speed? Will The Printer and Parts Last?

Our build speed is comparable to other high resolution printers. It varies depending on the type of print. A typical printing rate is around 30mm of height per hour. However, we are designing Rapide One to be a serious workhorse.

Rapide One has less moving parts than most high resolution printers, and we have been running the prototypes in our office pretty much all day, every day during months of development.

Will Rapide 3D Offer a Warranty or Support?

Rapide One will come with a 1 year limited warranty out of the box. At this stage support will be a big priority and we hope with the help of our contributors to offer 24/7 online support with remote access capabilities.

However, this will be dependent on reaching our funding goal for this feature as it will be costly to offer this level of support. We know it’s very important and are working on it as a high priority. We’ll guarantee that you receive a working printer, and are planning to take extra special care of those of you who have supported us from the beginning.

Do You Have Plans To Make a Bigger Printer?

At this stage we are working to get Rapide One into the market. We have designed Rapide One to be scalable and to incorporate a dual extruder in the future. We also have a very exciting vision for the future, which will include a printer that can print both sugar and chocolate!

Why Isn’t Shipping Included?

Shipping prices vary by location and country. It’s simpler (and cheaper for you) to handle this separately. After the Indiegogo is over and we are ready to start shipping, you will receive link to our website and where you can enter your shipping details to pay the appropriate amount.

Shipping costs vary by location and carrier selected, but if you live in the US (for example) it will probably be somewhere around $150USD.

You will also have the option of hard shell box for your Rapide One if you intend to move it about regularly or store off the desk. Standard packing for shipping will be double boxing for delivery purposes.

How Much Does International Shipping Cost?

International shipping costs are based on the shipping provider selected and time to deliver. Prices vary by country and what taxes and other regulations your government has. If you order a Rapide One package through Indiegogo we ask that you assume responsibility for all these charges.

After our Indiegogo project ends, you will be asked to log into our website select your shipping method and pay the appropriate shipping charges.



I Have More Questions. Who Do I Ask?

email us at hello@rapide-3d.com
story_txt:
’It’s more than just a box!’
Rapide One is the first true desktop 3D Printer to offer professional rapid prototyping with stunning design and functionality at an affordable price.What is Rapide One?

Rapide One is an affordable professional desktop 3D Printer.   What makes Rapide One unique is it has been built from the ground up with the goal of creating a fully functional desktop 3D printer, which fits the gap in the market between high-end 3D printers and the hobbyist 3D printers currently available.


Rapide One is fully enclosed; we enclosed Rapide One to ensure a constant temperature throughout the build and to make the printer office, school and home safe.   There are two large Plexiglas viewing panels, which allow easy viewing during the build.   The constant temperature reduces the cracking and shrinking issues open 3D Printers have and it increases the build success rate substantially.


Rapide One has a full cartridge system built into the top of the printer to reduce over all size and to make usage simple and easy with zero mess, which is common with external, mounted spools.   You can choose to use a cartridge or just load material into the top of the machine without a cartridge.   The cartridge system allows users to change color and material type for each print easily and quickly.


Unlike all the other current desktop 3D Printers Rapide One is designed to be plug and play.   Due to our unique enclosed housing and cartridge system you just set the print up, click start and walk away.   When the build is complete you simply return and remove.   This opens up endless possibilities for ‘bot queues’ and ‘print shops’ because the requirement to supervise each build is no longer required.


Rapide One is ideal for office, school or home use.   It is as quiet as it is efficient as it is safe.   There are no over powering fumes, no constant rattle and being enclosed no way for anyone to interrupt the build by placing objects or hands into the printer when in operation. 


Rapide One is the answer to the current dilemma facing those wanting to utilize the benefits of a 3D Printer without all the negatives of fumes, noise and safety.   Rapide One is ‘more than just a box’ it is a complete solution and the next generation in desktop 3D Printing.


Rapide One will have a RRP of $2499 when it is released mid 2014.   We are offering our Indiegogo contributors the opportunity to get the first Rapide One’s produced for $1499 (a saving of $1000).   By being a part of our campaign you will not only be receiving Rapide One at a substantial saving but also providing valuable feedback for enhancements, future models and development of our brand. Rapide One has been featured in:



Why We Developed Rapide One

Our motivation;  there are no low-cost Desktop 3D printers that meet the quality standards of the professional designer or that offer a safe, quiet and an office friendly design. 

Our goal;  to provide a high quality Desktop 3D printer that is not only affordable but has the power and resolution of a professional 3D Printer without the high price tag right on your desktop.  

Our design;  we looked at all current Desktop 3D printers on the market and realized that they just don’t offer the ability to make the beautiful designs a reality or meet the high demands required for rapid prototyping.

With Rapide One, we think we have created a Desktop 3D Printer that is easy-to-use whilst still rivaling the output of high-end printers at a fraction of the cost.   

Rapide One is every thing a high quality affordable Professional Desktop 3D printer should be and it’s not UGLY!.

  Rapide One is about to change the way people see 3D Printers.

In our research we found that there was a big gap in the market between the low-end 3D printers and professional-quality 3D printers.  An entry level professional 3D printer is ridiculously expensive, is complex to use and requires you buy an expensive software package to operate it which then involves upwards of 1 year to master. 

As a result of this research we decided to design a 3D printer that not only fills this gap but one that is the solution to the problem.  We believe Rapide One ticks all the right boxes and we are now ready to move this vision into full production.

Quality Desktop 3D Printer Comparison Chart
High Resolution Printing Belongs on Your Desktop.
Over the past 18 months we have worked tirelessly to design and develop Rapide One.   With your help, we are ready to take the final step and put Rapide One into full production.  By supporting our campaign, you will not only be one of the first to get one of our amazing 3D printer’s but you will also assist us to usher in a new era of 3D printing - an era in which your creative output is no longer limited by price or dauntingly complex machines. 
Design
Rapide One’s design is Innovative, Dynamic and Fresh. A fusion of technology and design built to seamlessly integrate with your surroundings.

We have gone to extraordinary lengths to design the complete 3D printing experience for you from the ground up. Rapide One has been engineered to produce quality high-resolution parts with ease.  From its unique fully enclosed housing to a simple to use cartridge system for material Rapide One ticks all the boxes of the most discerning designer and maker. 

We didn’t invent the 3D Printer but we believe we have moved the benchmark for what a 3D Printer should be and in the process made professional quality 3D printing a reality for many.
Hardware
Our extensive research, design, and experimentation, has allowed us to work out how to create a Professional 3D printer at a much lower cost, making this dynamic technology available to everyone.

The results are simply amazing. Rapide One can print layers as thin as 100 microns with features as small as 200 microns in a build volume of 170 x 170 x 170mm.  This means you can print complex geometries with the exquisite details and beautiful surface finish that will make your prototypes and creations stand out with little or no finishing required.    
Rapide One gives you the ability to precisely generate prototypes and rapidly print them.  This means your creations will be in your hands much faster and at a fraction of the current costs.

Software
Great hardware is only the start.  We understand how important being able to use Rapide One with any platform will be.  Rapide One is compatible with all open source software applications including Repiter and Replicator G. 

A key advantage of the open source software is it is constantly being upgraded and enhanced, its free and easy to use.  This means with Rapide One you are not locked into using our software, you do not have ongoing costs in terms of maintenance for that software and you are free to choose the software you are most comfortable using.

But, we didn’t stop there, we created Rapide One to work just as perfectly with both PC & Mac so everyone has the opportunity to create not just a select few.

Materials
When Rapide One is released, it will come with filament (material) developed in our own factory especially for Rapide One.You will also be able to purchase additional material from our full range of ABS, PLA and PVA in a wide range of colors.  However, unlike many manufacturers of 3D Printers we do not require you use Rapide One exclusively with our filament, you are free to use what ever filament you want in Rapide One but it will perform at its best with our filament.

Why We Need You
Without your help we would need to sell Rapide One through our existing supply channels. This means:
Rapide One will be sold at considerably higher price,
Rapide One will enter the market much later,
Rapide One will have less features, and
Rapide One will have no customization possibilities.

Backing us now, you will be ensuring the development team can complete our goal, and help us realize the full potential of this amazing technology and at the same time getting your very own 3D Printer at a substantial saving on the RRP cost in the future.

What's in it for you?

As a backer of our project you will be one of the first to get a new Rapide One on your desktop and by being a part of our project in its infancy you will receive your very own Rapide One with the knowledge that you were a part of something big that created something that will take the 3D Printer market forward again.
What Rewards Will I Get?
As a token of our appreciation of your support you will receive your very own Rapide One from our first full production run’s (based on when you make your contribution to our campaign) and the satisfaction of knowing you were there when we needed you most.
Where Are We Now?
We have completed the development phase, have negotiated a new factory and are ready to launch full production.  The chassis, components and industrial design are already complete, we are now testing the software with prototypes in our office and at the factory.   We just need to compete the tooling and molds for the housing and we are set for full production.

Where Will Your Funding Go?
We have invested a substantial amount in the development phase of this project.  Your funding is the critical link to the completion of our project and will be used to realize our dream of the world's first 3D Printer that has been designed with you in mind and one that is not just a concept but a reality.
Use of Funds
We have working prototypes and our new factory is being readied to go into full production once we have the funds to complete the tooling and molds. 
Our new production facility has over 3200m2 dedicated floor space which will give us the capability to produce Rapide One at a rate of 500 – 1000 per month which is a substantial leap in production capability compared to the majority of 3D Printers on the market.  We need your help to take the next step.
Funding Milestones: 
The first $20,000 raised through the campaign will be used to purchase the additional tooling with the final $80,000 used to make the molds we require for the housing and some internal sections.  This phase of production requires we produce a minimum of 1000 housings and this is a substantial investment.

Your Contribution
We have put a lot of time, funding and effort into our project but like many things in life not everything can be completed by just a few. 

You and your contribution will enable us to reach our goal. You will be a part of a world first in enabling us to complete production of arguably the most beautiful 3D Printer in the market which has been designed and built to enhance your home, work space or workshop.

Why Trust Rapide 3D
Rapide 3D has more than a decade of experience in the design and development of advanced technology. We have worked with technological integration and development with our partners in China and around the world and are now at the cutting edge of 3D Printing technology and design. 

We have completed 30+ projects for our international partners on time and on budget. We now want to take it one step further by developing our own 3D Printer range. 

Moving our business exclusively to 3D Printer technology and its production means we will be able to offer a 3D Printer range that is functional, flexible and beautiful at an affordable price. 

Today, it is rare to be able to design a product, which can totally change how we see or use a technology, but Rapide One does just that by changing how you perceive what 3D Printing is and will be in the future.
We Are Ready For Full Production With Your Support.

 We have engineered Rapide One to be mass-produced efficiently using a full CNC chassis, which simplifies the currently complex issue of manufacture that other 3D printer manufacturers encounter.

We have produced 3 generations of prototypes, tested a wide range of materials (ABS, PLA, PVA) using different formulations to find the best match for Rapide One and started producing our own filament.

We have now commenced the set up for full-scale manufacturing to get your Rapide One delivered to you as soon as possible. This is the most critical component of realizing our dream and we will need a lot of support to do the job right. That’s why we’ve turned to Indiegogo to get the production lines up and running!

If you decide to become one of our foundation contributors, you will get a large discount and be one of the first to have our product on your desktop. But more importantly, you’ll play a huge part in starting this revolution in 3D printing and rapid prototyping by providing your feedback to help us with upgrades and enhancements so we can all do amazing things with Rapide One. 


Our Exciting Range of Perks:

Risks and Challenges
Like many Indiegogo projects, we have faced several key risks and challenges in getting Rapide One as far as we have. The primary risks for us included:
Engineering
To achieve the level of simplicity in user experience that we have, we had to design and engineer a very complex machine. We have taken two key steps to ensure our engineering success.

We have brought together a team of engineers and designers who are amazingly talented.

We have tested Rapide One with an obsession for perfection.

In the last year, we have built 3 generations of prototypes, a production run of alpha machines and now have a run of beta machines that are getting put through their paces in our factory.

This is giving us an amazing amount of data for ongoing research and development.
Supply Chain and Logistics
Many Indiegogo campaigns encounter problems when taking their prototypes to production. This includes issues finding suppliers and engineering products for mass-production. Smooth execution is absolutely essential to overcoming such risks. 

We have eliminated 95% of these issues by having our own factory where we will produce the printer. Our internal construction is CNC Aircraft Grade Aluminum which means we can rapidly produce Rapide One in quantities ranging from 1 to 1000 simply and most importantly cost effectively because we own the factory.  As a result we will be able to meet all our promises on time and on budget. 

Every thing is now in place, we only require the resources to commence production.
The Rapide 3D Team
Finding the right people is a challenge for any endeavor. Successfully developing a 3D printer to the standards we have requires a team of talented, passionate, and motivated designers, engineers, and entrepreneurs. 

We have formed an awesome team, but we will have to bring in more talent in to realize our dream. We are actively looking for new team members to join Rapide 3D so we can hit the ground running! 

If you think you have what it takes to not only be a part of our team but bring inspiration and dedication email us your resume.   hello@rapide-3d.com

story:
SOIRÉE DESIGN 

Statistics shows that 65 per cent of young women feel insecure about themselves and their bodies, this is something we want to change!

Soirée Design is a new fashion brand based in Sweden. The brand provides elegance for all occasions and focuses on enhancing the female body. Our vision is to make women feel strong, independent and beautiful. After living in New York and London for  some time we consistently found ourself in search for the perfect evening dress in the right material and at the right price, without any results. Thus, the idea of Soirée Design was born.  We have create a collection of 10 high quality evening dresses inspired by the night scene around the world.  


WHY WE NEED YOU?

We have hand picked the best material for each design and finished our samples, but are stuck on the last stage of creating an inventory. We need your help to take this last step and make these dresses available to the public. 

Help us to make our dreams come true and strengthen young girls self confidence.


THE PERKS:

30 Dollar: A signed copy of our design


50 dollar: A Soirée Design Beach bag


75 dollar: An original copy of our design with signature


300 dollar: EARLY BIRD- SuperNova dress


350 dollar: EARLY BIRD Goddess dress


400 dollar: EARLY BIRD A TOUCH OF SILK

 


OTHER WAYS TO HELP

Some people can´t contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. Please help us to spread the word of Soirée Design. 

You can find us at www.soireedesign.com,  Instagram: SoireedesignAB, Fancy: Soireedesign, Trendabl: Soireedesign Pose: Soireedesign.

Help us to make our dreams come true and strengthen young girls self confidence.THE PERKS:30 Dollar: A signed copy of our design50 dollar: A Soirée Design Beach bag75 dollar: An original copy of our design with signature300 dollar: EARLY BIRD- SuperNova dress



350 dollar: EARLY BIRD Goddess dress







400 dollar: EARLY BIRD A TOUCH OF SILK

 



OTHER WAYS TO HELP

Some people can´t contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. Please help us to spread the word of Soirée Design. 
You can find us at www.soireedesign.com,  Instagram: SoireedesignAB, Fancy: Soireedesign, Trendabl: Soireedesign Pose: Soireedesign.

story:
(Friends, this project is 250% overfunded, #ThankYou for your overwhelming #support. Now as you have shown you faith in our Acid Attack Fighter Rupa﻿, a trainee designer at Chhanv. Now, we are trying our best to rehabilitate minimum 5 #AcidAttack fighters by opening a venture in the national capital, New Delhi, where we at present are campaigning against Acid Attacks. Please consider donating for this project. Campaign #StopAcidAttacks don't accept funds from corporate or government, just to keep our campaign more independent with the support of individuals, friends who care for our cause.)

it was none other than her stepmother who poured acid on Rupa while she slept in her native village in Uttar Pradesh.

It is difficult to imagine her pain when Rupa narrates how she suffered living with her stepmother after her mother's demise when she was a kid. She was physically and mentally abused and lived in constant fear. And then, one night, her stepmother poured acid on her and left her without any first aid for 6 hours until her uncle reached and took her to a nearby hospital.  

Media Impact Of StopAcidAttacks


that was 6 years ago.

Today, she works with Stop Acid Attacks  team to fight for justice for herself and other acid attack fighters. Along with fellow acid attack fighter, Laxmi, she helped organise acid attack fighters from all over India and mobilise a campaign which helped ban open sale of acid and bring the issue of Acid Attacks to the forefront in India.

Before and After image of Rupa

even though the fight will continue for her, Rupa now wants to make her childhood dream come true. She always loved stitching clothes and wanted to be a designer. She wants to set up her own boutique now and work towards becoming financially independent. 

Our Goal is to rent a shop for Rupa in a decent locality in Delhi which Rupa can decorate as her boutique. We want to also provide her with the initial capital for her shop so that she can buy the equipment and employ other acid attack survivors to work with her. 

Acid attacks are a by-product of a certain societal mindset and together we can eliminate this social evil from it's roots. Let's come together to make sure that this heinous crime does not become a hindrance in someone's life. 

Help Rupa's dream become a reality. 

What these funds will be used for?

Following is our budget for Rupa's shop 

Item  Cost Total
Shop (including advance and rent for 6 months) $1000 * 6 months $6000
Interiors for the shop (one time cost) $3000 $3000
2 employees (Rs. 15,000 per head) $500 * 6 months $3000
Raw Materials  $2000 $2000
3 Umbrella Machines $100 * 3 $300
One Interlocking Machine $100 $100
Project Volunteers Remunerations  $1000 $1000
Machinery Kit $500 $500
Promotional Material & Advertising $1000 $1000
Miscellaneous  $500  $500
 Total  $16,500
Dress Designed by Rupa

(In Photo: This designs of Rupa got viral of Facebook and International media featured rupa's dress designs and much appreciation from supporters on social media)

In Photo: (from left) Laxmi, Rupa and Ritu, wearing Rupa's dress designs 
And don't forget to select perks by Rupa and her team

Help Make It Happen

Friends in India can directly donate on this link: www.bitgiving.com/project/index/id/BIT102

story:
What makes us different is that we give equal time to the people behind the scenes: the makeup artists, hairdressers, wardrobe stylists and so on. As well as feature up-and-coming talent alongside established industry pros.

At the present time we are building our clientele and networking with corporations in Rhode Island, Boston and New York. This is why we have launched our Indiegogo campaign! We have put together some AMAZING REWARDS for our supporters! Please look at our Awards section very carefully! We have put together affordable advertising deals to get you and your business off the ground! Help us help you to continue to provide this amazing magazine in print!

Exclusive Fashion & Fame Magazine Bangle!


WHY INDIEGOGO?

Running a small publication is an expensive and time-consuming undertaking.  In addition to the hundreds of unpaid hours that go into putting together each quarterly print magazine, there are daily updates to our rapidly growing Facebook fan page, website hosting fees and maintenance, administrative and legal/copyright fees, proof printing and dozens more expenses that eat up our current, small budget.

Private funding and small-run print and digital sales have kept us moving forward during our second year.  But, we need to reach out to the community now to create a bigger and better publication.  We've hit a point where working on a shoe string budget is hindering growth.

We want to continue to offer our digital version free and now want to place 3,000 copies of the Fall/Winter issue throughout Boston, Rhode Island & New York for FREE!

Self-publishing is hindering us from getting our magazine in the hands of the community! Help us continue to provide a venue for fashion-focused professionals WORLDWIDE enabling them to showcase their creativity with high-end exposure.

WHAT IS THE MONEY FOR?

We hope to bring you 3,000 print copies of Issue 7 - The Extreme Beauty Issue (Fall/ Winter '13) - with Miss United States 2012 Whitney Miller on our cover. 

The funds are going directly into covering the cost of printing this issue!



By supporting this issue, you are not only going to get something that has a lot of love and hard work devoted to it, but you'll also be supporting a platform for artists to show their work.

We have submissions from artists from all over the globe including Luciano Medeiros (Brasil), Eric Snyder (Boston) , Kate Barnes (Rhode Island), Dario Oliveira (Brasil) and many more.  


**The bracelets will be ready for pick up at our VIP party in December 2013 or contact us at info@fashionandfamemag.com and we can bill you $5 for shipping and mail to you! Details soon!

Tools and Parts  of Watch While Working on the Project

We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first one year, we hope you will send it back to us.  Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

Warranty does not cover:  

  • The life of the battery 
  • Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched , alteration or material of non metallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating

How do I submit my date of birth?

Don’t worry you’re in good hands. Once the funding period is over we will send you a link on our website where you can enter in your details, or even now you may indicate the same while filling your particulars at the time of booking i.e. if you have opted for Design Art 3409.

How do I satisfy about the genuinely of the jewel?

Our product would be accompanied with the “Certificate “from the Government approved Institution regarding use of natural genuine jewel.

Do you ship internationally? What are the charges?

We’re offering our services internationally and for this we uniformly charge $20.

Why is the specialty in different models?  

The different feature of each model is its specialty.

How do you claim that the product does have the value if watch become unserviceable due to un avoided reasons? 

Yes, it is really true, because the jewels  do have the market value even being from waste product.  

What if there are any issues with quality?

We are so confident with the quality of our product that if you find anything wrong with any quality aspect, we will change the product for you at no extra cost.

When is the expected delivery?

We expect to be able to ship out all the by the end of November 2014. 

Where can I buy your product after the campaign ends?

Our products will be available on our website. We will offer the product on the same price for three months exclusively to those   members/ contributor who have helped fund our project during the campaign and for other the price will be charged as actual.   

Why can’t I pay through PayPal?

As we have launched this campaign out of India, the Reserve Bank of India has limitations with regards to receiving funds through PayPal. This is an issue that PayPal has been working with the government to get sorted. More details can be found here: http://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526426-International-PayPal-Restrictions

If you have any further questions, feel free to email us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

story:
Mayor Rob Ford is known to wear a blue or red Tie. Due to the overwhelming requests of our backers, we have decided to launch an exclusive edition of Squeeze Ford in Green. There will be only 100  SqueezeFords made in Green, and they will only be available on Indiegogo. We wont even sell them on our website. 

The price is higher than the first edition due to the fact that we are only making 100 units,  so the setup costs are much higher on a per unit basis. We need your help to fund this special limited edition. The funds will go exclusively for set up costs and production.


During the past few months I have seen Torontonian's frustrated and stressed out, so I decided to design and build a squeeze toy, to help Torontonian's with their stress and frustration. 

We believe this funny and useful toy will turn negative energy into something fun and positive for everyone. This is how Squeeze Ford Started.


After weeks of design and prototyping we have come up with a unique design. We went through many prototypes until we had the one that best represented our toy. We wanted our Squeeze Ford to be funny, positive looking and have a cartoon looking feel.  

3dphacktory an amazing 3d printing shop studio in Toronto have  helped us  with all of our prototyping needs. I highly recommended them as they are very professional and reliable. 

Use it as fun toy with your co workers, play catch with your friends, relax by squeezing it, have rolling, bounce, backflip competitions, or use it for office warfare.

Squeeze Ford toy offers several benefits for stress relief and it’s convenient because it can go just about anywhere you can. When squeezed it decreases muscular and emotional tension, exercising the muscle of the hand, to improve blood circulation.




What is SqueezeFord™ made of?

Squeeze Ford is made of non-toxic high quality closed-cell polyurethane foam rubber.

Is it safe for children?

There is nothing to worry about, Squeeze Ford™ is 100% safe for children, in fact its been proven that using a stress toy can help your children manage ADHD. However supervision for children under 8 is recommended.

What will the money be used for?

Packaging & Shipping and distribution: Our second biggest expense is to have our Squeeze Ford shipped to everyone. We have gone through great lengths to find the very best manufacturer. Our manufacturer has to ship the squeeze fords to us in downtown Toronto and then we would redistribute to our backers.

When is Squeeze Ford Shipping? 

We are aiming to ship during the  March. If any delays are to occur we will keep everyone informed.

The funds will go exclusively for set up costs and production.During the past few months I have seen Torontonian's frustrated and stressed out, so I decided to design and build a squeeze toy, to help Torontonian's with their stress and frustration. We believe this funny and useful toy will turn negative energy into something fun and positive for everyone. This is how Squeeze Ford Started.After weeks of design and prototyping we have come up with a unique design. We went through many prototypes until we had the one that best represented our toy. We wanted our Squeeze Ford to be funny, positive looking and have a cartoon looking feel.  3dphacktory an amazing 3d printing shop studio in Toronto have  helped us  with all of our prototyping needs. I highly recommended them as they are very professional and reliable. Use it as fun toy with your co workers, play catch with your friends, relax by squeezing it, have rolling, bounce, backflip competitions, or use it for office warfare.Squeeze Ford toy offers several benefits for stress relief and it’s convenient because it can go just about anywhere you can. When squeezed it decreases muscular and emotional tension, exercising the muscle of the hand, to improve blood circulation.What is SqueezeFord™ made of?Squeeze Ford is made of non-toxic high quality closed-cell polyurethane foam rubber.Is it safe for children?There is nothing to worry about, Squeeze Ford™ is 100% safe for children, in fact its been proven that using a stress toy can help your children manage ADHD. However supervision for children under 8 is recommended.What will the money be used for?Packaging & Shipping and distribution: Our second biggest expense is to have our Squeeze Ford shipped to everyone. We have gone through great lengths to find the very best manufacturer. Our manufacturer has to ship the squeeze fords to us in downtown Toronto and then we would redistribute to our backers.When is Squeeze Ford Shipping? We are aiming to ship during the  March. If any delays are to occur we will keep everyone informed.

story: About 20 years ago, my friend taught me how to make a mini slingshot from things that each kid could find in garage and it was a hit for every summer. We climbed high up on tree to collect ammunition (nuts or small berries) because round object always flew very straight and hit the target easily. Now, 20 years later, our children climb on trees only in PC games on your phone or tablet. I decided to resurrect from the past our Mini Slingshot and modify it better! Now it is made of pure metal with all necessary details with more serious refined technology, much stronger than it were in childhood. Our Mini Slingshot became a “TOY” which can be played not only children but Parents as well.
