story:
Hey there, Indiegogo!

Thanks for checking out Canvas. Our Indiegogo campaign wrapped up on Tuesday, November 19th, 2013, and we're psyched to have received contributions from 392 awesome funders!

We have huge plans for Canvas and can't wait to launch in 2014! You've helped get us started in the right direction and we want to invite you to join us for the 

rest of our journey:

Website: http://www.canvaseyewear.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CanvasEyewear
Twitter: https://twitter.com/canvaseyewear
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+canvaseyewear
Instagram: http://instagram.com/canvaseyewear
Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/canvaseyewear

Thanks so much for your support!

Justin & Ward


Every pair of sunglasses we’ve ever purchased - whether from large, well-known brands or small sunglasses startups - share one thing in common: the designs and colors were dictated to us by the brand. We think that’s ridiculous, and that’s why we’re doing it differently.

At Canvas we’re creating a world where consumers make design choices for themselves, and at a price that is affordable for everyone who wants a high quality pair of customized sunglasses. Additionally, all of our products and packaging are made from eco-friendly materials. Custom sunglasses that are both affordable and easy on the environment - what could be better than that!

If you are looking for the perfect pair of sunglasses, you can keep looking in the sea of overpriced, mass produced, unoriginal frames where designs and colors are dictated to you by the brands you buy from - or you can start designing your own.


We’re going to be launching with our first frame style, our take on the classic wayfarer. 

Through an easy to use online configuration tool, you will be able to:

  • Browse our extensive library of customizable patterns and designs that you won't find anywhere else
  • Customize each of the colors used in your design, creating a pair of sunglasses that is unique to your individual style
  • Upload images or designs of your own for the ultimate level of customization

Each pair is also individually produced and shipped within two business days!


Materials: Eco-friendly, proprietary new formula of recycled polycarbonate polymers that provide an extremely durable, lightweight, and comfortable fit!

Hinges: Uniquely designed “Snap and Click” locking hinges, mechanically engineered without the use of screws and springs.

Lenses: Premium optical grade CR-39 lenses with UV400 protection in your choice of five colors.

Design Application: The design and colors you select for your custom sunglasses actually becomes part of the frame itself, permanently imaged in high definition color!


Our fundraising goal is $10,000. Your donations will support the last and most important stage of our project, the final development of our online configurator. Additional funds raised beyond our goal will go towards the development of additional frame styles for you to customize.


In return for your early support of Canvas, we want you to be the first to design your own pair of custom sunglasses, and at exclusive Indiegogo pricing! Check out the great perks we've put together for you:

$30 - Early Bird - One Pair of Custom Sunglasses
$35 - One Pair of Custom Sunglasses
$35 - Gift One Pair of Custom Sunglasses
$60 - Two Pairs of Custom Sunglasses
$65 - Buy One, Gift One Pair of Custom Sunglasses
$100 - Four Pairs of Custom Sunglasses
$275 - 12 Month Subscription Plan

Shipping on all sunglasses pre-ordered through Indiegogo is FREE to anywhere in the world!!!


While meeting our $10,000 fundraising goal is our primary Indiegogo objective, financial contributions are not the only way you can help. Here are some additional ways you can support Canvas:

  • We're always looking for cool pattern donations to be included in our library.  If you're an awesome designer, or know an awesome designer, we'd love to connect!
  • We're just two dudes.  We could really use some help sharing this project with the world. Sharing our campaign link with your social networks would be a truly awesome gesture! You can use the sharing buttons under our video at the top of this page.

Thanks for spending some time with us and checking out Canvas sunglasses. We're super excited to launch and can't wait to see how you design your custom sunglasses!

Custom Indiegogo Logo Design!


Custom Hawaiian Style Design!


Custom Music Notes Design!

story:
About Hera

I am Theofylaktos Ntalagiannis, an engineer whose passion is creative and conceptual design. After spending some time trying various atomizers to search for the best flavor, I conceived the idea of designing a totally unique atomizer to outperform every other out there in flavor and performance. That was when HERA PERCEPTION was born.

 

The mission

The mission is to bring vaping experience a step forward to top performance and flavor output and to simply offer the user an excellent build quality atomizer with endless capabilities.

 

Why PERCEPTION?

PERCEPTION is totally unique; it is a solid, well-designed rebuild-able dripping tank atomizer for those who aesthetics and performance mean a lot. It will satisfy to the greatest all flavor lovers and cloud chasers. Dual coil large and easy-to-build deck, vast wicking capabilities, simple and yet effective air flow comprise a great atomizer designed with high precision and attention to every detail.

 

Easy to build deck - Dual coil

PERCEPTION offers a big deck to build your coils and vast wicking holes.

 

Great flavor and vapor production

Best flavour and vapor production oriented Chimney design.

 

Adjustable radial air flow holes

Radial designed air holes for multi-direction & effective air flow. Adjustable from minimum air intake to full air flow.

 

Design

 

Stainless steel structure with painted details

 

Different color and tank combination

 

Bringing HERA PERCEPTION into life

PERCEPTION is a design concept, carefully and thoroughly made to deliver the best flavor and vapor production to the user. Passion for creation and the anticipation for seeing PERCEPTION coming into life is my goal.

At this point, your contribution for creating something different and unique in the vaping community is highly appreciated and respectfully anticipated.

Let’s bring HERA PERCEPTION into life!

story:
UPD [Nov, 29] the IGG-project is over. yet we knit custom sweaters. 

come and see yourself!

http://sweaterrarium.com 

https://www.facebook.com/sweaterrarium

https://vk.com/sweaterrarium

http://instagram.com/sweaterrarium

https://twitter.com/sweaterrarium



Hello everybody! My name is Denis and I live in Kazan (Russia). 

Here's my project - Sweaterrarium - custom knit sweaters. We've been knitting custom sweaters for two years already. Our aim is to make custom knit sweaters on demand with any patterns or pictures. 

What You Get

You get a unique made-to-order knitted sweater or hoodie with your own design and exactly your size. 

[sweaterrarium@gmail.com] 

All the sweaters are knitted by Sweaterrarium.

Please be aware about the copyrights, we don't steal. If you doubt, redraw the picture, make it funny, change it somehow (we can help you do that), make it fan-art or derivative work under four factors of fair use. If we fit those rules, we fit any laws.

What we need knit

Sweaters



 

If the picture is very complex we'll figure something out, i.e. add some embroidery. 


 

Hoodies [if ti has a hood or a zipper, it's a hoodie]




Scarves



*Picture requirements

Please be aware that we do not print a picture, we knit it. Colors on the picture are corresponding threads. A pixel is actually a knitted stitch. Number of pixels in a square centimeters can vary according to knitting class (small/big stitches). We consider approximately 5*5 stitches in a square centimeter for 10 class machine knitting. 

Jacquard knitting (most of present sweaters) has a strict physical limitation - 4 colors in a horizontal row. Intarsia knitting is more flexible. In fact all the limitations depend on a machine model. We want to get the one with fewer limitations of course.


A picture shouldn't have color gradients or lots of small colored details. 

8-bit pixel art is the best! 

Ways You Can Help

Repost us, like us, share us, tweet us, +1 us, embed us, email us, follow us. 

Thanks in advance.

Maybe someday you will get your own pixel sweater.

Find us online

sweaterrarium@gmail.com

http://sweaterrarium.com

https://www.facebook.com/sweaterrarium

http://www.youtube.com/user/sweaterrarium

https://vk.com/sweaterrarium

http://instagram.com/sweaterrarium

https://twitter.com/sweaterrarium

story:
MIX is an AR glasses set with a field-of-view (FoV) of 96 degrees. It’s small, lightweight, and compatible with SteamVR. 

We believe that AR will be the next generation computing platform, but only if three goals are reached:   

1. An immersive field of view

2. Glasses that are lightweight and comfortable to wear 

3. Enough developers and contents 

Instead of waiting for satisfactory AR glasses, we’ve decided to step forward on our own to create them. That’s why we developed MIX, with these features:

Tom's Hardware - "ANTVR is also offering the MIX headset at an aggressive price compared to its competition."

Trendhunter - "the new ANTVR Mix glasses are currently realizing some of that immense potential."

VR Focus - "And to make development on MIX easy, ANTVR has ensure compatibility with the SteamVR SDK."   

 I4U - "MIX’s extensive FoV gives users a remarkably fluid and natural stereoscopic experience directly through the glasses."

The upgraded prototype (4th Gen.) with improved environmental brightness and display at the last VRLA, May 2018.

 

Demonstrating MIX at AWE, Santa Clara, June 2018.

 

The first demo of the MIX prototype at GDC, San Francisco, March 2018.

 

Discussion with Palmer Luckey in LA. Thanks for his invaluable feedback!

Palmer Luckey - "I had a chance to try out the MIX prototype a few weeks ago. Really novel approach to making a wide-FOV AR headset in a small form factor."

 

Demo at VR MIXER (hosted by SVVR), and at SVVR’s office in San Jose.

MIX’s 96° FoV is nearly the widest field of view on the AR market.   

Every AR device has an effective FoV, only within which virtual objects can be displayed. For an AR device with a poor FoV, the view is so limited that only a partial, rather than complete, image can be viewed. It feels like looking out through a distant narrow window. As a result, the existence of this obvious "window frame" keeps reminding us of the unreal nature of the image. But for an AR device with a FoV close to the user’s eye, like MIX, the boundary to the virtual world can hardly be noticed—the seamless fusion of virtual objects and the real world defines an immersive AR experience.  

MIX is small, lightweight (130g), and comfortable to wear.   

 

Thanks to the Dual-Channel Mixed Optics we invented, MIX has a larger FoV and comes in a slimmer size than other products using an optical waveguide or surface reflectors.    

Dual-channel mixed optical system has a compound structure with multiple layers. The key component is a set of dual-channel lenses with two different optical channels for enlarging the display light and bypassing the real light, to present AR vision with a large FoV.  

*To know more about the optics of MIX, check #1 in FAQ.

Content is the key factor for any AR glasses, so MIX connects to PC and is designed to be compatible with SteamVR. The existing games on SteamVR with a dark background can be used on MIX—you will see the real environment instead of the dark area. It’s a fresh AR experience with existing content.    

Link: list of SteamVR apps suitable for MIX that we found.

To deliver a complete AR experience, MIX supports positional tracking. In this way, a virtual object can remain in place in the real environment, rather than moving with you.   

 

To have diverse interactions in AR, we provide optional add-ons, including eye tracking, hand tracking, and controllers. 

MIX comes with a removable black VR visor and a transparent AR visor for no extra charge. When the VR visor is attached, it will block all outside light, effectively allowing you to switch MIX from an AR glasses set to a VR set. You can then play any VR game that’s on SteamVR. When you want to experience AR again, just take it off and use the transparent visor.

For those who want to explore the possibilities of AR content, by using a common SteamVR SDK, creating an AR application has never been easier. If you have experience developing content on SteamVR, just clear the background and apply the black skybox. Then your first AR application is born.   

To know more about SteamVR SDK

Aside from entertainment applications, MIX can also be used as the basis for the development of programs in many other fields, such as education, exhibition, design, and industry.   

 You can also hack with MIX in different ways:

OS：Windows 10 (64bit)     

Processor：Intel Core i5-4590, or AMD FX 8300, equivalent or better

Intel Core i7-6700 or AMD FX 9590, equivalent or better (if using inside-out tracking module)  

Memory：8 GB RAM DDR4 or more  

Graphics：Nvidia GeForce GTX 960, or AMD Radeon RX 470, equivalent or better (AMD only supported in extended mode, not direct mode)

Video Output：HDMI 1.4  

USB：USB 3.0 * 2

We are not new to VR & AR. It was you, the backers on Kickstarter from all over the world, who supported us in 2014, which gave birth to our first VR product. We then acquired funding from Sequoia Capital and designed several successful products—over 1 million of which have been sold in China, India, the US, and Europe. We’ve established close co-brand collaboration with famous companies including Lenovo, Motorola, OnePlus, and AOC.  

And now it’s time for the next step: bringing you the most innovative device we’ve ever developed. Because of your wisdom and curiosity in the field, you deserve that taste of the future first. That’s why we’re here to share the dream with you once again. 

 Help us by sharing MIX with your friends!   

              

Press Kit

If you are a member of the press and need more resources, please download our press kit or reach us at pr@antvr.com

Ways to Contact Us  

1. Back our campaign and leave a comment on our Kickstarter page.  

2. Send a direct message to us on Kickstarter.  

3. For further support, contact antvr.com@gmail.com  

4. Follow us on our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/antvrofficial/

Special Thanks

We would like to thank our team members, friends, and everyone who has helped throughout our journey. Your feedback, support, and positive encouragement have been incredibly inspiring.  

Special thanks to the Kickstarter team, Palmer Luckey, Duncan Turner from HAX, Tiantian Zhang from Vue, and Joanna Wei.

Thank you to the people who give us feedback at every event.

We appreciate the professional help from NUUK, Blazon and Jellop on this campaign.

 Help us by sharing MIX with your friends!   

 
              Press Kit
If you are a member of the press and need more resources, please download our press kit or reach us at pr@antvr.com
Ways to Contact Us  
1. Back our campaign and leave a comment on our Kickstarter page.  
2. Send a direct message to us on Kickstarter.  
3. For further support, contact antvr.com@gmail.com   
4. Follow us on our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/antvrofficial/
Special Thanks
We would like to thank our team members, friends, and everyone who has helped throughout our journey. Your feedback, support, and positive encouragement have been incredibly inspiring.  
Special thanks to the Kickstarter team, Palmer Luckey, Duncan Turner from HAX, Tiantian Zhang from Vue, and Joanna Wei.
Thank you to the people who give us feedback at every event.
We appreciate the professional help from NUUK, Blazon and Jellop on this campaign.
Finally, we'd like to give our sincere thanks to Minecraft, Super Mario, Steam and SteamVR, The magic whale, Mr. Terminator, Star Wars, Google Glass, Microsoft Hololens, Lenovo Mirage, Meta 2, HTC Vive, Space Pirate (Steam App), Audioshield (Steam App), Beat Saber (Steam App), Tilt Brush (from Google), Blocks (from Leap Motion), HashVR Game Studio, Ice World Game Studio, Amazon, SVVR, Ant-Man, Kickstarter, Sequoia Capital, Lenovo, Motorola, OnePlus, and AOC.

story:
You can now order on our website :

https://www.lenger-paris.com/product/sneakers/

 

We were inspired by Scandinavian fashion that we see as elegant & minimalist. Following this universe, we removed all unnecessary stitches on the surface and use one monochromatic color per pair. We spent months discussing with the factory trying to hide most stitches while keeping the same quality, finding the right colors of leather & sole that would match, picking the right sole model, the right leather, etc. It's important to note that internal linings are made with 'cowhide' to respect certain traditions.

 

Our leather is an Italian calfskin full grain leather, ‘full grain’ being the most premium part of leathers and calfskin an excellent type of leather. We used the best leather we could think of : according to us, it’s the best out there. Its flexibility will create the comfort you’re looking for in such a pair of shoes, and its strength will make it last years, not just months.

The sole is an Italian jewel. Based in Italy for decades, the Margom brand is known for being the go-to sole of European luxury fashion houses. It has been studied over time to fit the shape of your foot nicely and resist daily usage. The sole thickness may seem strong at first view, but it quickly adapts to your foot and walking habits. The sole is not only glued, it’s also sewed to make sure it won’t fall out over time.

Because we truly believe in our products, we provide a 2-year warranty against manufacturing defects.

 

We sell directly to you via pre-orders to cut retailers margins and optimize logistics. As such, we're able to mark it for $120 (vs. $350 full retail price). Plus, shipping is free, worldwide!

 

Based in Paris, Lenger was born with one focus : design essential objects with a minimalist approach using high-end materials at a fair price. We personally felt the need for these type of products. But how could we make luxury basics less expensive?

Months ago, the idea of crowdfunding products started to pop up, and made lots of sense. First, by having people pledge to support a product, we could test it and see if it would be a good fit. And because we would sell all an entire production at once, we wouldn’t have stocks, unsold inventory, expensive individual shipping rates. That would cut a big part of logistic costs for a traditional brand. On the retail side, we wouldn’t have any middle man between you and us since we speak directly to you. That’s a huge chunk of prices: at least -35% for online marketplaces or -50% for brick-and-mortar shops.

 

 

The shoe is for both men & women since we’re using a unisex sole. The width is of regular size. Here are the sizes we offer:

story:
Mamahuhu's Signature Chukka Stitch is a versatile shoe that strike the perfect balance between dressy and casual. A statement piece that elevates your style with expressive colors and urban sleek style.

Use for at a pub in downtown Dublin, a wild road trip along the West Coast, studying at college, picnicking at Central Park, or sitting in a café in Paris.

Designed for Women & Men.

 

By combining hand burnished Riviera leather with sleek design and inspiring colours, the Riviera Mocassin Smooth breaks free from traditional expectations for dress shoes.

Use at office in New York, wedding in India, state dinner with president of Colombia, meeting the bankers in Japan, or having sangria with friends in Spain.

Designed for Women & Men.

Adding Mamahuhu signature stitching to the elegant Riviera leather in expressive colours, the Riviera Moccasin Stitch blurs the line between formal and casual wear.

Use at office in Germany, drinking vodka in a Russian club, visiting a pyramid in Egypt, at a gig in San Fransisco, or while shopping in Shanghai.

Designed for Women & Men.

Riviera Chukka Smooth mixes innovative design with classy materials, transforming the chukka boot into a stylish and sturdy everyday wear. An unconventional shoe designed to be anything but ordinary. 

Use at office in Norway, the horse tracks in Mumbai, oil platform inspection in China, a night out in Bangkok, grocery shopping in Rome, or for a house party in Australia.

Designed for Women & Men.

Riviera Chukka Stitch brings together classy materials and playful design, creating a shoe that looks exceptional in everyday occasions, yet sharp and smart in a board room meeting. 

Use at office in Dublin, while eating a steak in Houston, at the cabin in Canada, visiting clients in South Africa, or for making a great impression on a first date.

Designed for Women & Men.

 

Mamahuhu’s Nevaditas Winter is like our favorite superhero: Tough and Protective on the outside, Warm and Soft on the inside. Made using sturdy and colorful leather, they have a cuddly cotton lining. Wearing Nevaditas Winter has been described as “walking on a cloud” or having your feet hugged by a teddy bear.

Use for walking through a blizzard in New York, hiking in the Swiss mountains, wandering the rainy streets of London, or meeting up for tea in freezing Mongolia.

Designed for Women & Men.

Here is a closer look on what makes Mamahuhu shoes so comfortable, long lasting, and stylish.

COMFORT: Soft leather lining, unique latex insole, and flexible outsole ensures great support and flexibility.

DURABLE: Our shoes are allowed to rest on their shoe trees for 24h to retain the shape. We also hand nail our shoes, and this attention to detail makes every pair a unique piece of art.

STYLE: Luxury quality leather in wonderful colors combined with elegant design and sleek finish makes for stylish shoes.

We source our leather directly from Itagui, the best tanneries in Colombia, where Italy imports it's leather from. As opposed to low quality production, each piece of leather we use is certified as Chromium Free and tinted thoroughly with ink.

Our artisans cut the leather by hand to feel the leather, avoid marks and select the best pieces. Each shoe is made using classic techniques, sewed by hand, and nailed to a shoe tree for 24 hours to retain the shape.

Our rewards are designed for one simple goal: For you to get an outstanding pair of handmade leather shoes, tailored to your measurements for under $130! That means prices that are 20-35% off retail. For details, please see the individual rewards. For any questions feel free to ask us in the comments sections, and we will get back to you as soon as we can.

Wondering how can we offer a $500 shoe for under $130? No middleman and modest markup equals to our magnificent price. As a fairtrade business and ethical brand, we want our shoes to be affordable for majority of customers, not exclusive to upper class.

Selected as one of the TOP 15 ETHICAL SHOE RBANDS OF 2016 by The Good Trade and TOP 8 ETHICAL SHOES BRANDS FOR CONSCIOUS CONSUMERS by Eco Warrior Princess, Mamahuhu has been endeavouring to empower artisans to socially thrive on their own merits, work pride and sense of accomplishment.

We believe in ''Teach a man to fish, and you have fed him for a lifetime'', and therefore instead of hiring artisans, we help them set up their own ethical workshops, create more jobs within the community, and grow to become a self-sustaining business independent from Mamahuhu.

Opposite to prevalent low cost factories and sweatshops in fast fashion industry, Mamahuhu strictly applies fair trade throughout the whole production process, ensuring every artisans is fairly paid, has flexible work schedule, and every workshop employs women, and no child.

In 5 years, Mamahuhu has helped set up 11 workshops in Colombia, and this allows 112 artisans to happily continue their family tradition of leather shoemaking.

There is a happy artisan behind each pair of Mamahuhu. Here we wanted to take the chance to introduce you to some of our artisans, so you can get to know those who make your shoes, and their stories.

Jorge, Master Artisan - With over 20 years of experiece, he is a true artist. With the help of Mamahuhu he has gone from unemployed to being a company owner. Today he owns and directs his own workshop with more than 6 other artisans.

Efren, Master Artisan - When we met, Efren was working in a big factory where the pay was late, and workers were mistreated. Having seen success with Jorge, we repeated the process. Efren is today the sole owner of a workshop employing more than 10 people.

Miguel, Master Artisan - When we met he was doing a job he hated, making low cost shoes. With our initial micro-loan and support he was able to create luxury quality shoes. Today he owns his workshop where he employs over 20 artisans.

Any many more...

 

With this Indiegogo campaign, we offer made-to-measure shoes. This means, at the end of the campaign, you will receive sizing and fitting instructions from us on how to measure your feet to assure the best fit. Upon receiving your measurements/size choices, our artisans will makes your unique Mamahuhus that run true to YOUR measurements. 

If the size you order happens to not be the best fit, we will exchange it for you (please see DELIVERY section below for shipping charges on exchanges).

WOMEN & MEN SIZING CHART

Once you pledge, we will send out survey to you 2-5 days after to collect your choice of style, color, sole, size and laces.

Production is scheduled to take 8 weeks, after which we will export to Spain, and from there ship your handmade Mamahuhus to you.

Shipping is included for all early bird shipments worldwide, 3 pairs + shoekit, and for the "one unique pair". 

All other pledges will be shipped worldwide, at provided shipping rate. 

Once we custom-produce all shoes in our workshops in Colombia, we will export them together via airfreight to our fulfillment center in Spain, from where all individual orders will be shipped.

Orders shipped within the EU will not incur customs duty charges, neither will be subject to VAT. 

If applicable, duties and local taxes will be charged by the appropriate authority at the destination country. Please determine these charges locally.

If the need for exchange arises, we will need to charge for exchange shipping both ways as we are offering our shoes with a minimal margin here on Indiegogo.

Mamahuhu’s strength is our team. Over the last six years it has grown from two founders in Colombia to over 150 people, spread over multiple countries and nationalities. Here are the three of us behind this Indiegogo project. 

 

Risks and challenges

With six years of experience working with these workshops and artisans, and two successful Indiegogo campaigns behind us, we have seen it all.

Workshops are carefully chosen based on experience, prior relationships, and reliability. Based on this we are confident that our team, suppliers, and vendors are able to keep the schedule, and deliver on time. 
With manufacturing, the most common challenge is production delays. Although we are well versed in production management and delivering goods on time, there are times in life when we are faced with difficulties out of our control. 
In the event of a short delay we will keep you updated, so you will know where your shoes are in the process, and what is going on.

story:
Hi my name is DJ Heider and I am the creator of the Heitis Watch Company. The company was just successfully funded on Kickstarter. Now I am starting on production ASAP but i am still in need of more funding as I am still in the start-up phase.  I am using this IndieGOGO campaign as a pre-order opportunity to hopefully pay down some of my debt.  Its a win win situation, you get a great watch at a reduced price and I get some sales to get the company running.  

Here at HEITIS, I started out with a passion for timepieces and collecting watches. As a lot of you probably know a nice watch is pretty expensive. Other watches with comparable specifications can retail for over $500 dollars. With that being said, I recently finished watch school and started to build watches and quickly realized I could make quality, classic designs at affordable prices... HEITIS was born!  

​I set out to use quality components that I would want in my own watches. Swiss made Ronda Movements, 316L Surgical Grade Stainless Steel for cases and buckles and scratch resistant Sapphire Crystals just to name a few... ​ I hope that my passion for timepieces shows in my work, materials and designs. Each watch was carefully made with timeless etiquette in mind. 

The HEITIS Aviator Sandblasted Stainless

  

The HEITIS Aviator PVD Black

The HEITIS Aviator Caseback

The HEITIS AVIATOR is inspired by the clean look of altimeters and other cockpit instruments, which are ergonomically designed to facilitate reading both in daylight or in the dark. With large digits and bold hands that have a super lume coating, this sturdy yet elegant watch leaves quite an impression. It is guaranteed to draw compliments. The movement is manufactured by Ronda, a renowned movement manufacturer in Switzerland. With a 44m diameter solid surgical grade 316L stainless steel case and genuine leather band with solid stainless steel butterfly clasp buckle this elegant watch has a notable presence. On top of all that it lies beneath a Sapphire Crystal with AR coating.

SPECIFICATIONS  

Case: Surgical Grade 316L Stainless steel, PVD Black  

Caseback: Stainless steel, screw down  

Dial: Stainess Steel Aviator  

Hands: Sword with super lume  

Calendar: Date displayed at 3 o'clock position with unique cut  

Strap: Genuine leather

Clasp: Butterfly 

Crystal: Sapphire Crystal with AR coating  

Crown: Push/Pull 7mm

Movement: Ronda 705 Swiss Quartz  

Water resistance: 5 ATM  

Case measurements: 44 mm  

Strap measurements: 20 mm

The HEITIS Chronograph

The HEITIS Chronograph Black Dial

The HEITIS Chronograph White Dial

The HEITIS CHRONOGRAPH features a 316L Surgical Stainless Steel case and features date, day and chronograph sub-dials, giving you a great deal of practical information at a moments glance. The perfect blend of function and style.  This mens timepiece is constructed with a Sapphire Crystal and a OS20 Chronograph Movement. This Movement has all functioning sub-dials unlike fashion brand watches that are just for show. Each sub-dial has a function: one for seconds, minutes and hours. This movement also has a stop watch feature and Tachymeter function. The Genuine Leather band & Stainless Steel mesh bracelet round out the impressive list of features. Details abound on this watch, from the Super Luminous hands and red seconds hand to the multiple matching sub-dial hands. This watch is ideal for men who prefer a classically sophisticated watch that looks the part.

SPECIFICATIONS  

Case: 316L Surgical Stainless Steel

Caseback: Stainless Steel, screw down  

Dial: Stainless Steel Chronograph  

Hands: Stainless Steel with Super Lume

Markers: Stainless Steel Indicators  

Calendar: Yes  

Strap: Genuine leather &  Stainless Steel Mesh  

Clasp: Buckle  

Crystal: Sapphire Crystal w/AR coating  

Crown: Push/Pull 7 mm  

Movement: OS20 Chronograph  

Water resistance: 10 ATM 

Case measurement: 44 mm  

Strap measurements: 24 mm

             

The HEITIS Classic

       

The HEITIS Classic

The "Classic"... this design is truly elegant.  The HEITIS CLASSIC mens timepiece features a 316L Surgical Stainless Steel case with a scratch-proof Sapphire Crystal and Genuine Leather strap. This classic-designed timepiece has a minimalist dial with easy to read hour markers and a dedicated sub-dial for the seconds hand. Behind the scenes the watch relies on a Swiss Ronda 6004D quartz movement. An understated band with a buckle clasp finishes off the look of this classic leather strap timepiece. Whether you are wearing a suit at the office or having a casual weekend this watch is a versatile option.  

SPECIFICATIONS  

Case:316L Surgical Stainless steel, PVD Black  

Caseback: Stainless steel, screw down   

Dial: Stainless Steel Classic   

Hands: Stainless Steel Markers: Stainless Steel Indicators   

Calendar: N/A   

Strap: Genuine leather   

Clasp: Buckle   

Crystal: Sapphire Crystal w/AR coating   

Crown: Push/Pull 5 mm  

Movement: Swiss Ronda 6004D quartz  

Water resistance: 5 ATM  

Case measurements: 44 mm   

Strap measurements: 20 mm             

MATERIALS - 316L STAINLESS STEEL 

316L Stainless Steel is a grade of stainless steel that has extra-low carbon content and is extremely resistant to corrosion. Its is easy to buff and polish. 316L is also magnetic resistant unlike the general-use stainless steel grade of 201 or 304L. With Molybdenum added it gives 316L a better overall corrosion-resistant property than 304L. Therefore the material is ideal for a great watch case.

MATERIALS - SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL

Did you know sapphire crystal is not really a glass, rather a synthetically made crystal? It has superb transparency and is extraordinarily scratch-resistant. To give some comparison, sapphire has a value of 9 on the Mohs scale of mineral hardness. Diamond is a 10! That is why you will usually find sapphire crystal on more expensive luxury watches. Now you can find them on Heitis watches at an affordable price.

MATERIALS - QUALITY SWISS RONDA MOVEMENTS & OS20 CHRONOGRAPHS 

THE HEARTBEAT OF A WATCH.. Time is our constant companion. Even the most extravagant watch needs a reliable movement to keep it in regular motion. Switzerland has earned itself an enviable reputation as a manufacturer of the finest watch movements. Ronda has been committed to time for decades now and that is why we chose to use their high quality movements. Their quartz movements tick away in a vast range of watches from the elegant to the sporty, and in exclusive timepieces produced for the luxury market sector. Now you can have the same luxury movement in a Heitis watch at an unbelievable value.  

We also use the OS20 movement in the Heitis Chronograph. It is unbelievably well built and reliable. It features Powercell Saving Reset Mechanism (PSRM) Over-loading Compensation Device (OLCD) and Digital Frequency Control (DFC) for time adjustment. It also features fully functional subdials, Chronograph minute hand, second hand, 24 hour hand, tachymeter and date function.

 GENUINE LEATHER STRAPS WITH QUICK CHANGE FEATURE 

Here at Heitis Watch Company individuality matters. So we have used a nice quality Genuine Leather Strap that is soft and comfortable. We have also equipped the straps with a quick change function so you can change the look of your watch in seconds. No tools required, just use your finger tip to easily change your strap.

SWISS SUPER LUMINOUS

Super-LumiNova is a strontium aluminate based non-radioactive and nontoxic photoluminescent or afterglow pigment used for illuminating markings on watch dials, hands and bezels, etc.   The material works on the principle of “phosphorescence” and is charged through exposure to light. It is non-radioactive and slowly decreases in brightness until recharged again.

OPTIONS :FOR THE HEITIS "CLASSIC"

PICK YOUR CASE FINISH AND DIAL COLOR FOR THE "CLASSIC". EACH WATCH ALSO COMES WITH BOTH STRAP COLORS SHOWN BELOW. STRAPS ARE EQUIPPED WITH A QUICK RELEASE CHANGE FUNCTION SO YOU CAN EASILY CHANGE THE LOOK OF YOUR WATCH IN SECONDS WITH NO TOOLS!

 OPTIONS : FOR THE HEITIS 'AVIATOR' 

 

PICK YOUR CASE FINISH FOR THE "AVIATOR". EACH WATCH ALSO COMES WITH BOTH STRAP COLORS SHOWN BELOW. STRAPS ARE EQUIPPED WITH A QUICK RELEASE CHANGE FUNCTION SO YOU CAN EASILY CHANGE THE LOOK OF YOUR WATCH IN SECONDS WITH NO TOOLS!

OPTIONS : FOR THE HEITIS "CHRONOGRAPH"  

 

PICK YOUR DIAL COLOR. EACH WATCH ALSO COMES WITH A LEATHER STRAP (BLACK OR BROWN) SHOWN BELOW AND A STAINLESS STEEL MESH STRAP. LEATHER STRAPS ARE EQUIPPED WITH A QUICK RELEASE CHANGE FUNCTION SO YOU CAN EASILY CHANGE THE LOOK OF YOUR WATCH IN SECONDS WITH NO TOOLS!

Nice things come in nice packages! So check ours out, and yes it comes with 2 straps! 

 

Thank you all so much for taking your time to view this project . I hope that you are as passionate as I am about the watches and you make your pledge in order to receive your watch(es) at a nice savings over retail.

Please share this project with your family and friends on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram. It would mean the world to me. 

Cheers! DJ HEIDER 

Risks and challenges

Creating and delivering a new product may come with unexpected delays or setbacks. I have strong relationships and a history of working hard with a reliable supply chain. This gives me the confidence to be able to say that i have minimized these risks for myself and ultimately you the customers.

You have my word that i will provide complete transparency and inform backers every step of the way.

I'll update you as much as humanly possible about the progress, and if there are any delays, I'll let you know ASAP!

After all is said and done, I will deliver the best quality timepieces to each and every one of my backers.

Thank-you so much!

Cheers!

Duty/VAT Charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.
story_txt: Hi my name is DJ Heider and I am the creator of the Heitis Watch Company. The company was just successfully funded on Kickstarter. Now I am starting on production ASAP but i am still in need of more funding as I am still in the start-up phase.  I am using this IndieGOGO campaign as a pre-order opportunity to hopefully pay down some of my debt.  Its a win win situation, you get a great watch at a reduced price and I get some sales to get the company running.  Here at HEITIS, I started out with a passion for timepieces and collecting watches. As a lot of you probably know a nice watch is pretty expensive. Other watches with comparable specifications can retail for over $500 dollars. With that being said, I recently finished watch school and started to build watches and quickly realized I could make quality, classic designs at affordable prices... HEITIS was born!  ​I set out to use quality components that I would want in my own watches. Swiss made Ronda Movements, 316L Surgical Grade Stainless Steel for cases and buckles and scratch resistant Sapphire Crystals just to name a few... ​ I hope that my passion for timepieces shows in my work, materials and designs. Each watch was carefully made with timeless etiquette in mind. The HEITIS Aviator Sandblasted Stainless  The HEITIS Aviator PVD BlackThe HEITIS Aviator CasebackThe HEITIS AVIATOR is inspired by the clean look of altimeters and other cockpit instruments, which are ergonomically designed to facilitate reading both in daylight or in the dark. With large digits and bold hands that have a super lume coating, this sturdy yet elegant watch leaves quite an impression. It is guaranteed to draw compliments. The movement is manufactured by Ronda, a renowned movement manufacturer in Switzerland. With a 44m diameter solid surgical grade 316L stainless steel case and genuine leather band with solid stainless steel butterfly clasp buckle this elegant watch has a notable presence. On top of all that it lies beneath a Sapphire Crystal with AR coating.SPECIFICATIONS  Case: Surgical Grade 316L Stainless steel, PVD Black  Caseback: Stainless steel, screw down  Dial: Stainess Steel Aviator  Hands: Sword with super lume  Calendar: Date displayed at 3 o'clock position with unique cut  Strap: Genuine leatherClasp: Butterfly Crystal: Sapphire Crystal with AR coating  Crown: Push/Pull 7mmMovement: Ronda 705 Swiss Quartz  Water resistance: 5 ATM  Case measurements: 44 mm  Strap measurements: 20 mmThe HEITIS ChronographThe HEITIS Chronograph Black DialThe HEITIS Chronograph White DialThe HEITIS CHRONOGRAPH features a 316L Surgical Stainless Steel case and features date, day and chronograph sub-dials, giving you a great deal of practical information at a moments glance. The perfect blend of function and style.  This mens timepiece is constructed with a Sapphire Crystal and a OS20 Chronograph Movement. This Movement has all functioning sub-dials unlike fashion brand watches that are just for show. Each sub-dial has a function: one for seconds, minutes and hours. This movement also has a stop watch feature and Tachymeter function. The Genuine Leather band & Stainless Steel mesh bracelet round out the impressive list of features. Details abound on this watch, from the Super Luminous hands and red seconds hand to the multiple matching sub-dial hands. This watch is ideal for men who prefer a classically sophisticated watch that looks the part.SPECIFICATIONS  Case: 316L Surgical Stainless SteelCaseback: Stainless Steel, screw down  Dial: Stainless Steel Chronograph  Hands: Stainless Steel with Super LumeMarkers: Stainless Steel Indicators  Calendar: Yes  Strap: Genuine leather &  Stainless Steel Mesh  Clasp: Buckle  Crystal: Sapphire Crystal w/AR coating  Crown: Push/Pull 7 mm  Movement: OS20 Chronograph  Water resistance: 10 ATM Case measurement: 44 mm  Strap measurements: 24 mm             The HEITIS Classic       The HEITIS ClassicThe "Classic"... this design is truly elegant.  The HEITIS CLASSIC mens timepiece features a 316L Surgical Stainless Steel case with a scratch-proof Sapphire Crystal and Genuine Leather strap. This classic-designed timepiece has a minimalist dial with easy to read hour markers and a dedicated sub-dial for the seconds hand. Behind the scenes the watch relies on a Swiss Ronda 6004D quartz movement. An understated band with a buckle clasp finishes off the look of this classic leather strap timepiece. Whether you are wearing a suit at the office or having a casual weekend this watch is a versatile option.  SPECIFICATIONS  Case:316L Surgical Stainless steel, PVD Black  Caseback: Stainless steel, screw down   Dial: Stainless Steel Classic   Hands: Stainless Steel Markers: Stainless Steel Indicators   Calendar: N/A   Strap: Genuine leather   Clasp: Buckle   Crystal: Sapphire Crystal w/AR coating   Crown: Push/Pull 5 mm  Movement: Swiss Ronda 6004D quartz  Water resistance: 5 ATM  Case measurements: 44 mm   Strap measurements: 20 mm             MATERIALS - 316L STAINLESS STEEL 316L Stainless Steel is a grade of stainless steel that has extra-low carbon content and is extremely resistant to corrosion. Its is easy to buff and polish. 316L is also magnetic resistant unlike the general-use stainless steel grade of 201 or 304L. With Molybdenum added it gives 316L a better overall corrosion-resistant property than 304L. Therefore the material is ideal for a great watch case.MATERIALS - SAPPHIRE CRYSTALDid you know sapphire crystal is not really a glass, rather a synthetically made crystal? It has superb transparency and is extraordinarily scratch-resistant. To give some comparison, sapphire has a value of 9 on the Mohs scale of mineral hardness. Diamond is a 10! That is why you will usually find sapphire crystal on more expensive luxury watches. Now you can find them on Heitis watches at an affordable price.MATERIALS - QUALITY SWISS RONDA MOVEMENTS & OS20 CHRONOGRAPHS THE HEARTBEAT OF A WATCH.. Time is our constant companion. Even the most extravagant watch needs a reliable movement to keep it in regular motion. Switzerland has earned itself an enviable reputation as a manufacturer of the finest watch movements. Ronda has been committed to time for decades now and that is why we chose to use their high quality movements. Their quartz movements tick away in a vast range of watches from the elegant to the sporty, and in exclusive timepieces produced for the luxury market sector. Now you can have the same luxury movement in a Heitis watch at an unbelievable value.  We also use the OS20 movement in the Heitis Chronograph. It is unbelievably well built and reliable. It features Powercell Saving Reset Mechanism (PSRM) Over-loading Compensation Device (OLCD) and Digital Frequency Control (DFC) for time adjustment. It also features fully functional subdials, Chronograph minute hand, second hand, 24 hour hand, tachymeter and date function. GENUINE LEATHER STRAPS WITH QUICK CHANGE FEATURE Here at Heitis Watch Company individuality matters. So we have used a nice quality Genuine Leather Strap that is soft and comfortable. We have also equipped the straps with a quick change function so you can change the look of your watch in seconds. No tools required, just use your finger tip to easily change your strap.SWISS SUPER LUMINOUSSuper-LumiNova is a strontium aluminate based non-radioactive and nontoxic photoluminescent or afterglow pigment used for illuminating markings on watch dials, hands and bezels, etc.   The material works on the principle of “phosphorescence” and is charged through exposure to light. It is non-radioactive and slowly decreases in brightness until recharged again.OPTIONS :FOR THE HEITIS "CLASSIC"PICK YOUR CASE FINISH AND DIAL COLOR FOR THE "CLASSIC". EACH WATCH ALSO COMES WITH BOTH STRAP COLORS SHOWN BELOW. STRAPS ARE EQUIPPED WITH A QUICK RELEASE CHANGE FUNCTION SO YOU CAN EASILY CHANGE THE LOOK OF YOUR WATCH IN SECONDS WITH NO TOOLS! OPTIONS : FOR THE HEITIS 'AVIATOR'  PICK YOUR CASE FINISH FOR THE "AVIATOR". EACH WATCH ALSO COMES WITH BOTH STRAP COLORS SHOWN BELOW. STRAPS ARE EQUIPPED WITH A QUICK RELEASE CHANGE FUNCTION SO YOU CAN EASILY CHANGE THE LOOK OF YOUR WATCH IN SECONDS WITH NO TOOLS!OPTIONS : FOR THE HEITIS "CHRONOGRAPH"   PICK YOUR DIAL COLOR. EACH WATCH ALSO COMES WITH A LEATHER STRAP (BLACK OR BROWN) SHOWN BELOW AND A STAINLESS STEEL MESH STRAP. LEATHER STRAPS ARE EQUIPPED WITH A QUICK RELEASE CHANGE FUNCTION SO YOU CAN EASILY CHANGE THE LOOK OF YOUR WATCH IN SECONDS WITH NO TOOLS!Nice things come in nice packages! So check ours out, and yes it comes with 2 straps!  Thank you all so much for taking your time to view this project . I hope that you are as passionate as I am about the watches and you make your pledge in order to receive your watch(es) at a nice savings over retail.Please share this project with your family and friends on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram. It would mean the world to me. Cheers! DJ HEIDER Risks and challengesCreating and delivering a new product may come with unexpected delays or setbacks. I have strong relationships and a history of working hard with a reliable supply chain. This gives me the confidence to be able to say that i have minimized these risks for myself and ultimately you the customers.You have my word that i will provide complete transparency and inform backers every step of the way.I'll update you as much as humanly possible about the progress, and if there are any delays, I'll let you know ASAP!After all is said and done, I will deliver the best quality timepieces to each and every one of my backers.Thank-you so much!Cheers!Duty/VAT Charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

story:
Getting to know Nelson Green, designer & owner of NEL APPAREL LLC Men’s swimwear. 

Hello, my name is Nelson Green and my goal is to successfully launch my Men’s swimwear line as a Black owned mainstream swimwear designer and join the ranks of  other mainstream men’s swimwear brands. For years the swimwear market has lacked optionality and variety when it comes to styles for men. NEL APPAREL aims high to bring more variety and options by offering a new form and style of eye catching, innovative, functional, fashionable, sustainable and comfortable designs for men with many preferred tastes. What makes NEL APPAREL unique other than the innovative design is the sustainability in our fabric . We monitor every step of the production process in order to reduce the use of water, energy, chemicals and waste. Our material is  imported from Italy and features supreme technology such as air wicking, quick dry and sunblock qualities. The material is super breathable for comfort with 4 way stretch, no pilling, safe in chlorine and salt water so colors don’t fade and stay vibrant, not to mention wrinkle free and super easy care. 

 Fashion played a big roll from childhood and is apart of who I am today. I always enjoyed styling myself and others so I have a keen eye for design and detail. At NEL APPAREL I sketch out my designs, purchase the fabric and materials and work with a team of New York professionals to bring my original ideas to life! I also model my own designs currently as it cuts down on costs to hire a variety of models at the moment until I make the money to pay a wide range of models, otherwise I use close friends who are very supportive. In all of this, I’m saying that it takes a lot of background work and expenses that I handle myself along with a support system and team to help me bring my visions and designs to life! This all costs and I cannot do it all alone which means I  need your help and support to get this Black Owned independent business up and moving to reach its fullest potential! I am doing this funding campaign to help raise funds for supreme quality material for every man’s comfort, manufacturing process  and distribution costs. Your contributions will help with many of these expenses and the magnitude of your contributions are greatly appreciated in helping me achieve these goals. 

25k is what I will need to help fund NEL APPAREL Men’s swimwear line. This includes funds for large supply in quality fabric and bill of materials, making of cuts, patterns and sewing of samples for each individual designs by New York seamstress,manufacturing expenses in regards to costs per garment,  production costs and distributions. Your support and funding for NEL APPAREL will not go unnoticed. There will of course be a variety of rewards for your contributions. If the entire funding goal isn’t reached, then the money funded will be invested strategically into The NEL APPAREL business and brand to contribute to needed funds for the business. 

Nothing in life that is valuable comes easy. Starting a successful business and brand takes a lot of work, patience, research, learning, trial and error and personal  financial risks. I certainly cannot do this alone without the support of friends, family, and anonymous donors  who believe in the success of a Black owned mainstream men’s swimwear line with quality products. 

I understand that not everyone is able to contribute or donate financially; however any donation amount helps and is greatly appreciated! Please help get the word out! Share with friends, family, colleagues, neighbors and other people you may know! Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
OUR STORY

We were inspired to make better quality clothing that will not only last after washes, but would also teach young boys how to dress for the rest of their lives. Our endless passion for finding well-made boys clothing, fueled the drive for this project.  Our brand will target little guys aged 3T to 14 years old.  

OUR BRAND

Always in style when wearing Angelo.  We want to create classic and quality products that will be a staple to your little guys' wardrobe, not just a trend. 

 SIZING CHART

Our fits are true to size.  **Please note that the model's jeans are cuffed inwards for a more tailored look.**

story:
The PeerAmid NFC Ring

The PeerAmid NFC Ring is exactly what it sounds like. An NFC Ring. NFC is short for Near Field Communication. Using an NFC enabled device, such as a smartphone, you can program your ring to do what ever you want.

The NFC Ring can transfer information, store URLs, and even unlock your home door. The NFC Ring does not need to be charged, ever. 

Imagine walking up to someone and immediately receive information of that person. Or you can even use it as a companion to your phone. 

Be amid of your peers!

(3D Rendering of NFC Ring V3)

What Can It Do?

The NFC ring is very simple to use.

It can store information such as:

  • Your business card

  • Web Addresses

  • Building addresses

  • Phone numbers

  • and plain text

It can also be used to share

  • Business Cards

  • Web addresses

  • Wi-Fi information

  • Bluetooth information

  • phone numbers

  • Locations

  • and plain text

You can also use your ring as:

  • a key to Unlock your NFC enabled door

  • A self promotion device

  • and a key to unlock your phone 

What Will The Money Go Towards? 

The first $5,000 will go towards starting up the company. That is all we need to succeed. (That rhymes)

Once we reach $8,000 we can double our production rate and expand on more models.

$11,000 would TRIPLE our production rate. 

In return for helping use to reach our goal, you will also receive rewards!

  • $5 Make Your Own NFC RING
  • $10 Choice Of Black Or White NFC Ring 

  • $15 Wooden NFC Ring

  • $20 Your choice of Carbon Fiber or Stainless Steel Infused NFC Ring

Help Us Out By Sharing! 

Spread the word to your peers. Tell them to spread the word too!

Risks and Challenges

Risks:

No risks! If you were to buy a ring, it is guaranteed that you'll receive one. Why? Because, though it is slow, we can already manufacture these rings.

Challenges:

Production speed: We don't know if our production rate could keep up with potential demand.

FAQs

Q: Is it water resistant
A: Yes. I've gone swimming with it and it worked perfectly fine afterward.
Q: Is this real?
A:  Yes, as demonstrated in the video, the ring works!    
Q: Does It Work With My Smartphone?
A: Currently, Apple has incorporated NFC capabilities into their devices but restrict the usage to their Apple pay feature.
Many newer android phones are now NFC enabled. We've tested these rings with the Samsung Note 2 and 4 and Samsung Galaxy S5.
There are also more phones that are compatible with the ring.
Q: What is the operating distance?
A: It depends on your device. With the Samsung device, they had a distance of about 2cm.
Q: What is the width of the ring?
A: Currently, 10mm

story:
My name is Maria Podobedova. It has been two years now since I have started successfully with selling marvelous Spanish espadrilles (https://www.facebook.com/espadrili), but now I believe it is time to transform and expand my business. “Before and after espadrilles” will grow in two directions:

  1. We make espadrilles with hand-made appliques (drawings) and elements

  2. Customers personalize the espadrilles on their own. They use an online platform to choose and add stripes and other elements. Once they have finalized their choice and ordered the espadrilles, we manufacture and deliver them to the customer.

With your support I would be able to purchase big amount of espadrilles, as well as materials for their personalization and to create the necessary online platform. Also, I would be able to rent a spot for a small shop at the sea, where I would sell espadrilles directly. I have planned to combine online and direct sales, at the same time.

What We Need & What You Get

Bellow we present you a short table, describing the pricing of our needs:

Description Other information Price
1 000 pairs of espadrilles delivery price included EUR 5000
Materials for espadrille personalization buttons, stripes, paints, sewing materials, etc. EUR 2500
Rent money for a small shop, as well for a small repair, if one is needed, and furniture EUR 3000
Other necessary expenses for company registration, online platform and online store creation, photo-shoots,taxes, etc EUR 1500
Total: EUR 12000


In case we surpass the EUR 12 000 goal?

If we, indeed, gather more money funds, we would invest it in other types of espadrilles – made of leather, as well as velvet Spanish shoes.

In case we do not reach the EUR 12 000 goal?

We will decrease the amount of the espadrilles purchased, dealing with what we have succeeded to accumulate.

PERKS

What we consider to be our most tempting perk is the possibility for one to possess original, unique personalized espadrilles. You choose color and size, the rest is up-to us. They will be at your door for the summer!

The other perks you can see at the right column

The Impact

As I have been in the business for two years, I know there is interest. The customers in Bulgaria like the espadrilles a lot. Last year we made several personalized pairs that were sold out immediately. This is why I am confident in the success of this initiative. I believe, also, that the combination between online and direct sales would capture fully the range of possible clients.


The espadrilles are nice and comfy shoes, suitable for sunny weather, which leaves no doubt that they will be a major success at the sea. For the sea plan, we will have espadrilles ready-to-go upon purchase, but we will also provide a catalogue that would allow the customers to make a choice for a personalized pair, as well. The workmanship would take 24 hours.

Who are we?

Maria Podobedova, a graduated actress and trader by chance. I am dealing with the sales and the marketing of the espadrilles. I imported them for the first time in Bulgaria in 2013, and since then I am dreaming of expansion of my business. I have been dealing with online sales and customers since 2008. I am well aware with all the aspects of trade, as well.

Viktoria Podobedova, pharmacist and an artist. She loves to draw on the espadrilles. She makes original drawings and adds beautiful elements. Please, check the gallery of our personalized espadrilles.

Here is the facebook page of our espadrilles:

https://www.facebook.com/espadrili

Risks & Challenges

The major risk is the possibility that we do not sell our entire stock in one season, despite our plans to do so. I firmly believe that with the planned big diversity, different models, a shop at the sea and online store, the chances are that we sell a lot.

In our plans is also to sell abroad. Other opportunity is to work with other merchants as partners because there is an interest shown among shoe traders.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please, share with your friends or just contribute us with 2 euro :) ! Thank you for helping my dream come true!

			necessary  expenses


			for
			company registration, online platform and online store creation,
			photo-shoots,taxes, etc
		

			EUR
			1500
		



Total:


EUR 12000
		






In
case we surpass the EUR 12 000 goal?
If
we, indeed, gather more money funds, we would invest it in other
types of espadrilles – made of leather, as well as velvet Spanish
shoes.
In
case we do not reach the EUR 12 000 goal?
We
will decrease the amount of the espadrilles purchased, dealing with
what we have succeeded to accumulate.PERKS
What
we consider to be our most tempting perk is the possibility for one
to possess original, unique personalized espadrilles. You choose color and size, the rest is up-to us. They will be at your door for the summer!
The other perks you can see at the right column

The Impact
As
I have been in the business for two years, I know there is interest.
The customers in Bulgaria like the espadrilles a lot. Last year we
made several personalized pairs that were sold out immediately. This
is why I am confident in the success of this initiative. I believe,
also, that the combination between online and direct sales would
capture fully the range of possible clients.
The
espadrilles are nice and comfy shoes, suitable for sunny weather,
which leaves no doubt that they will be a major success at the sea.
For the sea plan, we will have espadrilles ready-to-go upon purchase,
but we will also provide a catalogue that would allow the customers
to make a choice for a personalized pair, as well. The workmanship
would take 24 hours.
Who
are we?
 Maria Podobedova, a graduated actress and trader by chance.
I am dealing with the sales and the marketing of the espadrilles. I
imported them for the first time in Bulgaria in 2013, and since then
I am dreaming of expansion of my business. I have been dealing with
online sales and customers since 2008. I am well aware with all the
aspects of trade, as well.
Viktoria Podobedova, pharmacist and an artist. She
loves to draw on the espadrilles. She makes original drawings and
adds beautiful elements. Please, check the gallery of our
personalized espadrilles.
Here
is the facebook page of our espadrilles:
https://www.facebook.com/espadrili



Risks &
Challenges
The
major risk is the possibility that we do not sell our entire stock in
one season, despite our plans to do so. I firmly believe that with
the planned big diversity, different models, a shop at the sea and
online store, the chances are that we sell a lot. 

In
our plans is also to sell abroad. Other opportunity is to work with
other merchants as partners because there is an interest shown among
shoe traders.

Other Ways You Can
Help
Please,
share with your friends or just contribute us with 2 euro :) ! Thank you for helping my dream come true!

story:
During my duration of study, a lot of my friends had been troubled with ther phisical appearance and overweight. I remember that my aunt had been struggling with her overweight and appearance for years.

I saw how my aunt was suffering everyday, she had tried so many ways to obtain a healthier thinner body shape and lifestyle, but withhout any success. When I graduated from college, my biggest wish was to help people.

I wanted to find a way that people can easily reach their ideal body shape. So I took a special interest in textiles, contacted different laboratories to investigate for clothing. And it filled me with joy and motivation that I came step by step closer to my goal.

Now after years, and of a lot of hard work and devotion, I have created this wonderful fabricfiber. I developt a fiber that is completely breathable, is comfortable to the touch, is ultra-thin, a very strong fabric and perfectly adapts to the body.

This fiber is created exclusively from natural products only.

My goal is to bring a product on to the market, that will bring a change in people's life and bring them back their happiness.

The composition of this Product
This fabricfiber remodels your body thanks to the action of microencapsulated active principles such as:
- Caffeine, that stimulates the metabolism and it helps burn fat.
- Retinol and ceramides, that strengthen and tightens the skin.
- Vitamine E, which has an antioxidant effect synthesizing collagen.
- Aloe Vera, that stimulates the microcirculation of blood and produce new cells giving light and hydration to the skin.

How do I use this product
Great is that you can wear this product anytime and anywhere, for example under your jeans to improve your silhouette or when you make sport because it's very comfortable. You can see an immediate visible success. If you wear our product for 30 days 8 hours per day it reduces the girth while wearing 2 to 3 cm and also take care the skin and reduces fat. You also will notice that your orange skin diminishes. You feel lighter and full of energy and therefore happier and more confident with yourself.

How do I wash it
I can wash it normally. The integrated microcapsules remain effective for more than 100 washes.
It really works!

The short

The Capri

The Leggings


The T-Shirt

story:
Internationally acclaimed Bridal fashion designer Justina McCaffrey invites you to be a part of Bridal Fashion Week 2013 NYC!

 

This campaign is about producing a fashion show of Justina’s new Haute Couture wedding designs for Bridal Fashion week in NYC October, 2013. After a traumatic break-up with spouse/business partner and a one-year absence from the fashion scene, the resilient Justina McCaffrey is returning with fantasy designs to wow the fashion world and brides to be!

 

“Designing extraordinary gowns, fulfilling bridal dreams is my joy & live lihood for 25 years. My new business partner Nancy has a record of impeccable integrity, freeing my inspirations to spin into luscious bridal reverie. I am focusing on creating gowns reflecting the unique beauty, hopes and dreams of each bride. As she walks down the aisle, a glowing Justina McCaffrey bride’s eyes meet her groom’s adoring gaze, creating memories to last a lifetime.”     Justina McCaffrey

 

~For Background Information About Justina McCaffrey  & Justina McCaffrey Haute Couture,   Read On …..

 

Or ~ If You Would Like To Go Straight To Nuts & Bolts Of The Offer, Feel Free To Move On To NUTS & BOLTS ~

 

Justina McCaffrey & Justina McCaffrey Haute Couture

 

Justina Mccaffrey and her brand jmhc is recognized internationally as a top brand in the bridal industry. JMHC is the choice of celebrities and notables .

 

Justina has designed for:

The Robert Altman film “Dr. T and the Women”  Staring Richard Gere.  A Justina McCaffrey gown was worn by actress KATE HUDSON.

THE NATIONAL BALLET OF CANADA, for THE ENTIRE BALLET AT THEIR ANNUAL GALAS

CELLIST AMANDA FORSYTH bride to CONDUCTOR, violinist Pinchas Zukerman.

KAREN KAIN, PRIMA BALLERINA & ARTISTIC DIRECTOR, THE NATIONAL BALLET OF CANADA

LAUREEN HARPER, wife of Canana’s PRIME MINISTER Stephen Harper

FORMER US AMBASSADOR PAUL CELLUCCI’S DAUGHTER ANNE CELLUCCI bride to NHL HOCKEY PLAYER CRAIG ADAMS

 

Justina was personally humbled by the opportuinity to design a garment for HIS HOLINESS POPE JOHN PAUL II.  Justina’s “pluvial cope” now rests in the Vatican Archieves.  DURING THE VATICAN’S JUBILEE YEAR, THE FASHION INDUSTRY WAS CELEBRATED AND OF THE 20 PEOPLE PRESENTED TO HIS HOLINESS POPE JOHN PAUL II, JUSTINA MCCAFFREY WAS THE ONLY PERSON TO REPRESENT NORTH AMERICA. 

 

Kudos in THE MEDIA 

 

“JUSTINA’S TALENT AS A DESIGNER IS WORLD CLASS AND HER VISION OF BRIDAL WEAR IS COMPLETELY UNIQUE.  THERE IS NO QUESTION THAT JUSTINA IS IN A LEAGUE WITH VERA WANG IN TERMS OF THE EXCEPTIONALLY HIGH CALIBER OF HER WORK, BUT WITH REPECT TO HER VISION, JUSTINA HAS NO EQUAL.” BERNADETTA MORRA, EDITOR IN CHIEF - FASHION MAGAZINE

 

“JUSTINA IS A TREADSETTER, AND MANY OF HER STYLES HAVE BEEN BESTSELLERS, OND ONE SPECIFICALLY HAS BEEN NUMBER ONE IN OUR COMPANY FOR SEVERAL SEASONS. THAT’S QUITE AN ACCOPLISHMENT SINCE WE HAVE OVER A THOUSAND SAMPLES.” MARA URSHEL, PRESIDENT - KLEINFELD BRIDAL NYC  (OF TV’S  ‘SAY YES TO THE DRESS’)

 

“JUSTINA’S DRESSES ARE TREASURE AND TIMELESS” LAUREEN HARPER, CANADA'S FIRST LADY  - WIFE OF THE PRIME MINISTER OF CANADA STEPHEN HARPER

 

 

  • DRESS CHOSEN, - REGIS & KELLY - VALENTINE SHOW ~2003,2004,2005~

 

  • DRESS CHOSEN, - MTV WEDDING SHOW

 

  • BEST DRESS - THE TODAY SHOW - NBC 2005

 

JUSTINA MCCAFFREY IS A REGULARLY FEATURED PERSONALITY AND BRAND ACROSS A WIDE PROFILE OF MEDIA OUTLETS

 

Justina McCaffrey  WAS CHOSEN FOR BEST DRESS ON A FEATURE EDITION OF NBC’S TODAY SHOW, HAS BEEN A THREE TIME VALENTINE’S DAY GUEST ON REGIS AND KELLY AND A GUEST CELEBRITY JUDGE ON THE HIT REALITY TV SERIES, PROJECT RUNWAY.

 

OTHER NOTABLE OUTLETS INCLUDE FEATURING THE BRAND INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING.

 

  • ABC NEWS
  • MTV
  • FOX TV
  • EXTRA EXTRA
  • OXYGEN TV
  • THE KNOT
  • ENTERTAINMENT TONIGHT
  • SLICE TV
  • NBC CANADA AM
  • CBC THE NATIONAL NEWS
  • CTV NEWS
  • GLOBAL TV
  • SALT AND LIGHT TV
  • ZENIT NEWSWIRE
  • CPAC
  • CBC RADIO
  • E TALK
  • MUCH MUSIC
  • FASHION TV
  • NEW YORK TIMES
  • MARTHA STEWART LIVING
  • NEW YORK MAGAZINE
  • BETTER HOMES AND GARDENS
  • LA TIMES
  • MODERN BRIDE
  • NEW YORK POST
  • SPOSA COLLEZIONI,
  • GLOBE AND MAIL
  • BRIDES MAGAZINE
  • INSTYLE MAGAZINE
  • NEWSDAY
  • THE NATIONAL POST
  • CHICAGO SUN
  • MODERN BRIDE
  • MANHATTAN BRIDE
  • INSIDE WEDDINGS
  • CHICAGO SOCIAL
  • LOS ANGELES WEDDINGS
  • BOSTON WEDDINGS
  • JEZEBEL
  • FLARE MAGAZINE
  • GRACE ORMONDE WEDDING STYLE
  • WEDDING BELLS
  • TODAY’S BRIDE
  • D WEDDINGS
  • CONDE NAST

 

 

NUTS & BOLTS

 

Why Your Contribution is Important to Justina McCaffrey Haute Couture?

 

Your contribution will help me greatly because I will be able to show my new collection in the beautiful and professional manner demanded within the industry.

 

  • Although I was on hiatus from the industry for a year, many retailers are contacting me, wanting to purchase my gowns for their stores. They are also very enthusiastic to see my new collection.  Presenting at the New York Bridal show is the industry standard. All Haute Couture Bridal designers are expected to attend and present their line. Launching a new collection at the New York Bridal show is labor intensive and expensive. 

 

  • New York International Bridal Market is the largest gathering of designers, and retailers and attracts buyers from all over the world. Currently I am consistently selling to a number of retailers in Japan, and the US. A lot of interest has also been expressed from additional buyers in the US and Europe.

 

  • Presenting at the New York International Bridal Market is the most cost effective way of seeing all these buyers in the same place. This campaign will make it easier for me to effectively market to the 500+ retailers that are in the category of selling luxury high-end wedding dresses.

 

 

Available Alternatives for Presentation of Collection

I am very thankful for any contribution and I acknowledge that these shows are very expensive to produce.  I believe in being as transparent as possible, and to accomplish this, the following illustrates the variegated prices within each type of showing.

 

$2000 – The Road Trip

This level of funding would not be able to finance a NY presentation during market week. It would allow me to travel by van to a limited number of targeted US states. The most effective strategy would be to travel from Boston to Baltimore with the dresses to meet and show buyers in their individual stores. A road trip however is far from what is expected of a high-end brand and could potentially diminish the value of brand in the eyes of the buyers.

 

STRETCH GOALS

Intermediate Stretch Goals

 

  1. A.      $8,090 – Two-Day Showroom Presentation

This facilitates a 2-day presentation (Saturday, Sunday) in a NY hotel suite with dresses on dress forms.

  1. B.     $15,500 – Three-Day Showroom Presentation

This facilitates a 3-day presentation (Friday, Saturday, Sunday) in a NY hotel suite with dresses on dress forms and a showroom model.

  1. C.     $20,200 – Four-Day Showroom Presentation

 

This facilitates a 4-day presentation (Friday, Saturday, Sunday, and Monday)  in a NY hotel with dresses on dress forms and a showroom model.

IDEAL STRETCH GOAL – THE RUNWAY SHOW

 

$30,500 – The Runway Show and the 4-Day Showroom review

 

This facilitates a 4-day presentation that includes a runway show in the hotel ballroom, and appointment with retailers who have seen the show and are interested in coming back to review/get a closer look, and purchase sample dresses for their stores. There is no need for a showroom model because the fashion show shows how the dresses fit.

 

I have already been granted a specific date and time for the show, and it is strategically placed in a very favorable position between two other successful designers.

 

If I am not able to raise this money I will be forced to surrender and cancel this time slot.

This $30,500 funded amount would create an adequate and expectable presentation that the buyers and press are familiar with when referring to my brand and other brands that I often compete with.

 

If there is any additional funds, I will proceed to create gift bags, paper invitations, and prosecco. Extra funds may also be used to finance signage and extra interns. Extraordinary larger funds will help in the development of business

 

 

DONATION OFFERINGS/INCENTIVES

 

My offerings of perks range from simple to elaborate.

 

$25 - Beautiful Sketch

For as little as a $25 contribution you can receive a beautiful color signed print of your choice of sketch of one of the dresses from the new collection. The contributor can choose the sketch. All sketches will available online to review and choose after the fashion show in Mid October,2013.

 

$100 - Luxurious 100% Silk Shawl

For a $100 contribution you will received a beautiful light blue silk shawl, featured below. Described as: “A luxurious double ply silk rubbed fabric finish. It has the feel of cashmere but it is 100% silk.”

 

$375 - Complete Collection of Sketches

For a $375 contribution you will receive the complete collection of color printed and signed sketches ~ 15 in total.

 

 

$2000 - Generous Discount on Dresses

For a $2000 contribution I am CALLING ALL BRIDES and pre-selling 50% off the retail price of one of my brand new dresses from my new collection with the $2000 being credited to your 50% off order. This is a dress that is cut and hand made especially for you.

You will also receive a personalized thank you note from me as well as an email confirmation from me regarding your order.

This is an extremely valuable gift for anyone getting married.  You can purchase it for yourself or you can team up with a few of your friends or family and purchase this as a shower gift for someone getting married. Everybody wants to look amazing on the wedding day and there is nothing better being in a beautiful dress that will be remembered for many years in wedding photos.

 

$5000 - Come to NY, See the Show, Meet Justina, and Pick your Dress

For a $5000 contribution you will receive your choice of any one of my dresses and veils from the collection made especially for you on your wedding day.

You will also receive 2 invitations  for the NY show and the ability to meet me in NY and try on the sample dresses. I will personally take your measurements and go over your order with you. 

Get your camera out! This is a wonderful addition to your bridal keepsake book to meet the designer and receive feedback and ideas. You can even make an event around the consultation and have a NYC bridal shower weekend with some of your girlfriends and family. 

Please note: This does not include transportation to NYC.

 

 

$7500 - Pick your Dress, and Have a Dress Named After You.

For a $7500 contribution you will have the ability to choose any one of my dresses and veils from the collection made especially for you on your wedding day.

You will also receive invitations for 2 to the NY show and the ability to meet me in NY and try on dresses with me.  I will personally take your measurements and go over your order with you. 

You will also have the ability to name one of my dresses in the collection with a credit of your full name on my website under the photo of the dress.

Please note: This does not include transportation to NYC.

(9 available.)

 

$10,000- One of a Kind - Couture!! Couture!!

For a $10,000 contribution you will have a beautiful one-of-a-kind dress and veil designed by me and created especially for you on your wedding day.

You will also receive 2 fashion show invitations and the ability to meet me in NY, and discuss this dress.

You will also have the ability to name one of my dresses in the collection with a credit of your full name on my website under the photo of the dress.

While in NY, you will be fitted with a muslin copy of your dress in your measurements that would be previously discussed via Skype conversations, and dress details and ideas will be discussed  

Please note: This does not include transportation to NYC.

(3 available.)  

 

 

$12,000 - Like a PRINCESS - Justina will fly to your wedding!!!

For a $12,000 contribution you will have a beautiful one-of-a-kind wedding dress and veil designed by me and created especially for you on your wedding day.

You will also receive 2 fashion show invitations and the ability to meet me in NY, and discuss this dress.

You will also have the ability to name one of my dresses from the collection with a credit of your full name on my website under the photo fo the dress.

While in NY, you will be fitted with a muslin copy of your dress that would be previously discussed via Skype conversations, and dress details and ideas will be discussed.

Please note: This does not include transportation to the NYC.

In addition to this, I will fly to your wedding and help you get into your dress and see you down the alter.

(3 available.)

The most effective strategy would be to travel from Boston to Baltimore with the dresses to meet and show buyers in their individual stores. A road trip however is far from what is expected of a high-end brand and could potentially diminish the value of brand in the eyes of the buyers.
 
STRETCH GOALS
Intermediate Stretch Goals
 



A.      $8,090 – Two-Day Showroom Presentation 



This facilitates a 2-day presentation (Saturday, Sunday) in a NY hotel suite with dresses on dress forms.

IDEAL STRETCH GOAL – THE RUNWAY SHOW
 
$30,500 – The Runway Show and the 4-Day Showroom review
 
This facilitates a 4-day presentation that includes a runway show in the hotel ballroom, and appointment with retailers who have seen the show and are interested in coming back to review/get a closer look, and purchase sample dresses for their stores. There is no need for a showroom model because the fashion show shows how the dresses fit.
 
I have already been granted a specific date and time for the show, and it is strategically placed in a very favorable position between two other successful designers.
 
If I am not able to raise this money I will be forced to surrender and cancel this time slot.
