This $30,500 funded amount would create an adequate and expectable presentation that the buyers and press are familiar with when referring to my brand and other brands that I often compete with.
 
If there is any additional funds, I will proceed to create gift bags, paper invitations, and prosecco. Extra funds may also be used to finance signage and extra interns. Extraordinary larger funds will help in the development of business
 
 
DONATION OFFERINGS/INCENTIVES
 
My offerings of perks range from simple to elaborate.
 
$25 - Beautiful Sketch
For as little as a $25 contribution you can receive a beautiful color signed print of your choice of sketch of one of the dresses from the new collection. The contributor can choose the sketch. All sketches will available online to review and choose after the fashion show in Mid October,2013.
 
$100 - Luxurious 100% Silk Shawl
For a $100 contribution you will received a beautiful light blue silk shawl, featured below. Described as: “A luxurious double ply silk rubbed fabric finish. It has the feel of cashmere but it is 100% silk.”
 
$375 - Complete Collection of Sketches
For a $375 contribution you will receive the complete collection of color printed and signed sketches ~ 15 in total.
 
 
$2000 - Generous Discount on Dresses
For a $2000 contribution I am CALLING ALL BRIDES and pre-selling 50% off the retail price of one of my brand new dresses from my new collection with the $2000 being credited to your 50% off order. This is a dress that is cut and hand made especially for you.
You will also receive a personalized thank you note from me as well as an email confirmation from me regarding your order.
This is an extremely valuable gift for anyone getting married.  You can purchase it for yourself or you can team up with a few of your friends or family and purchase this as a shower gift for someone getting married. Everybody wants to look amazing on the wedding day and there is nothing better being in a beautiful dress that will be remembered for many years in wedding photos.
 
$5000 - Come to NY, See the Show, Meet Justina, and Pick your Dress
For a $5000 contribution you will receive your choice of any one of my dresses and veils from the collection made especially for you on your wedding day.
You will also receive 2 invitations  for the NY show and the ability to meet me in NY and try on the sample dresses. I will personally take your measurements and go over your order with you. 
Get your camera out! This is a wonderful addition to your bridal keepsake book to meet the designer and receive feedback and ideas. You can even make an event around the consultation and have a NYC bridal shower weekend with some of your girlfriends and family. 
Please note: This does not include transportation to NYC.
 
 
$7500 - Pick your Dress, and Have a Dress Named After You.
For a $7500 contribution you will have the ability to choose any one of my dresses and veils from the collection made especially for you on your wedding day.
You will also receive invitations for 2 to the NY show and the ability to meet me in NY and try on dresses with me.  I will personally take your measurements and go over your order with you. 
You will also have the ability to name one of my dresses in the collection with a credit of your full name on my website under the photo of the dress.
Please note: This does not include transportation to NYC.
(9 available.)
 
$10,000- One of a Kind - Couture!! Couture!!
For a $10,000 contribution you will have a beautiful one-of-a-kind dress and veil designed by me and created especially for you on your wedding day.
You will also receive 2 fashion show invitations and the ability to meet me in NY, and discuss this dress.
You will also have the ability to name one of my dresses in the collection with a credit of your full name on my website under the photo of the dress.
While in NY, you will be fitted with a muslin copy of your dress in your measurements that would be previously discussed via Skype conversations, and dress details and ideas will be discussed  
Please note: This does not include transportation to NYC.
(3 available.)  
 
 
$12,000 - Like a PRINCESS - Justina will fly to your wedding!!!
For a $12,000 contribution you will have a beautiful one-of-a-kind wedding dress and veil designed by me and created especially for you on your wedding day.
You will also receive 2 fashion show invitations and the ability to meet me in NY, and discuss this dress.
You will also have the ability to name one of my dresses from the collection with a credit of your full name on my website under the photo fo the dress.
While in NY, you will be fitted with a muslin copy of your dress that would be previously discussed via Skype conversations, and dress details and ideas will be discussed.
Please note: This does not include transportation to the NYC.
In addition to this, I will fly to your wedding and help you get into your dress and see you down the alter.
(3 available.)

story:
Clothing Campaign for Poor Children in Pakistan

 

This young woman is Noreen Shamshad. 

  She has requested that we send clothing for the poor children that she works with in her city in Pakistan. I have been working with her for about 2 years now.

  Noreen works with these children on a daily basis; she teaches them about the love of Christ by pouring her love on them.

 

“Then the King will say to those on his right, ‘Come, you who are blessed by my Father; take your inheritance, the kingdom prepared for you since the creation of the world. 35 For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, 36 I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me.’ Matthew 25: 31-46

 

We cannot all go, but we can SEND our love!!

Our Goals for this campaign:

  • To send a HUGE box of children's clothing to Noreen so you can distribute it to the children in need.
  • Send along additional money for her to purchase other necessary items (underwear, bras for the girls)
  • ALL funds will go to Noreen and her Pastor for the purchase of clothing for the children!  If we do not raise enough funds to send the box then all the money will be sent to her for the purchase of needed clothing.
  • We will need approx $300 to send a box of clothing.  We will be using "space" bags to fit as much as possible into the crate.
  • We also need clothing donations!! Clothing for 1 year to 12 year old children.  We need spring and summer clothing.  Used or new!  Please remember socks, underwear,,,etc.

YOU can impact the life of a child in need!!

There is so much need everywhere!  I have chosen to work with Noreen because I have an established trusted relationship with her.

  • She provides medical help to the local villages through hand in hand work with her Pastor.
  • She also works with women to empower them with the Love of Christ
  • She loves God with all her heart!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you  just can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean they you can't  help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!!
  • Send clothing donations to Warrior Women of the Word Ministries, International  c/o Rev Julia Matts 16 Bullock Street Apt 1 Pawtucket Rhode Island 02860

story:
We've had a lot of requests for T-shirts. Here's your chance to get them!

I'm not out to make money on these and we will print however many we get orders for.  I just don't want to end up with 10 extra small shirts sitting in my closet.

There is a very short time limit so please share with your friends.

Please pick your size and they'll be available for pick up at the Plaza on Sept 16. Free tickets and details here

http://www.eventbrite.ca/e/storyhive-season-1-premiere-calgarys-winning-short-films-registration-12602800315

Also screening as part of the Alberta Spirit Awards at CIFF

http://www.calgaryfilm.com/films/2014/alberta-s...

 If you'd like them mailed, please add $10 shipping and handling.
